T02D1190:104b-21: dag pa'i dngos grub 'byung ma yin //
T02D1190:104b-22: srid pa'i skye ba gzhan du'ang /
T02D1190:104b-23: phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub thams cad 'di nyid kyis mi 'thob ste //
T02D1190:104b-24: rig byed yang yin la grub mtha' yang yin pas rig byed grub mtha'o //
T02D1190:104b-25: thams cad kyang yin la rig byed grub mtha' yang yin pas thams cad rig byed grub mtha'o //
T02D1190:104b-26: de ni khyab 'jug dang dbang phyug chen po dang /
T02D1190:104b-27: dbyig gi snying po la sogs pa'i ngag snyan cing 'jebs pa'o //
T02D1190:104b-28: rang gi lhag pa'i 'jebs pa ni /
T02D1190:104b-29: las rab 'byams la sogs pas kyang phyag rgya chen
T02D1190:104b-30: po'i dngos grub 'byung ba ma yin te mi 'thob
T02D1190:104b-31: po // slar ji ltar yin pa gsungs pa /
T02D1190:104b-34: bskyed pa dang rdzogs pa'i rim pa dbyer med par
T02D1190:104b-35: rtogs pa las kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i lam
T02D1190:104b-36: gyi ye shes kyi phyir ro //
T02D1190:104b-38: srid pa'i skye ba gzhan du'o //
T02D1190:104b-40: srid pa gzhan ni skye ba phyi ma ste yang skye ba la'o //
T02D1190:104b-41: 'dis ni skye ba gzhan dang gzhan rnams su yang phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub mi 'thob po //
T02D1190:104b-42: de nyid gsal bar bstan pa /
T02D1190:104b-44: de med pas kyang dngos grub med //
T02D1190:105a-0: @105a * // rnam par dag pa yongs su shes pa de med
T02D1190:105a-1: par 'jig rten gnyi ga ru yang phyag rgya chen
T02D1190:105a-2: po'i dngos grub med pa nyid yin no //
T02D1190:105a-3: ldog pa'i sgo nas rjes su 'gro ba bstan par byas pa yin no //
T02D1190:105a-4: gang gis mi shes kyi rdo rje //
T02D1190:105a-5: de yi ngal ba don med 'gyur //
T02D1190:105a-6: gang gis ni rnal 'byor pas so //
T02D1190:105a-7: kye rdo rje ni kun rdzob dang don dam pa
T02D1190:105a-8: dbyer med pa'i ye shes rnam pa thams cad kyi
T02D1190:105a-9: mchog dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin
T02D1190:105a-10: no // mi shes pa ni ma rtogs so //
T02D1190:105a-12: rig byed la sogs pa'i ngag 'jebs pa'i don gyis
T02D1190:105a-13: bsgyur pa'i nyon mongs pas yang dag pa'i byang chub
T02D1190:105a-14: kyi mtshan nyid kyi 'bras bu ni mi rnyed pa'i
T02D1190:105a-15: phyir ro // don med pa ni byed pa dang bral ba'i 'bras bu med pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1190:105a-16: dgyes pa'i rdo rje yang shes nas rtag tu goms
T02D1190:105a-17: pa med par dngos grub med par bstan pa'i phyir
T02D1190:105a-18: / chu bo'i rgyun ni rab 'thab dang //
T02D1190:105a-19: mar me'i 'od kyi rgyun bzhin du //
T02D1190:105a-20: rtag tu de nyid rnal 'byor pas //
T02D1190:105a-21: nyin dang mtshan du rnam par gzhag / ji ltar
T02D1190:105a-22: chu bo'i rgyun 'bab pa la khyad par med pa
T02D1190:105a-23: dang / mar me'i 'od la yang rgyun gyi bye brag yod pa ma yin no //
T02D1190:105a-24: de bzhin du khams gsum dbyer med pa'i rnam par
T02D1190:105a-25: mi rtog pa'i ye shes kyi sku gcig par rnal
T02D1190:105a-26: 'byor pas dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i rnal 'byor dang ldan
T02D1190:105a-28: nyin dang mtshan du zhes pa ni dus thams cad du bar chad med par zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1190:105a-29: de lta'i rim par phye ba rdzogs pa'i sgo nas
T02D1190:105a-30: rim par phye ba gsungs pa'i don bsdu ba gsungs
T02D1190:105a-31: pa / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs dgyes pa'i rdo rje las /
T02D1190:105a-32: rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba rnal 'byor
T02D1190:105a-33: ma chen mo 'du ba'i rim par phye ba ste
T02D1190:105a-34: brgyad pa'o // ye shes lnga dang /
T02D1190:105a-36: thabs dang shes rab kyi bdag nyid kun rdzob dang
T02D1190:105a-37: don dam pa dbyer med pa'i yi shes ni de
T02D1190:105a-38: bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs dgyes
T02D1190:105a-39: pa'i rdo rje las rnal 'byor ma'o //
T02D1190:105a-40: gang 'khor lo ni mi shes pa gcod pa'o //
T02D1190:105a-41: de la rim par phye ba de ni rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor lo zhes bya'o //
T02D1190:105a-42: rnal 'byor ma chen mo ni bdag med ma'o //
T02D1190:105b-0: @105b de nas gang bde ba'i ye shes gang la rim par phye ba de ni /
T02D1190:105b-1: rnal 'byor ma chen mo 'du ba can no //
T02D1190:105b-3: de len cing 'dzin pas na rim par phye ba'o //
T02D1190:105b-4: de yang brgyad na khyab pa'i tshul lo //
T02D1190:105b-5: kun rdzob dang don dam pa dbyer med pa'o //
T02D1190:105b-6: stong pa nyid bcu drug rnam par dag pa'i rdo rje 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1190:105b-7: dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i rnam par bshad pa rab tu
T02D1190:105b-8: gsal ba'i kha sbyor gyi rgya cher 'grel ba las
T02D1190:105b-10: / da ni rim pa gnyis rnam par dag pa
T02D1190:105b-11: de yang dag pa'i ye shes phyag rgya chen po'i
T02D1190:105b-12: dngos grub bskyed pa yin pas phung po la sogs
T02D1190:105b-13: pa rnam pa gnyi ga'i rnam par dag pa bstan
T02D1190:105b-15: de nas gzhan rnam par dag pa'i le'u bshad par bya'o zhes smos te /
T02D1190:105b-16: de nas ni rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor lo las so //
T02D1190:105b-18: rnam par dag pa'i rim par phye ba ni khyad
T02D1190:105b-19: par du 'phags par dag pas na rnam par dag
T02D1190:105b-20: pa ste / kun rdzob dang don dam pa dbyer
T02D1190:105b-21: med pa rdo rje 'dzin pa dang bdag mid ma
T02D1190:105b-23: rim par phye ba ni gos 'gebs pa'o //
T02D1190:105b-24: de len cing 'dzin pas na rim par phye ba'o //
T02D1190:105b-25: bshad par bya'o ni khyad par du 'phags pa'i tshul gyis bstan par bya'o //
T02D1190:105b-27: nges par dngos po thams cad kyi //
T02D1190:105b-28: dag pa de bzhin nyid du brjod //
T02D1190:105b-29: ces pa la don 'di la gnas pas na dngos po'i don to //
T02D1190:105b-30: de rnams kyi rnam par dag pa ni khyad par du 'phags par dag pa'o //
T02D1190:105b-32: de bzhin nyid de rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes so //
T02D1190:105b-33: thams cad kyi zhes pa ni brtan pa dang g-yo ba rnams kyi'o //
T02D1190:105b-34: gnyi ga yang gang dngos po nyid kyis yongs su brtags pa'o //
T02D1190:105b-35: don de rtogs pa stong pa nyid tshad ma'i 'bras bu yin no //
T02D1190:105b-36: 'dis ni don dam pa'i rnam par dag pa'o //
T02D1190:105b-37: phyi nas re re dbye ba yis //
T02D1190:105b-38: lha rnams kyi yang brjod par bya //
T02D1190:105b-39: phyi nas zhes pa ni rjes thogs su ma chad par ro //
T02D1190:105b-40: re re dbye ba yis ni re re'i rnam pa'o //
T02D1190:105b-41: gang rnams kyi zhe na lha rnams kyi'o //
T02D1190:105b-42: yang gi sgra ni khyad par gyi don to //
T02D1190:105b-43: de nyid phyir brjod par bya ni gsal bar byed pa'o //
T02D1190:106a-0: mtshan ma'i rang bzhin nyid kyi phyir kun rdzob kyi @106a * //
T02D1190:106a-1: bden pa'i lha rnams kyi re re'i dbye bas phung
T02D1190:106a-2: po lnga dang khams dang skye mched la sogs pa'i
T02D1190:106a-3: dngos po rnams kyi rnam par dag pa ste /
T02D1190:106a-4: kun rdzob kyi bden par lha'i rnam pas phung po la sogs pa rnam par dag par bya'o //
T02D1190:106a-5: don dam pa'i bden pa yang de bzhin nyid kyi
T02D1190:106a-6: rnam pa yin pas rim pa gnyi ga dbyer med
T02D1190:106a-7: pa bsgom pa na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
T02D1190:106a-9: da ni nges par dngos po thams cad kyi zhes
T02D1190:106a-10: pas spyir bshad pa'i don dam pa'i bden pa'i rnam

T02D1190:106a-13: lha rnams kyi yang brjod par bya //

T02D1190:106a-16: rang bzhin gyis ni rnam par dag / dbang po drug ni /
T02D1190:106a-21: yid kyi cha rnams ni dbang po drug go //
T02D1190:106a-22: phung po lnga ni gzugs dang /
T02D1190:106a-27: skye mched drug ni gzugs dang /

T02D1190:106a-40: nyid nas ma skyes pa'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir

T02D1190:106a-42: // 'di ni don dam pa'i bden pa rnam par dag pa'o //

T02D1190:106a-47: bdag nyid nyid de'i rnam par dag pa med na

T02D1190:106a-55: rang gi rig pa'i bde ba mchog / yul gyi
T02D1190:106a-56: zhes pa ni yul la sogs pa rnam dag go
T02D1190:106a-57: // dngos po dag pa'i phyir zhes pa ni /
T02D1190:106a-58: don dam pa dang kun rdzob dag gi rang bzhin lha'i rnam par dag pa'o //
T02D1190:106a-59: rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir rang rig pa gang ngo //
T02D1190:106a-60: bde ba mchog ni yang dag pa'i ye shes so //

T02D1190:106b-2: gzugs la sogs pa'i yul rnams gang //
T02D1190:106b-3: gzhan yang rnal 'byor pas mthong ba //
T02D1190:106b-4: dngos po de kun dag pa ste //
T02D1190:106b-5: gang phyir sangs rgyas 'gro rang bzhin //
T02D1190:106b-6: gzugs la sogs pa'i yul rnams kyi phung po drug dang /
T02D1190:106b-8: gang gzhan yang zhes pa ni /
T02D1190:106b-11: 'di thams cad rnal 'byor bas gnyi ga dbyer med

T02D1190:106b-13: de dang de thams cad gnyi ga rnam par dag

T02D1190:106b-16: ye shes gcig gi rang bzhin no //

T02D1190:106b-19: rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa yin na de

T02D1190:106b-42: sgra ni rna bas mnyan par bya //
T02D1190:106b-43: sgra ni gzung bar bya ba'o //

T02D1190:106b-47: dri ni gzung bar bya ba'o //

T02D1190:107a-3: par gsungs pa / dag pas dug med byas nas ni //

T02D1190:107a-8: rnam par dag na chos kyi dbyings shin tu rnam
T02D1190:107a-9: par dag pa'i bdag nyid du 'gyur ba yin no

T02D1190:107a-12: tshor ba la yang dkar mor brjod //

T02D1190:107a-16: bdag med rnal 'byor ma gnas so //

T02D1190:107a-18: gzugs mtha' yas pa des na gzugs kyi phung po'o //

T02D1190:107a-20: 'du shes mtha' yas pa des na 'du shes kyi phung po'o //
T02D1190:107a-21: 'du byed mtha' yas pa des na 'du byed kyi phung po'o //
T02D1190:107a-22: rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pa des na rnam par shes pa'i phung po'o //

T02D1190:107a-31: de nyid de nyid rnal 'byor pas ni de kho na nyid dang ldan pa'o //

T02D1190:107a-40: par dag pa'i mkha' 'gro ma bzhi rnam par dag
T02D1190:107a-44: de nas ni rjes thogs su bar ma chad par ro //
T02D1190:107a-45: phyi'i 'phar ma ni phyi rol du 'byung bas phyi'o //
T02D1190:107b-0: phyi yang yin @107b la 'phar ma yang de yin pas phyi'i 'phar ma ste /
T02D1190:107b-1: phyi rol ni nang gi mtshan nyid dang bral ba'i phyir te /
T02D1190:107b-2: nang dang lhan cig tu kun du sbyar ba'o //

T02D1190:107b-12: dbang dkar gshin rje chom rkun ma //

T02D1190:107b-14: lus ngan por ni gha sma r'i //

T02D1190:107b-16: steng du mkha' spyod ma zhes bshad //

T02D1190:107b-20: chu bdag ni ro langs mnan pa'o //

T02D1190:112a-11: byang chub sems dpa'i khyim rnams dang //
T02D1190:112a-12: zhes pa ni tshal ni ljon shing sna tshogs pa dang ldan pa'i sa gzhi ste //
T02D1190:112a-13: byin gyis brlabs pa'i gnas yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1190:112a-14: skye bos dben pa ni skye bo gags byed pa dang bral ba'o //
T02D1190:112a-15: gnas zhes pa ni sa phyogs so //
T02D1190:112a-16: byang chub sems dpa'i khyim rnams su //
T02D1190:112a-17: zhes pa ni skal pa dang ldan pa'i skye bo gnas na dben pa'i gnas kyang ngo //
T02D1190:112a-18: gnas 'di rnams dkyil 'khor gyi khang pa bya ste de'i nang du dkyil 'khor bzhengs par bya'o //
T02D1190:112a-19: byang chub ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes so //
T02D1190:112a-20: sems dpa' ni srid pa gsum gcig pa ste srid
T02D1190:112a-21: gsum dbyer med pa'i rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye
T02D1190:112a-22: shes so // de'i khyim rnams ni gnas rnams te /
T02D1190:112a-23: rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes kyi gnas 'di rnams su'o //
T02D1190:112a-24: dkyil 'khor khang pa'i nang du yang ni yang dag
T02D1190:112a-25: pa'i ye shes kyi gnas gang de rtog pa dang
T02D1190:112a-26: rnam par rtog pa kun spangs pa'i yongs su bcad
T02D1190:112a-28: dkyil 'khor dam pa rab tu bzhengs ni khyab pa'i phyir rdo rje 'dzin pa'o //
T02D1190:112a-29: dam pa ni mchog gtso bo ste nyan thos la sogs pa'i yul ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1190:112a-30: dkyil 'khor bzhengs par bya ba'i phyir rdul tshon gsungs pa /
T02D1190:112a-31: rdul tshon dam pa'i tshon dang ni //
T02D1190:112a-32: yang na 'bring po nyid kyis te //
T02D1190:112a-33: rin chen lnga yi phye ma dang //
T02D1190:112a-35: dam pa ni lhar byin gyis brlabs pas rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i rnam par dag pa'o //
T02D1190:112a-36: rdul tshon ni rdul tshon gyis so //
T02D1190:112a-37: rin chen lnga yi phye ma dang //
T02D1190:112a-43: ma rgad la sogs pa rnams kyis so //
T02D1190:112b-0: dngul la sogs pa'i phye ma @112b rnams kyis so //
T02D1190:112b-4: 'bras dang gro la sogs pa rnams kyis te de
T02D1190:112b-5: bzhin gshegs pa lnga rnam par dag pa'i kha dog
T02D1190:112b-7: yang na dam pa zhes pa ni dam pa dbang po rnams te /
T02D1190:112b-8: de rnams kyi gtso bo sems yin pas dam pa'o //
T02D1190:112b-9: de yis dga' ba gtong bar byed pas na dam pas ra'o //
T02D1190:112b-10: de yang 'dir chu yin pas dam pa'i tshul can no //
T02D1190:112b-11: de yang dbang po dang shes pa yul la rag
T02D1190:112b-12: las pa'i rdo rje gsum dbyer med pa yin pa'i
T02D1190:112b-13: don to // de la yod pas kha ni chos
T02D1190:112b-14: 'byung las byung ba'i chos kyi dbyings kyi bdag nyid
T02D1190:112b-16: yang na 'bring po nyid kyis te ni aa bdag med ma'o //
T02D1190:112b-18: ba byang chub kyi sems so //
T02D1190:112b-20: go rims dang go rims las bzlog pas spro ba
T02D1190:112b-21: dang bsdu ba dang bsdu ba dang spro ba'i bdag
T02D1190:112b-22: nyid des gnyi ga dbyer med pas na yongs su
T02D1190:112b-23: gcod par mi nus pa'i phyir rgyu des na 'bring
T02D1190:112b-24: po'o // 'ang gi sgras ni khyad par gyi don te /
T02D1190:112b-25: 'di lta bu nyid kyis khyad par du 'phags pa'i khyad can yin pa'o //
T02D1190:112b-26: rin chen lnga'i zhes pa ni /
T02D1190:112b-27: lnga'i sgras dbang po rnams so //
T02D1190:112b-29: dngos ni de rnams kyi rnam par 'gyur bas so //
T02D1190:112b-31: rdul phra rab dang mtshungs par bshad pa'i phyir nam mkha'i dkyil gtibs pas so //
T02D1190:112b-32: yang na gnyi ga dbyer med pa'i ye shes kyis so //
T02D1190:112b-34: yang na 'bras la sogs pa yin te /
T02D1190:112b-36: bsnun pa dang bral ba'i phyir snying po nyid kyis rnam par gzhag go //
T02D1190:112b-37: de bzhin du sgro btags pa la sogs pa'i sgrib pa dang bral ba'i phyir /
T02D1190:112b-38: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin rnams so //
T02D1190:112b-39: de lta bu gyur pa'i la sogs pa rnams kyis ni /
T02D1190:112b-40: ka bde ba zag pa med pa'i mtshan nyid kyi ye shes te /
T02D1190:112b-41: de nyid dang po gtso bo'i rgyu gang de bzhin
T02D1190:112b-42: gshegs pa rnams kyi de gnyi ga rnam par dag
T02D1190:112b-43: pa dkyil 'khor gnyi ga'i bdag nyid kyi rdo rje
T02D1190:112b-44: 'dzin pa'i ye shes yin pa'i don to //
T02D1190:112b-45: dkyil 'khor bya ba'i tshad gsungs pa //
T02D1190:112b-46: dkyil 'khor khru gsum pa ru bya //
T02D1190:112b-47: mthe bo gsum gyis lhag pa bzhi //
T02D1190:112b-48: khru gsum zhes pa ni mi bskyod pa'i rnam par dag pa'i phyir //
T02D1190:113a-0: @113a * // sor mo nyi shu rtsa bzhi la khru gang ngo //
T02D1190:113a-1: sor mo yang nas bzhi'i bdag nyid do //
T02D1190:113a-2: de ltar rnam pa gnyi ga khru gsum tshad do //
T02D1190:113a-3: mthe bong gsum gyis lhag pa ni //
T02D1190:113a-4: khru re re zhing yang sor mo gsum gsum bsnan par bya'o //
T02D1190:113a-5: mthe bo'i tshad ni bzhi zhes pa ste nas bzhi'i tshad do //
T02D1190:113a-6: yang na dkyil 'khor khru gsum zhes pa ni /
T02D1190:113a-7: gsum gyi sgras sku gsung thugs so //
T02D1190:113a-8: khru'i sgra ni lnga'i bdag nyid gnyi ga dbang po dang yul gyi dkyil 'khor yin no //
T02D1190:113a-9: dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo sems zhes bya ba'i ye shes yin te /
T02D1190:113a-10: sku gsum dang ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid yang dag pa'i ye shes su bya'o ;
T02D1190:113a-11: /'di nyid 'bras bu yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1190:113a-12: de nyid cis khyad par du 'phags she na /
T02D1190:113a-13: mthe bo gsum gyis lhag pa'o //
T02D1190:113a-14: gsum gyi sgras ni lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes 'di'i cha gsum yin te /
T02D1190:113a-15: dga' ba la sogs pa rnam par dag ba'i mthar ro //
T02D1190:113a-16: de las mthe bos lhag pa ni /
T02D1190:113a-18: de la lhag pa ni mtshan pa'o //
T02D1190:113a-19: ka bde ba'i ye shes so //
T02D1190:113a-20: de nas bzhi pa lan cig skyes pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1190:113a-21: de la dkyil 'khor du rig ma gzhug pa yin pa de gsungs pa /
T02D1190:113a-22: de ni rigs lnga las byung ba //
T02D1190:113a-23: rig ma bzang po rnam par gzhug / rig ma zhes pa ni shes rab btsun mo'o //
T02D1190:113a-24: de ni dkyil 'khor du gzhug par bya'o //
T02D1190:113a-25: bzang mo ni lha'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1190:113a-26: rigs lnga las byung ni rdo rje'i rigs la sogs pa'i rigs lnga las skyes so //
T02D1190:113a-27: yang na rigs pa zhes bya ba ni bdag med ma'o //
T02D1190:113a-28: der zhes pa ni yang dag pa'i ye shes der ro //
T02D1190:113a-29: rab tu gzhug ni rab tu gsal ba'o //
T02D1190:113a-30: gzhug ni de'i bdag nyid kyis gnas par bya'o //
T02D1190:113a-31: bzang mo zhes pa ni lha'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1190:113a-32: bsdu ba'i rang bzhin can 'ba' zhig ni ma yin te /
T02D1190:113a-33: spro ba'i rang bzhin can yang de'o //
T02D1190:113a-34: de bas na rigs lnga las byung ni rigs lnga
T02D1190:113a-35: rnams ni me long lta bu la sogs pa ye
T02D1190:113a-37: de rnams kyi byung ba ni byung ba ste /
T02D1190:113a-38: gang la spro ba de ni rigs lnga las byung ba'o //
T02D1190:113a-39: yang na ji ltar gang rnyed de //
T02D1190:113a-40: de ltar bcu drug lon pa ni /
T02D1190:113a-41: rigs lnga med na spyir ji ltar gang rnyed pa
T02D1190:113a-42: de la bya ste bzang mo ma yin pa yang
T02D1190:113b-0: ngo // @113b 'on kyang slar lo bcu drug ma bzung ste /
T02D1190:113b-1: byang chub kyi sems 'bab pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1190:113b-3: yang na zhes pa ni rdo rje 'dzin pa dang
T02D1190:113b-4: dbyer med pa'i bdag med ma rdo rje 'dzin pa'i
T02D1190:113b-5: bdag nyid kyi yang dag pa'i ye shes kyi rang
T02D1190:113b-6: bzhin can no // gang de zhes pa ni gtan la phan [*phab?] par mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1190:113b-8: gang dang gang gi rnam par rnyed pa'i ye shes so //
T02D1190:113b-9: bcu drug lon pa zhes pa ni stong pa nyid bcu drug gi rnam par dag pa ste /
T02D1190:113b-10: chu byang chub kyi sems so //
T02D1190:113b-11: de ster zhing yongs su gtong ba yin pas lo
T02D1190:113b-12: bcu drug ma ste stong pa nyid bcu drug gi
T02D1190:113b-13: rnam par dag pa byang chub kyi sems kyi rang
T02D1190:113b-14: bzhin des bdag med ma de'i bdag nyid kyis yongs
T02D1190:113b-15: su btang ba yin pas bdag chags kyi skyon yang
T02D1190:113b-16: de la med pa yin no //
T02D1190:113b-17: de yang btsun mo bsten par bya ba yin pa de gsungs pa /
T02D1190:113b-18: gang tshe khu ba ldan gyur pa //
T02D1190:113b-19: de yi tshe na bsten par bya ;
T02D1190:113b-20: / gang gi tshe de'i byang chub kyi sems 'byung
T02D1190:113b-21: bar gyur pa de'i tshe na phyag rgya de bsten
T02D1190:113b-22: par bya'o // yang de'i tshe ni phyag rgya chen po'o //
T02D1190:113b-23: bsten par bya ba ni goms par bya ba'o //
T02D1190:113b-24: gang tshe khu ba ldan gyur pa ni byang chub kyi sems so //
T02D1190:113b-25: ldan pa ni stong pa nyid dang snying rje dbyer med pa'i ye shes dang ldan par gyur pa'o //
T02D1190:113b-27: phyag rgya chen po goms par byas pa la rnam
T02D1190:113b-28: pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i stong pa
T02D1190:113b-29: nyid mngon du 'gyur pa yin no //
T02D1190:113b-30: de yang phyag rgya bsten pa las gang byang pa de'i bya ba bstan pa /
T02D1190:113b-31: phya rgya'i gdong yang bcing ba dang //
T02D1190:113b-32: thabs kyi gdong yang de bzhin no //
T02D1190:113b-33: bsten pa de las gang byung ba //
T02D1190:113b-34: slob ma'i khar ni btung ba nyid //
T02D1190:113b-35: btsun mo'i gdong dang thabs kyi gdong par mig ras bcings la bya'o //
T02D1190:113b-37: der gang byung ba ni gang byang chub kyi sems byung ba ste /
T02D1190:113b-38: slob ma'i khar btung bar bya'o //
T02D1190:113b-39: yang na phyag rgya ni bdag med mas so //
T02D1190:113b-40: gdong ni dang po stong pa'i byang chub bo //
T02D1190:113b-41: bcing ba ni brtan par bya ba'o //
T02D1190:113b-42: thabs gyi [*kyi] ni rdo rje 'dzin pa'o //
T02D1190:113b-43: gdong ni snying rje'i rang bzhin no //
T02D1190:113b-44: bcing ba ni brtan par byas pa'o //
T02D1190:113b-45: stong pa nyid dang snying rje mi g-yo bar byas pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas so //
T02D1190:114a-1: ni byang chub kyi sems sbyangs pa'o //
T02D1190:114a-2: gang byung ba ni gang byung ba'o //
T02D1190:114a-3: de slob ma'i khar ni slob ma'i dbang po rnams so //
T02D1190:114a-4: de rnams kyi kha ni yul rnams yin pas slob ma'i kha yul dang dbang po'o //
T02D1190:114a-5: der btung ba ni bsdu ba ste de dbyer med
T02D1190:114a-6: par bya ba'i don te gang byang chub kyi sems
T02D1190:114a-7: de yul dang dbang po ldog pa nyid yin pa'i
T02D1190:114a-8: don to // 'di nyid mngon par gsal bar byas pa /
T02D1190:114a-9: ro mnyam slob ma'i spyod yul nyid //
T02D1190:114a-10: de nyid la byang bar bya //
T02D1190:114a-12: de nyid la zhes pa ni goms pas so //
T02D1190:114a-13: ro mnyam ni stong pa nyid dang snying rje dbyer med pa'i byang chub kyi sems de'i ;
T02D1190:114a-14: / slob ma'i spyod yul nyid ni /
T02D1190:114a-15: 'dir dbang po rnams spyod pa yin pas spyod pa yin pas spyod yul te yul lo //
T02D1190:114a-16: slob ma ni dbang po rnams so //
T02D1190:114a-17: slob ma yang yin la spyod yul yang yin pas
T02D1190:114a-18: slob ma'i spyod yul te dbang po dang yul ro
T02D1190:114a-19: mnyam pa'o // bya bar bya ni thams cad byang
T02D1190:114a-20: chub kyi sems dang dbyer med pa yin te kun
T02D1190:114a-21: rdzob tu yang don 'di yin no //
T02D1190:114a-22: de nyid la ni phyag rgya'o //
T02D1190:114a-23: slob ma'i spyod yul ni slob ma dang nye ba'o //
T02D1190:114a-26: cir 'gyur ba yin pa gsungs pa /
T02D1190:114a-27: rang rig ye shes nyid du 'gyur //
T02D1190:114a-28: rang gzhan yang dag rig pa spangs //
T02D1190:114a-29: mkha' mnyam rdul bral stong pa nyid //
T02D1190:114a-30: dngos dang dngos med bdag nyid mchog / thabs dang shes rab shin du 'dres //
T02D1190:114a-33: de la yod pa'i rang rig pa'i bdag nyid kyis yang dag par myong bar 'gyur te /
T02D1190:114a-34: de'i phyir rang rig pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1190:114a-35: ye shes ni yang dag pa'i ye shes so //
T02D1190:114a-37: rang gzhan yang dag rig pa spangs te /
T02D1190:114a-38: bdag gzhan du rtog pa dang bral ba'o //
T02D1190:114a-39: de lta bur gyur pa brjod par mi nus pa'i phyir dpes ston to //
T02D1190:114a-40: ye shes te mkha' mnyam mo //
T02D1190:114a-41: nam mkha' dang 'dra ba ste thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1190:114a-42: de nyid kyi phyir rdul bral dri med do //
T02D1190:114a-43: de nyid kyis na stong pa ste rang bzhin dang bral bas so //
T02D1190:114a-44: de nyid kyi phyir dngos po dang dngos med bdag nyid do //
T02D1190:114a-46: dngos po med pa mya ngan las 'das pa'o //
T02D1190:114a-47: gnyi ga'i bdag nyid 'khor ba dang rnam par byang ba dbyer med pa'o //
T02D1190:114b-0: de nyid kyi @114b phyir mchog ni khyad par du 'phags pa ste /
T02D1190:114b-1: nyan thos la sogs pa'i spyod yul ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1190:114b-2: slar yang cis khyad par 'phags pa yin pa de gsungs pa /
T02D1190:114b-3: thabs dang shes rab shin tu 'dres /
T02D1190:114b-6: de dag khyad par du shin tu 'dres pas chu
T02D1190:114b-7: dang 'o ma bzhin du gnyis su med pa'i rang
T02D1190:114b-11: 'dod chags ni chags pa'i mtshan nyid do //
T02D1190:114b-12: chags bral ni de yongs su spangs pa'o //
T02D1190:114b-13: spangs pa yang chags pa nyid do //
T02D1190:114b-14: gnyi ga yang khyad par du 'phags pa'i rim pas so //
T02D1190:114b-16: 'dod chags ma yin chags bral min //
T02D1190:114b-17: dbu ma dmigs par mi 'gyur ro //
T02D1190:114b-18: rtog pa med pa ste 'di nyid lhan cig skyes
T02D1190:114b-19: pa yang dag pa'i ye shes kyi de kho na
T02D1190:114b-20: nyid yin no // yang na rang rig ni rgyu'o //
T02D1190:114b-21: ye shes 'gyur ni rtogs par 'gyur ba'o ;
T02D1190:114b-23: rang gzhan yang dag rig pa spangs //
T02D1190:114b-24: rang ni sems so gzhan ni yul dang dbang po'o //
T02D1190:114b-25: yang dag rig pa ni bde ba la sogs pa nyams su myong ba'i mtshan nyid do //
T02D1190:114b-26: yul dang dbang po dang rnam par shes pa 'di
T02D1190:114b-27: rnams kyis bskyed pa'i bde ba la sogs pa'i nyams
T02D1190:114b-28: su myong ba de spangs pa'o //
T02D1190:114b-32: de mnyam ni lha'i mig la sogs pa'i mngon shes kyi yon tan 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1190:114b-33: de yang rdul bral ste rim pa gnyis dri ma
T02D1190:114b-34: med par byas pa de stong pa de bzhin nyid
T02D1190:114b-35: kyi bdag nyid rtog pa thams cad dang rnam par
T02D1190:114b-37: de yang dngos dang dngos med bdag nyid de /
T02D1190:114b-38: dngos po'i dngos med ni dngos dang dngos med de gzod ma nas ma skyes pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1190:114b-39: de bdag nyid ni de'i rang bzhin no //
T02D1190:114b-40: de mchog ni khyad par du 'phags pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub skyed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1190:114b-41: yang na rang rig ye shes ni dga' ba tsam mo //
T02D1190:114b-42: rang gzhan yang dag rig pa spangs //
T02D1190:114b-44: rdul bral ste stong pa nyid ni rnam par dga' ba'o //
T02D1190:114b-45: dngos dang dngos med bdag nyid mchog / de ni lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'o //
T02D1190:115a-0: bzhi pa'i 'di nyid ji ltar yin @115a * //
T02D1190:115a-2: thabs dang shes rab shin tu 'dres //
T02D1190:115a-3: rdo rje 'dzin pa dang bdag med ma dbyer med pa'o //
T02D1190:115a-5: chags dang chags bral rnam par 'dres //
T02D1190:115a-6: chags pa 'od dpag med byang chub kyi sems khu ba'o //
T02D1190:115a-7: chags bral ni chags pa thams cad yongs su spangs pa lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'i bde ba'o //
T02D1190:115a-8: de dag rnam par 'dres pa ni /
T02D1190:115a-9: khyad par du 'phags pa'i tshul gyis dbyer med pa
T02D1190:115a-10: ste bde ba spangs nas de ma yin zhes bya
T02D1190:115a-12: de'i phyir thabs dang shes rab rnam pa gnyis goms pa las dga' ba la sogs pa 'byung ngo //
T02D1190:115a-13: des na yang gang bzhi pa'i don de nyid bdag med ma dbyer med pa'i rdo rje 'dzin pa'o //
T02D1190:115a-14: de ni lta ba thams cad nyid yang dag pa'i
T02D1190:115a-15: ye shes kyi nang du chud pa yin par bstan
T02D1190:115a-17: de nyid srog chags rnams kyi srog ni de nyid ni rdo rje 'dzin pa'o //
T02D1190:115a-18: srog chags rnams kyi ni skye bo rnams kyi'o //
T02D1190:115a-19: srog ni srog ste de'i nang du son pa'i phyir
T02D1190:115a-20: de ltar rlung gi de kho na nyid dang ldan
T02D1190:115a-21: pa rnams kyang de kho na nyid yang dag pa'i
T02D1190:115a-22: ye shes grub pa yin no //
T02D1190:115a-23: yang na de nyid ni rdo rje 'dzin pa'o //
T02D1190:115a-24: srog chags rnams kyi srog ni sems so //
T02D1190:115a-25: 'di rnams yod pas srog chags de n'a da'o //
T02D1190:115a-26: srog 'di rnams kyi n'a da dang 'brel pa yang sems so //
T02D1190:115a-27: n'a da yang rlung bcu'i bdag nyid do //
T02D1190:115a-28: de yang dbang po dang yul rnams de'i rang bzhin rdo rje 'dzin pa sku gsung thugs te /
T02D1190:115a-29: de ltar rdo rje gsum dbyer med pa nyid rdo rje 'dzin pa'o //
T02D1190:115a-30: de nyid 'di'i 'gro ba'i bdag / ces pa ni rdul dang mun pa dang /
T02D1190:115a-31: snying stobs rnams cha mnyam pa'i gnas skabs kyi rang bzhin yin te /
T02D1190:115a-32: rang bzhin smra ba rnams kyi rang bzhin gyi 'gyur ba'o //
T02D1190:115a-33: 'gro ba zhes pa ni 'gro ba'i rang bzhin yang thams cad rdo rje 'dzin pa yin no //
T02D1190:115a-35: brtan pa dang g-yo ba gcig pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02D1190:115a-36: 'gro bdag nyid ces pa la 'gro ba ni gzugs
T02D1190:115a-37: la sogs pa'i phung po dang khams la sogs pa
T02D1190:115a-38: rnams kyi 'gyur pa ste phung po dang khams kyi
T02D1190:115a-40: de nyid thams cad khyab pa'o //
T02D1190:115b-0: de nyid 'di ni 'gro @115b ba'i bdag nyid dang
T02D1190:115b-1: thams cad khyab pa nyid kyang bcom ldan 'das yin
T02D1190:115b-2: no // 'gro ba thams cad khyab 'jug bdag /
T02D1190:115b-3: ces pa ni khyab 'jug gi lto ba la brten
T02D1190:115b-4: no // pa rnams so // de nyid kyi phyir /
T02D1190:115b-5: thams cad lus la rnam par gnas /
T02D1190:115b-6: lus kun rnams la rnam par gnas te thams cad kyi lus la rnam par gnas pa'o //
T02D1190:115b-8: ye shes chen po lus la gnas //
T02D1190:115b-9: rtog pa thams cad rnam par spangs //
T02D1190:115b-10: dngos po kun la khyab pa ste /
T02D1190:115b-11: lus gnas lus las skyes pa min //
T02D1190:115b-13: dngos dang dngos med de las byung //
T02D1190:115b-14: gzhan dang gang dang de rnams dang /
T02D1190:115b-16: dngos med ni mya ngan las 'das pa'o //
T02D1190:115b-17: gnyi ga yang de las byung zhing de las skyes pa'o //
T02D1190:115b-18: kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i bden pa gnyis dbyer med pa'i phyir rdo rje 'dzin pa'o //
T02D1190:115b-19: yang na dngos ni thabs te rdo rje 'dzin pa'o //
T02D1190:115b-20: dngos med ni mya ngan las 'das pa ste bdag med ma'o //
T02D1190:115b-21: de gnyi ga yang de las byung ba ste de las skyes pa nyid do //
T02D1190:115b-22: gzhan rnams gang rnams de rnams dang ni gzhan rnams
T02D1190:115b-23: ni 'di thams cad sems dang dbyer med pa'i phyir
T02D1190:115b-24: gzhan rnams te dbang po drug rnams so //
T02D1190:115b-25: gang rnams de rnams ni zhes pa ni /
T02D1190:115b-27: de rnams zhes pa ni brtan pa ste /
T02D1190:115b-28: gang rnams de rnams brtan dang g-yo //
T02D1190:115b-30: de'i phyir thabs dang shes rab dag de nas dbang po drug rnams dang /
T02D1190:115b-31: de nas brtan pa dang g-yo ba rtogs pa'i phyir
T02D1190:115b-32: thams cad yang dag pa'i ye shes kyi nang du
T02D1190:115b-35: sems can dang ni rnam shes tshul //
T02D1190:115b-36: skyes bu sngon rabs dbang phyug dang //
T02D1190:115b-37: bdag dang gso ba thams cad dang //
T02D1190:115b-38: dus dang gang zag nyid dang ni //
T02D1190:115b-39: zhes pa la sems can zhes pa ni rig byed smra ba rnams kyi ste /
T02D1190:115b-40: skye pa dag dang bral ba'i phyir de rtag pa'i ye shes yin no //
T02D1190:115b-41: de yang de la rag las pa nyid yin no //
T02D1190:115b-42: rnam shes tshul zhes pa ni rnam par shes par
T02D1190:115b-43: smra ba rnams te rnal 'byor spyod pa rnams kyi'o
T02D1190:115b-44: // de yang de la rag las pa yin no //
T02D1190:115b-45: skyes bu zhes pa ni rdul dang /
T02D1190:115b-47: snying stobs rnams cha mnyam pa'i gnas skabs ni rang
T02D1190:115b-48: bzhin te rang bzhin mchog gi skyes bu yin no
T02D1190:116a-0: // gang gi lta ba de yang @116a * //
T02D1190:116a-1: de'i nang du 'dus pa nyid yin no //
T02D1190:116a-2: sngon rabs zhes pa ni rig byed pa rnams kyi'o //
T02D1190:116a-3: dbang phyug ces pa ni dbang phyug byed pa por 'dod pa rnams kyi'o //
T02D1190:116a-4: bdag ces pa ni tshangs pa ye shes dang ldan
T02D1190:116a-5: pa rtag pa gcig pu'i mnga' bdag yin pa gang
T02D1190:116a-6: gi lta ba'o // gso ba zhes pa ni dngos
T02D1190:116a-7: po thams cad sems dang ldan par 'dod pa gang
T02D1190:116a-9: thams cad ces pa ni rgyal po'i bstan bcos su shes par bya'o //
T02D1190:116a-10: dus zhes pa ni dus byed pa por 'dod pa rnams kyi ste /
T02D1190:116a-11: dus kyis smin par gyur pa rnams //
T02D1190:116a-12: dus kyis skye dgu sdud par byed //
T02D1190:116a-14: gang zag ni nyan thos kyi'o //
T02D1190:116a-15: 'dis ni lta ba sna tshogs la rnam par gnas
T02D1190:116a-16: pa rnams kyi gang dang gang gi lta ba'i ye
T02D1190:116a-17: shes de thams cad nyi tshe ba ste /
T02D1190:116a-18: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi ye shes su thams cad nyid 'dus pa yin no //
T02D1190:116a-19: dper na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po la mkhar
T02D1190:116a-20: gyi rgyal phran la sogs pa thams cad nyid zhabs
T02D1190:116a-22: de bzhin du ye shes thams cad nyid yang dag
T02D1190:116a-23: pa'i ye shes der lhun gyis grub pa nyid kyis
T02D1190:116a-24: rnam par gnas pa yin no //
T02D1190:116a-25: ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par
T02D1190:116a-26: sbyin pa la sogs pa rang nyid mngon du 'gyur
T02D1190:116a-27: ro // de bzhin du 'dir yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa grub na cis mi 'grub /
T02D1190:116a-28: des na gzhan thams cad rdo rje 'dzin pa'i ye shes can du grub pa yin no //
T02D1190:116a-29: 'on kyang 'di goms pa las yin te /
T02D1190:116a-30: goms pa ma byas na thar pa thob pa ma yin no //
T02D1190:116a-31: yang na sems can zhes pa'i ni srid gsum dbyer med pa'i ye shes so //
T02D1190:116a-32: rnam shes tshul zhes pa ni ye shes khyad par du 'phags pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02D1190:116a-33: skyes bu zhes pa ni rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rang bzhin gyi ma ning ngo //
T02D1190:116a-34: sngon rabs ni thog ma dang tha ma mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1190:116a-35: dbang phyug ces pa ni rang nyid 'phrog po rang nyid byed //
T02D1190:116a-36: ces pas bdag nyid gtso bor gyur pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1190:116a-37: bdag ces pa ni pha rol na gzhan ci yang med pa'o //
T02D1190:116a-38: de med pa las bdag kyang med pa yin no //
T02D1190:116a-39: gso ba zhes pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa yin pa'i phyir rtogs pa'i rnam pa'o //
T02D1190:116a-40: thams cad dang zhes pa ni skye 'jig dang bral ba'i phyir rtag pa ma yin pa'o //
T02D1190:116b-0: dus zhes pa ni rang bzhin med pa'i @116b rang bzhin can no //
T02D1190:116b-1: gang zag ces pa ni sprul pa'i bdag nyid kyi chos kyi sku'o //
T02D1190:116b-2: thams cad bsdu ba gsungs pa /
T02D1190:116b-3: dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin 'di /
T02D1190:116b-4: sgyu ma'i gzugs kyis yang dag gnas //
T02D1190:116b-5: de nyid kyi phyir dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin
T02D1190:116b-6: ni rang bzhin gyi srog rnam par shes pas rlung
T02D1190:116b-7: gi de kho na nyid dang ldan pa'i rang bzhin
T02D1190:116b-8: no // 'di ji ltar yin pa de gsungs pa /
T02D1190:116b-9: ji ltar sgyu ma'i rang bzhin ltar ro //
T02D1190:116b-10: ji ltar sgyu ma bden pa yang ma yin brdzun
T02D1190:116b-11: pa yang ma yin par kun gyi rang bzhin no
T02D1190:116b-12: / de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de yang bden
T02D1190:116b-13: pa dang mi bden pa dang rtag pa la sogs
T02D1190:116b-14: pa rnam par bcad nas 'das pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1190:116b-15: kun la khyab pas kun gyi rang bzhin no //
T02D1190:116b-16: yang na gnas zhes pa ni yang dag pa'i rim
T02D1190:116b-17: pas mi g-yo ba'i de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes
T02D1190:116b-18: kyi phyir g-yo ba med pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02D1190:116b-19: de ltar rang rig las ni ye shes 'gyur //
T02D1190:116b-20: zhes bya ba la sogs pa /
T02D1190:116b-21: chags dang chags bral rnam par 'dres //
T02D1190:116b-22: zhes pa'i mthar gyis gang gsungs pa de nyid du
T02D1190:116b-23: thams cad khongs su 'dus par bstan nas de nyid
T02D1190:116b-25: dang po dga' ba tsam nyid de //
T02D1190:116b-26: gnyis pa'i grangs las mchog dga' bshad ni de nyid thabs dang shes rab kyi rang bzhin no //
T02D1190:116b-27: gsum pa la ni rnam dgar bshad //
T02D1190:116b-28: rdo rje gsum gyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1190:116b-29: bzhi pa lhan cig skyes par brjod //
T02D1190:116b-30: ces pa ni lhan cig tu skyes pas ni lhan cig skyes pa ste /
T02D1190:116b-31: sku gsung thugs dbyer med pa nyid yin pa de nyid bzhin pa'o //
T02D1190:116b-32: 'dis ci bstan na dang po 'ba' zhig gnyis su med pa'i ye shes tsam mo //
T02D1190:116b-33: de nyid mchog dga' ste thabs dang shes rab kyi rang bzhin no //
T02D1190:116b-34: grangs ni gnyis pa'i grangs las so //
T02D1190:116b-35: gsum pa la ni rnam dgar bshad ni gsum po rnams rdzogs pa'o //
T02D1190:116b-36: de nyid gang las she na /
T02D1190:116b-37: rnam dgar bshad ces pa ste gang las gnyi ga
T02D1190:116b-38: snyoms par 'jug pas khyad par du 'phags pa dga'
T02D1190:116b-39: ba'o // bzhi pa ni bzhi po rnams rdzogs pa'o //
T02D1190:116b-41: lhan cig gcig tu skyes pa ste dbyer med pa'i rang bzhin du bskyed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1190:116b-42: de yang bshad pa ni ye shes kho na ste
T02D1190:116b-43: shing dang por ba la sogs pa bzhin du ni
T02D1190:117a-1: dang gnyis dang gsum ni rdo rje gsum dbyer med pa'i lhan cig skyes pa'o //
T02D1190:117a-2: dga' ba gsum las log pa'i bzhi pa med pa nyid de /
T02D1190:117a-3: 'di ni brtags pa tsam yin no //
T02D1190:117a-4: rdo rje snying po la sogs kun //
T02D1190:117a-5: mkhas pas de skad nges thos nas //
T02D1190:117a-6: mchog tu ngo mtshar gyur nas ni //
T02D1190:117a-7: brgyal zhing sa la 'gyel bar gyur //
T02D1190:117a-8: dang po'i dga' ba 'gro ba'i gzugs //
T02D1190:117a-9: de bzhin mchog dga' 'gro ba nyid //
T02D1190:117a-10: dga' bral dga' ba'ang 'gro ba nyid //
T02D1190:117a-11: gsum la lhan cig skyes pa med //
T02D1190:117a-14: dga' ba nyid kyis dga' ba ni bzhi yin par sngar bstan pa'o //
T02D1190:117a-15: da ni dga' ba gsum po rnams dbyer med pa
T02D1190:117a-16: gang las dga' ba gsum yang 'gro ba'i gzugs nyid
T02D1190:117a-17: kyis mtshungs so // gsum la ni dga' ba gsum rnams la'o //
T02D1190:117a-18: lhan cig skyes pa yod pa ma yin no //
T02D1190:117a-19: thams cad nyid mkhas pas ni rtogs pa la gnas pa'i rdo rje snying po la sogs pa'o //
T02D1190:117a-21: the tshom nyid kyis mchog tu ngo mtshar bar gyur ba ni /
T02D1190:117a-22: phan tshun du mi bzad pa rtogs nas de the tshom gyi yid du gyur te /
T02D1190:117a-23: brgyal ba ni gti mug par gyur pa'o //
T02D1190:117a-25: yang na sems te de cis khyad 'phags she na /
T02D1190:117a-27: thabs dang shes rab kyi rang bzhin dbyer med pa khu ba dang bde ba'i rang bzhin de'o //
T02D1190:117a-28: gang gi tshe thos nas ni 'dzag nas don rtogs
T02D1190:117a-29: tsam gyis gnyi ga yang thos par bya ba'i phyir
T02D1190:117a-30: nyid kyis 'di skad ba dag gis thos pa yin
T02D1190:117a-31: no // yang dag par sbyor ba'i rgyud las //
T02D1190:117a-32: 'dzag pa ni thos pa yin pa'i don rtogs pa yin par bcom ldan 'das kyi bkas so //
T02D1190:117a-33: lung yin pa'i phyir nges par bstan pas rtags kyi
T02D1190:117a-34: tshig la sogs pa thams cad nges pa med pa
T02D1190:117a-35: nyid do // gang las 'dzag pa de gsungs pa /
T02D1190:117a-36: rdo rje snying po las te /
T02D1190:117a-38: sa bzhi ni btsun mo'i chos 'byung gi padma'i nang du'o //
T02D1190:117a-39: de'i tshe nges pa ni nges pa'o ;
T02D1190:117a-40: / thams cad nyid mkhas pas te /
T02D1190:117a-41: shes pa dang shes bya nyid kyi rtogs par rab
T02D1190:117a-42: tu 'jug pas na mkhas pa ste gzugs la sogs
T02D1190:117a-44: 'gyel ba ni lhan cig skyes pa yang dag par thim pa'o //
T02D1190:117a-45: 'ang gi sgra ni yang gi don te gang gi
T02D1190:117a-46: tshe slar 'di rnam par shes pa rdo rje snying
T02D1190:117b-0: po la @117b sogs nas lha mo'i padma'i nang nyid
T02D1190:117b-1: du 'gyur ro // rdo rje'i lte ba nyid de'i tshe mkhas pa'o //
T02D1190:117b-2: thams cad nyid mchog tu ngo mtshar du gyur nas ni mchog ni mchog dga'o //
T02D1190:117b-3: ngo mtshar ni sngar med pa nyams su myong bas rang gi yul las yid thug pa med pa'o //
T02D1190:117b-5: 'dis ni dbang po rnams bde bar nyams su myong bas yul las ldog pa'o //
T02D1190:117b-6: brgyal ba ni rnam par dga' ba na gti mug par 'gyur ba'o //
T02D1190:117b-7: gti mug par 'gyur ba yang ji ltar rnam par shes pa yod de //
T02D1190:117b-8: 'on kyang byed pa ci yang med do //
T02D1190:117b-9: de bzhin du dbang po rnams kyang 'dod chags pas
T02D1190:117b-10: rang gi chags pa las rnam par grol bar 'gyur
T02D1190:117b-12: dang po'i dga' ba 'gro ba'i gzugs //
T02D1190:117b-13: 'gro ba zhes pa ni ye shes lnga dang sku gsum mo //
T02D1190:117b-14: 'gro ba'i gzugs ni de'i rang bzhin no //
T02D1190:117b-15: dang po gnyis su med pa'o //
T02D1190:117b-16: dga' ba zhes pa ni bde ba nyams su myong ba'i mtshan nyid do //
T02D1190:117b-17: de bzhin mchog dga' 'gro ba nyid //
T02D1190:117b-18: 'on kyang de las lhag par nyams su myong ba yod pa yin no //
T02D1190:117b-19: dga' bral dga' ba'ang 'gro ba nyid //
T02D1190:117b-20: de las lhag par nyams su myong ba yod pa'o //
T02D1190:117b-21: gsum la yang ni dga' ba gsum las lhan cig skyes pa yod pa yin no //
T02D1190:117b-22: 'on kyang med pa ni rtag pa dang mi rtag
T02D1190:117b-23: pa dang bde ba dang mi bde ba dang bden
T02D1190:117b-24: pa dang mi bden par mi dmigs pa'i rang bzhin
T02D1190:117b-25: yin pa'i phyir / lhan cig skyes pa'i 'gro ba'i gzugs nyid do //
T02D1190:117b-26: khu ba dang bde ba dag ldog pa med pa'i rgyu yin te /
T02D1190:117b-27: rgyu mtshan 'dis na bcom ldan 'das lha mo'i padma'i nang du thim pa yin no //
T02D1190:117b-29: kye rdo rje ste gang las bden pa gnyis kyi bdag nyid do //
T02D1190:117b-30: sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gcig pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbyer med pa'i sku'o //
T02D1190:117b-31: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /
T02D1190:117b-33: kun du snang ba brjod pa yang dag par rig
T02D1190:117b-34: pa ye shes lnga'i sku nyid kyis brjod pa'i bdag
T02D1190:117b-35: nyid yin pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das so //
T02D1190:117b-37: rdo rje snying pos rtogs bya'i phyir //
T02D1190:117b-38: the tshom legs par sel ba ni //
T02D1190:117b-39: gsum la lhan cig skyes pa med //
T02D1190:117b-40: ces pa gang 'dis rdo rje snying po la sogs
T02D1190:117b-41: pa the tshom du gyur pa'i the tshom de bsal
T02D1190:118a-2: / rdo rje snying pos rtogs bya'i phyir ni rtogs par bya ba'i phyir te /
T02D1190:118a-3: rdo rje snying po nyid mngon par rdzogs par sangs
T02D1190:118a-4: rgyas pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nyid kyang
T02D1190:118a-5: mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par 'gyur ba'o //
T02D1190:118a-7: 'dod chags med cing chags bral med //
T02D1190:118a-8: dbu ma dmigs par mi 'gyur ro //
T02D1190:118a-9: gsum po spangs pa nyid kyi phyir //
T02D1190:118a-10: lhan cig skyes pa byang chub brjod //
T02D1190:118a-11: gsum ni dga' ba la sogs pa rnams so //
T02D1190:118a-12: spangs pa'i phyir na yongs su spangs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1190:118a-13: thams cad ni chags pa can yin la /
T02D1190:118a-14: lhan cig skyes pa ni slar chags pa med pa'i mtshan nyid yin pas gsum po rnams spangs pa'o //
T02D1190:118a-15: 'dis ni lhan cig skyes pa byang chub brjod do //
T02D1190:118a-16: de ni bcom ldan kye'i rdo rje ste stong pa nyid dang snying rje dbyer med pa'o //
T02D1190:118a-17: de nyid kyi phyir sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gcig
T02D1190:118a-18: pa ni sangs rgyas kun ni gnyis med du rtogs
T02D1190:118a-19: pa'o ; / sku ni chags pa dang bral ba'o //
T02D1190:118a-20: rdo rje snying po ni gnyis su med pa'i sku'o //
T02D1190:118a-21: the tshom sel ba ni rtog pa spangs pa'i rnam par mi rtog pa'i rang bzhin nyid do //
T02D1190:118a-22: legs par ni lha'i bdag nyid do //
T02D1190:118a-23: rtogs bya'i phyir ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thob par bya ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1190:118a-25: / dus gsum du chos ston par mdzad pa yin no zhes pa'o //
T02D1190:118a-27: 'dod chags med cing ste chags pa'i mtshan nyid do //
T02D1190:118a-28: chags bral med ni de yongs su spangs pa'o //
T02D1190:118a-29: 'di gnyi gar yang gnyis med par ma rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1190:118a-30: dbu ma de yang mi dmigs te /
T02D1190:118a-31: mi dmigs pa'i phyir mi dmigs pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1190:118a-32: de nyid kyi phyir gsum po spangs pa'o //
T02D1190:118a-33: chags pa dang chags pa med pa dag chags pa
T02D1190:118a-34: nyid kyis gnyi ga las 'das pa'i phyir mo gsham
T02D1190:118a-36: 'dis ni gsum po yongs su spangs pa gang de
T02D1190:118a-37: nyid lhan cig skyes pa yang dag pa'i byang chub
T02D1190:118a-38: ste yang dag pa'i byang chub kyi ye shes yin
T02D1190:118a-39: no // yang na chags med ni 'khor ba med pa'o //
T02D1190:118a-40: chags bral med ni mya ngan las 'das pa ma yin pa ste /
T02D1190:118a-41: gang 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa ma yin pa'o //
T02D1190:118a-42: de ni dbu ma'i rtse zhes brjod do //
T02D1190:118b-0: de yang dmigs par mi 'gyur ni mi @118b dmigs pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1190:118b-2: gsum po spangs pa ni nye bar mi dmigs pa'o //
T02D1190:118b-3: rgyu 'di nyid kyi phyir lhan cig skyes pa nyid
T02D1190:118b-4: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ces brjod do
T02D1190:118b-5: // yang na 'dod chags med ni mchog dga' ma yin pa'o //
T02D1190:118b-6: chags bral med ni rnam par dga' ba ma yin pa'o //
T02D1190:118b-8: dga' ba tsam zhes pa'i tshig gis na dbu ma yin no //
T02D1190:118b-9: de thams cad mi dmigs pa ste gsum pos slar
T02D1190:118b-10: lhan cig skyes pa'i yang dag pa'i byang chub kyi
T02D1190:118b-11: rang bzhin gyi rtog pa spangs pa nyid yin te
T02D1190:118b-12: / 'byin pa'i dkyil 'khor nyid yin par dgongs so //
T02D1190:118b-14: yang na de nyid thams cad bdag / yang na kun gyis rnam par spangs //

T02D1190:119a-3: dga' ba gsum po rnam par spangs //

T02D1190:119b-0: dkyil 'khor de dang por @119b bsgom pa na sprin
T02D1190:119b-1: dang 'dra ba ni ji ltar sprin pa nam mkha'i

T02D1190:119b-4: de bzhin du dkyil 'khor yang phan tshun du lha
T02D1190:119b-5: nyid 'dus nas dmigs pa med par so sor snang

T02D1190:119b-9: de bzhin du dkyil 'khor yang bden pa yang ma

T02D1190:120a-0: dngos grub mtshan nyid dbyer med @120a * //

T02D1190:120a-5: dbyer med pa'i rgyu'i mtshan nyid kyi dngos grub po //
T02D1190:120a-6: phyag rgya ni phyag rgya chen po'o //
T02D1190:120a-7: de dang lhan cig rnal 'byor pa 'dus pa gang la yod pa des ni nges par 'grub po //
T02D1190:120a-8: yang na phyag rgya yang yin la rnal 'byor yang
T02D1190:120a-9: yin pas phyag rgya rnal 'byor pa ste bdag med

T02D1190:120a-13: kun du kun nas kyi rnam pas grub pa ni grub pa'o //
T02D1190:120a-14: dbyer med pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid ni dbyer med pa'i mtshan nyid do //
T02D1190:120a-15: ji ltar sprin dang sgyu ma dang rmi lam la

T02D1190:120a-34: bum pa brgyad la sogs par ldan //

T02D1190:120a-36: mgrin pa gos kyis bkab pa dang //

T02D1190:120a-46: // gzi brjid chen po ni thams cad stong pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1190:120a-47: dra ba dra ba phyed pas brgyan pa ni ji
T02D1190:120b-0: ltar rin chen mu @120b tig la sogs pa skud

T02D1190:120b-17: me tog sna tshogs nye bar mdzes //

T02D1190:121a-0: @121a * // de nyid kyi rtse mo ni gang gi gtso bo rnams yin pa de'o //
T02D1190:121a-1: 'dis ni spro ba'i rang bzhin nyid kyis de yin no //
T02D1190:121a-3: mgrin pa gos kyis dkris pa ste /
T02D1190:121a-4: sgrib pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir kun rdzob kyi bden pa des dkris pa'o //
T02D1190:121a-5: mgrin pa ni mgrin pa longs spyod kyi 'khor lo

T02D1190:121a-9: rnam par rgyal ba'i bum par rin chen sna lnga yongs su blugs nas shar gyi sgor gzhag go //

T02D1190:121a-12: 'di rnams yongs su gzhug pa ni mdor bsdus pa ste /
T02D1190:121a-13: gang du yang dag pa'i ye shes de rin chen lnga yongs su bcug pa'o //
T02D1190:121a-15: rnam par rgyal ba'i sgras mkha' rnam mkha'i khams so //

T02D1190:121a-17: der 'gro zhing thob par byed pas na rnam par rgyal ba'o //

T02D1190:121a-21: dkyil 'khor gyi thig gdab pa'i phyir thig gsungs pa /
T02D1190:121a-22: sar pa legs par bkal ba dang //
T02D1190:121a-23: shin tu tshad ma mdzes pa yi //
T02D1190:121a-24: srad bus shes rab can gyis gdab //
T02D1190:121a-25: rang 'dod lha yi gzugs kyis ni //
T02D1190:121a-26: zhes pa smos te sar pa zhes pa ni las gzhan la ma spyad pa'o //
T02D1190:121a-27: legs par bkal ba ni legs par bkal ba'o /
T02D1190:121a-28: shin tu tshad ma ni dkyil 'khor gyi nyis 'gyur gyi ring tshad do //
T02D1190:121a-29: mdzes pa zhes pa ni grims pa'o //
T02D1190:121a-30: de lta bur gyur pa'i thig skud kyis dkyil 'khor gyi thig gdab par bya'o //
T02D1190:121a-31: shes rab can ni bdag med ma dang 'brel pa'o /
T02D1190:121a-32: rang 'dod lha'i gzugs kyis ni gang gi gang 'dod pa'i lha'o //
T02D1190:121a-33: de'i gzugs ni rnal 'byor pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1190:121a-34: yang na gsar pa zhes pa ni sngon med pa ste /

T02D1190:121a-36: 'dis ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa yin no //
T02D1190:121a-37: legs par bkal pa ni legs pa ni khu ba'o //
T02D1190:121a-38: de nges par bkal bas te rnal 'byor du gyur pas so //
T02D1190:121b-0: shin tu tshad ma ni lung ste ston pa'i bka' drin las @121b khong du chud pa'o //
T02D1190:121b-2: srad bus ni rnam par shes pa'i rgyud kyis so //
T02D1190:121b-3: gdab pa ni rgyud pas 'brel par bya'o //
T02D1190:121b-4: shes rab can zhes pa ni rnam pa brgyud mas

T02D1190:121b-10: de'i gzugs ni rang bzhin te de rnams kyi rang bzhin rtogs pa'i phyir /
T02D1190:121b-11: gzugs la sogs pa'i phung po lnga rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin du rtogs pa'i don to //
T02D1190:121b-12: rdul tshon dgye pa dang dkyil 'khor gyi thig gdab
T02D1190:121b-13: pa'i dang por 'khor lo'i bdag po'i bzlas pa 'bum

T02D1190:121b-15: bzlas pa 'bum ni sngags 'bum bzlas pa'o //
T02D1190:121b-16: dkyil 'khor ba yi de bzhin khri //

T02D1190:121b-18: gshegs pa gzhan rnams kyi re re zhing yang stong

T02D1190:121b-21: 'bum ni mtshon pa'i mtshan ma bzlas pa a'a li

T02D1190:121b-23: dang shes rab dbyer med pa nyid kyi rdo rje

T02D1190:121b-27: bu la sogs pa'i ye shes lnga dang sku gsum
T02D1190:121b-28: gyi bdag nyid spro ba'i tshul gyis rnam par gnas
T02D1190:121b-29: so // dbyer med pas gcig gi tshig go //

T02D1190:124b-44: ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid kyi phyir rdo rje 'dzin
T02D1190:125a-1: mthong bya med ni thams cad snang ba med par gyur pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1190:125a-2: bsgom pa zhes pa ni 'byung ba ste /
T02D1190:125a-3: skye ba'i bya ba bkag pa'o //
T02D1190:125a-4: sgom pa po yang med ni gyur pa yin pas
T02D1190:125a-5: na sgom pa po ste de yang med pa yin
T02D1190:125a-6: no // chos thams cad dang po nas ma skyes pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1190:125a-7: skyes pa dang skye ba gnyis ka yang bkag pa yin no //
T02D1190:125a-8: yang na bsgom dang sgom pa po dang /
T02D1190:125a-9: bsgom pa ni yul dang dbang po'i dngos po'o //
T02D1190:125a-10: sgom pa po ni sems so //
T02D1190:125a-11: de gsum ka yang med de rdo rje gsum dbyer med pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1190:125a-12: de nyid kyi phyir bshes dang dgra med ni bshes zhes pa ni sems te de med pa'o //
T02D1190:125a-13: dgra zhes pa ni dgra rnams te de dang 'dra
T02D1190:125a-14: bas na gang yang yul dang dbang po de rnams
T02D1190:125a-15: kyang med do // ji ltar zhe na /
T02D1190:125a-16: rdo rje gsum dbyer med pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1190:125a-17: yang na bshes ni mdza' ba'o //
T02D1190:125a-19: dge ba dang mi dge ba yang med pa'i don to //
T02D1190:125a-21: ji ltar chu la chu bzhag na /
T02D1190:125a-22: de snyed chu ru ro mnyam 'gyur //
T02D1190:125a-23: skyon dang yon tan rnam ldan sems //
T02D1190:125a-24: rmongs pa gnyen po cung zad med //
T02D1190:125a-26: 'di thams cad ji ltar yin pa de gsungs pa /
T02D1190:125a-27: rlom sems med pa'i lhan cig skyes pa sna tshogs nyid //
T02D1190:125a-28: rlabs dang 'dra bas rba rlabs te rnam par rtog pa'o //
T02D1190:125a-29: de las byung ba gang la lhan cig skyes par
T02D1190:125a-30: bshad de rnam par rtog pa thams cad las 'das
T02D1190:125a-31: pa'i phyir de lhan cig skyes pa'o //
T02D1190:125a-32: de nyid kyi phyir sna tshogs ni gzugs sna tshogs
T02D1190:125a-33: te thams cad nyid de'i bdag nyid kyis de'i khongs
T02D1190:125a-34: su 'dus pa yin par dgongs so //
T02D1190:125a-35: rdo rje'i snying pos 'di skad gsol //
T02D1190:125a-36: gzod nas rang bzhin med pa'o //
T02D1190:125a-37: lus kyi rang bzhin dag pa ni //
T02D1190:125a-38: ci slad 'byung ba'i bdag nyid lags //
T02D1190:125a-39: rdo rje snying po zhes pa ni rdo rje'i snying
T02D1190:125a-40: po ste mi phyed pa'i sku yin pa'i phyir ro
T02D1190:125a-41: // gsol ba ni zhu ba ste /
T02D1190:125a-42: rdo rje 'dzin pa la zhugs pa'o //
T02D1190:125a-43: rgyu ci'i slad du zhe na /
T02D1190:125a-44: gang gi phyir mchog dga' bsgom pa dang sgom pa
T02D1190:125a-45: po la sogs pa rnams bkag pa de'i phyir the
T02D1190:125a-47: lus kyi ni lus lhan cig skyes pa yin pa'i tha tshig go //
T02D1190:125a-48: rang bzhin ni rang bzhin las ji lta ba bzhin gyi yang dag pa nyid do //
T02D1190:125a-49: dag pa ni rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa'o //
T02D1190:125b-0: de nyid kyi phyir gzod nas ni dang po nyid @125b nas sa //
T02D1190:125b-1: rang bzhin med pa ni yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin ma yin pa ste /
T02D1190:125b-3: ce slad 'byung ba'i bdag nyid lags ni ji ltar
T02D1190:125b-4: 'byung ba chen po lnga'i bdag nyid yin zhes pa'o
T02D1190:125b-5: // de la bcom ldan rdo rje can /
T02D1190:125b-6: mkha' 'gro bde ba sbyin pas gsungs //
T02D1190:125b-7: rlom sems med pa'i rang bzhin bdag / thams cad lus la rnam par gnas //
T02D1190:125b-8: de la zhes pa ni rdo rje snying po'i rtog pa'o //
T02D1190:125b-9: bcom ldan rdo rje can ni rdo rje'i 'dzin pa'o //
T02D1190:125b-10: gsungs pa ni bka' stsal pa'o //
T02D1190:125b-12: mkha' 'gro ni bdag med ma la sogs pa rnams so //
T02D1190:125b-13: bde ba ni ye shes so //
T02D1190:125b-14: sbyin pa ni bde ba sbyin pa'o //
T02D1190:125b-15: rlom sems med pa'i rang bzhin bdag ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02D1190:125b-16: bdag ni lus te gang la de yod pa de ni rlom sems med pa'i rang bzhin bdag go //
T02D1190:125b-18: thams cad lus la rnam par gnas ni brtan pa
T02D1190:125b-19: dang g-yo ba la sogs pa'i dngos po mtha' dag
T02D1190:125b-21: khyad du 'phags pa'i tshul gyis aa ba ste /
T02D1190:125b-23: ba rdo rje 'dzin pa yin pas aa ba'o //
T02D1190:125b-24: rim pa 'dis na brtan pa dang g-yo ba yin no //
T02D1190:125b-25: ci'i slad du 'byung ba chen po'i phung po lags
T02D1190:125b-26: zhes pa yin pa de gsungs pa kho la ka
T02D1190:125b-28: / sa ni de la skye bar 'gyur //
T02D1190:125b-29: de la ni lhan cig skyes pa las sa'i khams skyes ba'o //
T02D1190:125b-32: rdo rje dang padma snyoms par 'jug pa yin pa zhes dgongs so //
T02D1190:125b-33: slar dang po reg par 'dod pa ste /
T02D1190:125b-34: reg pas sra ba'i chos kyis ni //
T02D1190:125b-35: zhes pa'i tshig gis te sa yang sra ba'i rang bzhin du rtogs pa'i phyir /
T02D1190:125b-36: sa'i khams de la dga' ba'i rang bzhin gyis lhan cig skyes pa las skye'o //
T02D1190:125b-37: byang sems khu ba'i rnam pa las //
T02D1190:125b-38: chu yi khams su yang ni 'gyur //
T02D1190:125b-39: lhan cig skyes pa de las ni byang chub kyi sems 'byung ste /
T02D1190:125b-40: khu ba skye zhing de yang khu ba'i tshul nyid kyi phyir chu'i khams so //
T02D1190:125b-42: bskyod pa las ni me yin te /
T02D1190:125b-43: rdo rje padma bskyod pa las me'i khams skye'o //
T02D1190:125b-44: 'gro ba rlung du rab tu grags /
T02D1190:125b-45: g-yo ba'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir rlung gi khams su bstan to //
T02D1190:125b-46: bde ba yang ni nam mkha'i khams //
T02D1190:126a-1: khams bde ba'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1190:126a-2: 'dis ni lnga pa rnams kyi sa ni sa la sogs pa 'byung ba chen po lnga rnams so //
T02D1190:126a-3: yongs su bskor ni thams cad la khyab pa de'i lhan cig skyes pa'o //
T02D1190:126a-4: 'dis ni phan pa'i mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir 'byung
T02D1190:126a-5: ba chen po'i bdag nyid kyi lus lhan cig skyes
T02D1190:126a-7: de'i phyir 'dod chags dang rnam par chags pa 'dres
T02D1190:126a-8: par gyur pa chu la chu bzhag pa lta bu'i
T02D1190:126a-9: bdag med ma'i byang chub kyi sems thabs dang shes
T02D1190:126a-10: rab dbyer med pa'i bden pa gnyis kyi bdag nyid
T02D1190:126a-11: ye shes lnga dang sku gsum gyi rang bzhin rnam
T02D1190:126a-12: pa thams cad mkhyen pa mngon par byang chub pa'i
T02D1190:126a-13: rgyu yin te / rdo rje snying po'i the tshom bcom ldan 'das kyis bsal ba yin no //
T02D1190:126a-14: yang na mchog dga' rdo rje 'dzin pa dang bdag
T02D1190:126a-15: med ma'i ye shes bsgom pa dang sgom pa po
T02D1190:126a-16: la sogs pa rnams mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1190:126a-18: dgyes pa'i rdo rje zhes pa ni bdag med ma
T02D1190:126a-19: dang dbyer med pa'i rdo rje 'dzin pa'i ye shes
T02D1190:126a-20: su bstan to // yang dag pa'i bdag nyid ni
T02D1190:126a-21: yang dag pa de nyid phyin ci ma log pa'i
T02D1190:126a-22: bdag nyid kyi rang bzhin gang de ni 'byung ba'i
T02D1190:126a-23: bdag nyid kyi ye shes so //
T02D1190:126a-25: rang bzhin gyis te yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin no //
T02D1190:126a-26: lus dag ni lus ni sku gsum ste ma ning du bstan pa'o //
T02D1190:126a-27: gang gzod nas ni dang po nyid nas so //
T02D1190:126a-28: rang bzhin med pa ni med ni bdag med ma'o //
T02D1190:126a-30: bzhin ni gnyis ka'i gnyis kyi bdag nyid do //
T02D1190:126a-31: de lta bur gyur pa'i bde ba'i ye shes so //
T02D1190:126a-32: de la zhes pa ni de ltar rnam par gnas pa'o //
T02D1190:126a-33: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa ni /
T02D1190:126a-34: yi ge aa dang yi ge ha'i rang bzhin no //
T02D1190:126a-35: dbang phyug la sogs pa'i yon tan ma lus pa dang ldan pas so //
T02D1190:126a-36: rdo rje can ni mi phyed pa'i ye shes kyi sku'o //
T02D1190:126a-38: mkha' 'gro ma ni bdag med ma la sogs pa'i bde ba'i ye shes so //
T02D1190:126a-40: de nyid kyi phyir de rnams kyang ye shes de'i
T02D1190:126a-41: rang bzhin nyid kyis de'i nang du thim pa yin
T02D1190:126a-42: pa'i don to // de nyid kyi phyir /
T02D1190:126a-43: rlom sems med pa'i rang bzhin can ni rtog pa thams cad dang rnam par rtog pa spangs pa'o //
T02D1190:126a-44: thams cad lus ni brtan pa dang g-yo ba'i lus
T02D1190:126b-0: la rnam @126b par gnas pa khyab pa yin pas
T02D1190:126b-1: mi g-yo ba'o // de lta bur gyur pa nyid rdo rje 'dzin pa'o //
T02D1190:126b-3: sa skye ba ni de nyid bdag med ma'i rang bzhin du bskyod pa'o //
T02D1190:126b-5: rdo rje padma mnyam sbyor las /
T02D1190:126b-6: gnyi ga dbyer med pa'i don to //
T02D1190:126b-7: 'dis ni bskyed pa'i rim pa bstan pa yin no //
T02D1190:126b-8: de nyid byang chub sems ni stong pa nyid dang
T02D1190:126b-9: snying rje dbyer med pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi
T02D1190:126b-10: rang bzhin no // khu ba'i rnam pa ni mer mer po'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1190:126b-12: chu'i khams te rdo rje 'dzin pa'o //
T02D1190:126b-13: skye bar 'gyur ni yang dag par 'byung bas na skye ba ste /
T02D1190:126b-14: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin te /
T02D1190:126b-15: 'dis ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa bstan to //
T02D1190:126b-16: bskyod pa las ni me yin te //
T02D1190:126b-17: zhes pa ni thabs dang shes rab dag las rtag tu'o //
T02D1190:126b-18: me ni gnyi ga yang rang bzhin pa'o //
T02D1190:126b-20: de nas yang 'gro bas ni rtog pa las so //
T02D1190:126b-22: grags ni gsal ba rab tu gsal ba'o //
T02D1190:126b-23: bde ba ni bde ba'i ye shes de'i dngos po'i bde ba'o //
T02D1190:126b-24: nam mkha'i khams ni 'od gsal chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin yin pa'i don to //
T02D1190:126b-25: de nyid kyi phyir lnga po rnams kyis ni me long la sogs pa'i ye shes lngas so //
T02D1190:126b-26: yongs su ni kun nas so //
T02D1190:126b-28: / bde ba yang ni nam mkha'i khams //
T02D1190:126b-29: zhes pa ni bde ba nam mkha'i khams yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1190:126b-30: de yang de kho na nyid ma yin par gsungs pa /
T02D1190:126b-31: de'i phyir bde ba de nyid min //
T02D1190:126b-32: 'byung ba chen po'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir bde
T02D1190:126b-33: ba de ni bde ba yang dag par rig pa
T02D1190:126b-34: yang de kho na nyid ma yin no //
T02D1190:126b-35: 'o na ci'i phyir de lhan cig skyes pa yin zhe na /
T02D1190:126b-37: lhan cig skyes pas gang skyes pa /
T02D1190:126b-38: lhan cig skyes par de brjod bya //
T02D1190:126b-39: lhan cig skyes pa dag ces pa ni khu ba dang bde ba dag go //
T02D1190:126b-41: de lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin yang dag pa'i
T02D1190:126b-42: bden pa mthong bas yang dag pa'i ye shes zhes
T02D1190:126b-43: brjod do // de nyid mngon par gsal bar byas pa /
T02D1190:126b-44: rang bzhin lhan cig skyes zhes brjod //
T02D1190:126b-45: rnam pa thams cad bde mchog gcig / rang gi dngos po ni rang bzhin te /
T02D1190:126b-46: bdag nyid yang dag par rig pa lhan cig skyes pa zhes brjod do //
T02D1190:127a-1: cad bde mchog gcig ni gnyis su med pa'i tshul gyis bsdu ba yin no //
T02D1190:127a-2: yang na rang gi sems dang yul dang dbang po'i
T02D1190:127a-3: dngos po dag 'di gsum gyi rang bzhin ni ma
T02D1190:127a-4: ning lhan cig skyes pa zhes bstan to //
T02D1190:127a-5: thams cad ni rdo rje 'dzin pa'o //
T02D1190:127a-7: de ltar thams cad gnyi ga'i bya ba byed pa rnam pa thams cad do //
T02D1190:127a-8: de yang gcig ni gnyis su med pa'o //
T02D1190:127a-9: de ltar na rnam pa thams cad gcig go //
T02D1190:127a-10: de ltar bur gyur pa'i ye shes bde ba ni ye shes te rnam pa thams cad sdom pa'o //
T02D1190:127a-11: 'di nyid mchog ni dam pa ste /
T02D1190:127a-12: rdo rje 'dzin pa dang bdag med ma gnyi ga
T02D1190:127a-13: yang gnyis su med par byed pa 'di 'dra ba'i
T02D1190:127a-14: ye shes dam pa de 'di nyid lhan cig skyes
T02D1190:127a-15: pa yang dag pa'i ye shes so //
T02D1190:127a-16: bde bar nyams su myong ba'i ye shes su ni kha cig 'dod do //
T02D1190:127a-17: de yang nyen thos dang mu stegs pa rnams kyi yin no //
T02D1190:127a-19: phyag rgya rgyu dang bral ba las ;
T02D1190:127a-21: rnal 'byor ba zhes pa ni thabs dang shes rab
T02D1190:127a-22: dbyer med pa'i bden pa gnyis kyi bdag nyid ci
T02D1190:127a-24: snying rje thabs ni snying rje nyid kyi thabs gang
T02D1190:127a-25: la yod pa de ni snying rje thabs te gzhan
T02D1190:127a-26: gyi don gyi spyod pa la 'jug pa yin no
T02D1190:127a-27: // phyag rgya zhes pa ni shes rab po //
T02D1190:127a-28: rgyu dang bral ba las ni mtshan ma med pa'i
T02D1190:127a-29: spyod par rnam par gnas pa yin par dgongs so
T02D1190:127a-30: // 'dis ni thabs dang shes rab kyi bdag nyid
T02D1190:127a-31: kyi rnal 'byor par gyur pas bskyed pa'i rim pa
T02D1190:127a-34: rnal 'byor snying rje thabs su gyur ni snying rje
T02D1190:127a-35: zhes pa ni snying rjes sdug bsngal dang sdug bsngal
T02D1190:127a-36: gyi rgyu las bsgral bar 'dod pas so //
T02D1190:127a-37: de nyid thabs kyis rgyu las bsgral bar 'dod pas so //
T02D1190:127a-38: de nyid thabs kyis rgyu gang la yod pa de ni rnal 'byor pa snying rje thabs so //
T02D1190:127a-39: phyag rgya 'gyur ni phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub thob pa'o //
T02D1190:127a-41: rgyu dang bral ba las mtshan ma med pa'i spyod pas rnam par gnas pa'o //
T02D1190:127a-43: de lta bur gyur pa'i dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i rnal
T02D1190:127a-44: 'byor pa sems can thams cad grol bar byed pa
T02D1190:127a-45: sems can zhes bya bar gyur pa med par byed
T02D1190:127a-46: pa 'di lta bu nyid 'di ni thabs la mkhas
T02D1190:127b-1: / thabs la mkhas pa 'di yang dgyes pa'i rdo
T02D1190:127b-2: rje'i rnal 'byor pa kho na las gzhan dang gzhan
T02D1190:127b-4: rdzogs pa'i rim pas bsdu ba gsungs pa /
T02D1190:127b-5: stong nyid snying rje dbyer med pa //
T02D1190:127b-6: byang chub sems zhes rab tu bstan //
T02D1190:127b-7: stong pa nyid ni de bzhin nyid do //
T02D1190:127b-9: stong pa nyid dang snying rje gnyi ga dbyer med
T02D1190:127b-10: pa gang stong pa nyid de nyid snying rje la
T02D1190:127b-11: gang snying rje nyid stong pa nyid do //
T02D1190:127b-12: gang bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa /
T02D1190:127b-13: sems nyid de bzhin nyid la de bzhin nyid sems
T02D1190:127b-14: yin pa 'di ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su
T02D1190:127b-15: byar med pa dbyer med la gcad du med pa'o
T02D1190:127b-16: // de nyid byang chub kyi sems rnam par mi
T02D1190:127b-17: rtog pa nyid kyi ye shes yin par bshad do
T02D1190:127b-18: // // dran pa brjed ngas med pa'i rnal 'byor
T02D1190:127b-19: la gnas shing bla ma dam pa'i zhabs la gnas
T02D1190:127b-20: // // pa'i don te / lhan cig skyes pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1190:127b-21: sngags kyi bzlas med dka' thub med dang sbyin sreg med //
T02D1190:127b-22: dkyil 'khor ba yang med cing dkyil 'khor yang ni med //
T02D1190:127b-23: de ni sngags bzlas de dka' thub dang de sbyin sreg //
T02D1190:127b-24: de ni dkyil 'khor ba dang de ni dkyil 'khor nyid //
T02D1190:127b-25: mdor bsdus nas ni sems ni 'dus pa'i tshul can no //
T02D1190:127b-26: de kho na nyid shes pas sngags kyi bzlas pa mi bya'o //
T02D1190:127b-29: dkyil 'khor pa'i lha'i tshul gyis bsgom par mi bya'o //
T02D1190:127b-30: dkyil 'khor yang ma lus pa bsgom par mi bya'o //
T02D1190:127b-32: gang gi phyir de nyid de ni sngags kyi bzlas pa'o //
T02D1190:127b-34: de nyid dkyil 'khor ba'i lha'i tshul lo //
T02D1190:127b-36: mdor bsdus pa ni mdor bsdus pa ste bsdu ba'o //
T02D1190:127b-37: dbyer med pa'i sems ni 'dus pa'i tshul can no zhes pa ni 'dus pa ni tshogs pa'o //
T02D1190:127b-38: sems kyang de la 'das pa yang yin pas sems ni 'dus pa'o //
T02D1190:127b-39: de nyid tshul ni rang bzhin no //
T02D1190:127b-40: de 'di la yod pas sems ni 'dus pa'i gzugs can no //
T02D1190:127b-41: chos rnams thams cad ni sems kyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir dgyes pa'i rdo rje yin no //
T02D1190:127b-42: de skad du yang 'phags pa klu grub kyi zhal snga nas /
T02D1190:127b-43: mos pa sna tshogs pa yi phyir //
T02D1190:127b-44: lha yi dmigs pa so so ste //
T02D1190:127b-45: thugs kyi rdo rje rnam grol nas //
T02D1190:127b-46: lha gzhan med par mngon par brjod //
T02D1190:128a-2: yang na sems ni 'dus pa'i gzugs can no //
T02D1190:128a-3: sems nyid 'dus pa'i tshul 'di la yod pas so //
T02D1190:128a-4: sngags kyi bzlas med ces pa 'dis ni gsung rdo rje dbyer med pa'o //
T02D1190:128a-5: dka' thub med ces pa 'dis ni sku rdo rje'i bya ba dbyer med pa'o //
T02D1190:128a-6: sbyin sreg med ces pa ni thugs rdo rje dbyer med pa'o //
T02D1190:128a-7: dkyil 'khor ba yang med ces pa ni thabs dbyer med pa'o //
T02D1190:128a-8: dkyil 'khor yang ni med ces pa 'dis ni shes rab dbyer med pa'o //
T02D1190:128a-11: mtha' dag dbyer med pa nyid de 'phags pa yin pas mdor bsdu ba'o //
T02D1190:128a-12: gang sems ni 'dus pa'i tshul can ni /
T02D1190:128a-13: sems 'dus pa ni sems 'dus pa ste sems kyang de'i nang du thim pa yin no //
T02D1190:128a-14: de lta bu'i tshul 'di rdo rje 'dzin pa la yod pas sems ni 'dus pa'i gzugs can no //
T02D1190:128a-15: gang sems de 'dus pa'i tshul can de ni rang
T02D1190:128a-16: 'byung zhing sems las 'das pa de nyid thabs dang
T02D1190:128a-17: shes rab kyi rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor dang dkyil
T02D1190:128a-18: 'khor nyid kyis de nyid gnyi ga snyoms par zhugs
