T02D1190:160b-23: zhes pa'i the tshom za ba med par 'grub ste /
T02D1190:160b-24: rim pa gnyis dbyer med pas grangs med pa'i rigs rnams te /
T02D1190:160b-25: mchog tu dga' ba'i rigs las byung ba rnams zhes
T02D1190:160b-26: pa 'dis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsal bar mdzad do
T02D1190:160b-27: // dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i mkha' 'gro ma dra ba'i
T02D1190:160b-28: bde mchog las dngos grub gtan la dbab pa zhes
T02D1190:160b-29: bya ba'i rim par phye ba ste gnyis pa'o //
T02D1190:160b-30: dgyes pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1190:160b-31: rdo rje 'dzin pa dang bdag med ma dbyer med pa'o //
T02D1190:160b-32: mkha' 'gro ma dra ba'i mchog las zhes pa la
T02D1190:160b-33: mkha' 'gro ma dra ba'i sgra ni bdag med ma
T02D1190:160b-35: bde mchog gi sgra ni rdo rje 'dzin pa'o //
T02D1190:160b-36: 'di ltar bdag med ma dang dbyer med pa'i rdo
T02D1190:160b-37: rje 'dzin pa'i ye shes gnyis po gnyi ga dbyer
T02D1190:160b-38: med par rtogs nas des gdon mi za bar 'gyur
T02D1190:160b-39: ro // dngos grub ni dngos po gtan la dbab pa'o //
T02D1190:160b-40: de lta bur gyur pas rim par phye ba ste sbas pa'i don rab tu gsal bar byed pa'o //
T02D1190:160b-41: gnyis ni gnyis pa rdzogs pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02D1190:160b-42: yang na gnyis su med par gnyis med rtogs pa'i
T02D1190:160b-43: rang bzhin gnyi ga dbyer med pa'i phyir zhes pa'i
T02D1190:160b-44: don to // dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i rnam par bshad
T02D1190:160b-45: pa rab tu gsal ba'i kha sbyor gyi rgya cher
T02D1190:160b-46: 'grel ba las brtag pa gnyis pa'i le'u gnyis pa'o
T02D1190:161a-1: la phab pas the tshom med par gyur par gnas
T02D1190:161a-2: pa las sa brgyad pa la 'jug pa thug par
T02D1190:161a-3: bdud kyi ris sems can 'jug pa sa brgya la
T02D1190:161a-4: bstan pa'i don bskyud par 'gyur ba'i dogs pa bcom
T02D1190:161a-6: rgyud thams cad kyi gleng gzhi'i thabs rnal 'byor ma rnams la gsungs pa yin no //
T02D1190:161a-8: de nas rdo rje can gyis rnal 'byor ma rnams
T02D1190:161a-9: la rgyud thams cad kyi gleng gzhi zhes bya ba'i
T02D1190:161a-11: rgyud thams cad kyi sgra ni ye shes dang rnam
T02D1190:161a-12: shes la sogs pa'i nus mthu ma lus pa yang
T02D1190:161a-13: dag par rdzogs par byang chub pa la thug pa
T02D1190:161a-15: de'i gleng gzhi ni dang po'i rgyu'o //
T02D1190:161a-16: de nas zhes bya ba ni rjes thogs su bar ma chad pa'o //
T02D1190:161a-17: rdo rje can zhes pa ni mi phyed pa'i sku'o zhes bya ba ni 'di ni brda tsam mo //
T02D1190:161a-18: ngag gi spyod yul las 'das pa nyid de ni rdo rje can zhes brjod do //
T02D1190:161a-19: de yang thabs ni rdo rje 'dzin pa'i ye shes so //
T02D1190:161a-20: de gang rnams kyi zhe na /
T02D1190:161a-22: bdag med ma la sogs pa rnams kyi yin pa
T02D1190:161a-23: rnal 'byor ma'i ye shes dang dbyer med pa'i phyir
T02D1190:161a-24: rdo rje 'dzin pa'i ye shes so //
T02D1190:161a-25: bka' stsal pa zhes pa ni brjod du med pa
T02D1190:161a-26: nyid kyi chos ston cing 'chad pa la bka' stsal
T02D1190:161a-27: pa'o // gang 'phags pa'i zhal snga nas gsungs pa /
T02D1190:161a-28: gang gis brjod du med pa'i chos //
T02D1190:161a-29: thugs rje'i tshig gis bstan pa yin //
T02D1190:161a-30: thugs rjes rjod par byed pa'i tshig gis brjod pas gsungs zhes pa'o //
T02D1190:161a-31: de nyid rgyud thams cad kyi gleng gzhi'i thabs gsungs pa /
T02D1190:161a-32: sdom pa dang ni dbang dang yang //
T02D1190:161a-33: de bzhin dgongs pas bshad pa dang //
T02D1190:161a-34: dga' dang skad cig dbye ba dang //
T02D1190:161a-35: gzhan yang bza' ba la sogs pa //
T02D1190:161a-36: zhes bya ba 'di ni mdor bstan pa'o //
T02D1190:161a-37: 'di'i rnam par bshad pa gsungs pa /
T02D1190:161a-38: de la sdom pa bka' stsal pa /
T02D1190:161a-39: re zhig sdom pa gsungs pa'o //
T02D1190:161a-40: sangs rgyas kun gyi sdom pa ni //
T02D1190:161a-41: ae wam rnam par rab tu gnas //
T02D1190:161a-42: rang rig bde ba chen po ni //
T02D1190:161a-43: de yang dbang las shes par bya //
T02D1190:161a-44: sdom pa'i sgra ni rim par phye ba dang po mdor bstan pa'i rgyas par bshad pa'o //
T02D1190:161b-0: yang sangs rgyas kun gyi sdom pa ni bsdu @161b ba'o ;
T02D1190:161b-1: / rab tu gnas ni re re zhing gnas pa'o //
T02D1190:161b-4: thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa'i ye shes su'o //
T02D1190:161b-5: yang na sangs rgyas kun ni phung po dang khams dang skye mched la sogs pa rnams kyi'o //
T02D1190:161b-6: ae wam rnam pa ni thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med par rtogs pa yod pa'o //
T02D1190:161b-7: sdom pa ni rdo rje 'dzin pa'i ye shes so //
T02D1190:161b-8: rab tu gnas ni so so zhing yang rnam par gnas pa'o //
T02D1190:161b-9: 'dis ni thabs dang shes rab dbyer med par rtogs
T02D1190:161b-10: pa zhes bya ba spro ba dang bsdu ba'i tshul
T02D1190:161b-11: bden pa gnyis kyi bdag nyid kyi ye shes yin
T02D1190:161b-12: no // ae wam ma y'a zhes bya ba la
T02D1190:161b-13: sogs pa rim par phye ba dang por mdor bstan
T02D1190:161b-14: pa'i ae wam nyid kyi gleng gzhi'i tshig yin par
T02D1190:161b-15: no // bstan to // de nyid sdom pa ji ltar shes pa yin par gsungs pa /
T02D1190:161b-16: dbang las ni dbang bskur ba'i rim par phye bar mdor bstan pa'i rgyas par bshad pa'o //
T02D1190:161b-17: shes par bya ni rtogs par bya ba'o //
T02D1190:161b-19: de'i sdom pa ni ma ning ngo //
T02D1190:161b-20: rang rig bde ba chen po ni zhes pa yang dag pa'i ye shes so //
T02D1190:161b-22: ae wam rnam par gnas pa'o //
T02D1190:161b-23: de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' la /
T02D1190:161b-24: rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
T02D1190:161b-25: de nas zhes pa ni rjes thogs su'o //
T02D1190:161b-26: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes pa ni //
T02D1190:161b-27: rdo rje gsum dbyer med pa'o //
T02D1190:161b-28: bcom ldan 'das zhes pa ni dbang phyug la sogs pa ma lus pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1190:161b-29: rnal 'byor mas zhes pa ni bdag med ma la sogs pa gnyis su med pa'o //
T02D1190:161b-30: 'di skad ces gsol to zhes pa ni 'chad par 'gyur ba gsol ba'o //
T02D1190:161b-31: sangs rgyas kun gyi sdom pa ni //
T02D1190:161b-32: ae wam yi ger rab tu gnas //
T02D1190:161b-33: zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs nas /
T02D1190:161b-34: bcom ldan ston pa 'gro ba'i bla //
T02D1190:161b-35: mkha' 'gro ma yi sdom pa nyid //
T02D1190:161b-36: ae wam rnam pa ci zhes brjod //
T02D1190:161b-37: rim pa ji ltar bshad du gsol //
T02D1190:161b-38: gal te re zhig sangs rgyas kun gyi sdom pa
T02D1190:161b-39: ae wam yin pa de zhin du mkha' 'gro rnams
T02D1190:161b-40: kyi sdom pa yang ae wam rnam pa ma ning
T02D1190:161b-41: yin no // de nyid ae wam rnam pa ci zhes brjod //
T02D1190:161b-42: de bcom ldan ston pa zhes pa ni ston pa'o //
T02D1190:162a-0: @162a * // de nyid kyi phyir 'gro ba'i bla ma'o //
T02D1190:162a-1: bshad du gso ni bstan cing brjod par bshad du gsol lo //
T02D1190:162a-2: rim pa ji ltar ni yongs su brgyud pa'o //
T02D1190:162a-3: de la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T02D1190:162a-4: ae yi cha byad bzang po gang //
T02D1190:162a-5: dbus su wam gis rnam par brgyan //
T02D1190:162a-6: bde ba thams cad kyi ni gnas //
T02D1190:162a-7: sangs rgyas rin chen za ma tog / yi ge
T02D1190:162a-8: ae yi cha byad ni ae yi cha byad do
T02D1190:162a-9: // bzang po gang zhes pa ni lha'i gnas so //
T02D1190:162a-11: dbus su ste de'i nang du'o //
T02D1190:162a-12: wam gyis rnam par brgyan ni byang chub kyi sems kyis yang dag par brgyan pa'o //
T02D1190:162a-13: de nyid kyi phyir bde ba thams cad kyi ste ma lus pa'i ye shes rnams kyi'o //
T02D1190:162a-16: sangs rgyas rin chen ni rdo rje 'dzin pa'o //
T02D1190:162a-17: za ma tog ni sgrom bu'o //
T02D1190:162a-18: yang na ae yi cha byad ni gang bdag med ma'i rang bzhin de'o //
T02D1190:162a-19: bzang po zhes pa ni lha thams cad kyi rang bzhin no //
T02D1190:162a-20: dbus su zhes pa ni de'i tshogs su byed pa nyid do //
T02D1190:162a-21: wam gyis rnam par brgyan ni stong pa nyid dang
T02D1190:162a-22: snying rje dbyer med pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi
T02D1190:162a-23: rang bzhin no // bde ba thams cad kyi ni gnas //
T02D1190:162a-24: zhes pa ni de sku gsum gyi rang bzhin yin no //
T02D1190:162a-25: sangs rgyas rin chen za ma tog / ces pa ni /
T02D1190:162a-26: thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa ye shes lnga
T02D1190:162a-27: dang sku gsum gyi bdag nyid gnyis su med pa
T02D1190:162a-28: bzhi pa lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin rdo rje
T02D1190:162a-29: 'dzin pa'i ye shes yin pa'i don to //
T02D1190:162a-30: rang rig de yang dbang las shes par bya zhes gang bstan pa de 'dis bstan pa yin no //
T02D1190:162a-31: bde ba chen po ni zhes pa ni /
T02D1190:162a-32: gang yang de bstan pa yin no //
T02D1190:162a-33: skad cig dbye bas phye ba nyid //
T02D1190:162a-34: dga' ba de las skye bar 'gyur //
T02D1190:162a-35: skad cig shes nas bde shes pa //
T02D1190:162a-36: ae wam rnam par rab tu gnas //
T02D1190:162a-38: ae wam gyi rnam pa de nyid la'o //
T02D1190:162a-41: skad cig dbye bas phye ba nyid yod pa'o //
T02D1190:162a-42: skad cig ni yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1190:162a-43: bde ba ni bde ba nyams su myong ba'o //
T02D1190:162a-44: de nyid ces pa ni yang dag pa'i ye shes so //
T02D1190:162a-45: 'dis ni bde ba chen po ae wam gyi rnam
T02D1190:162b-0: par rab tu gnas @162b pa skad cig dbye ba
T02D1190:162b-1: las dga' ba la sogs pa bzhir dbye ste /
T02D1190:162b-2: skad cig ma bzhi yang bde ba bzhi rtogs pas so //
T02D1190:162b-3: 'dis ni stong pa nyid bcu drug rnam par dag
T02D1190:162b-4: pa'i ye shes yang dag pa'i shes pa ae wam
T02D1190:162b-5: gyi rnam pa'i rang bzhin nyid yin te don dam
T02D1190:162b-6: par na yang bye brag cung zad kyang yod pa
T02D1190:162b-7: ma yin no // dga' ba bzhi ni gzhan dag tu bstan pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1190:162b-8: skad cig ma bzhi gsungs pa /
T02D1190:162b-9: sna tshogs dang ni rnam smin dang //
T02D1190:162b-10: rnam nyid de bzhin mtshan nyid bral //
T02D1190:162b-11: skad cig bzhi ni rab shes pa //
T02D1190:162b-14: gnyis su med par rtogs par gnas shing shes pa'o //
T02D1190:162b-15: de ltar zhes pa ni thabs dang shes rab kyi rang bzhin no //
T02D1190:162b-20: skad cig bzhi ste rnam pa sna tshogs la sogs pa'i skad cig ma bzhi'o //
T02D1190:162b-21: yang na skad cig bzhi ni bzhi pa'i skad cig
T02D1190:162b-22: ma lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba der shes nas
T02D1190:162b-24: rnam pa sna tshogs la sogs pa'i don gsungs pa /
T02D1190:162b-25: sna tshogs rnam pa sna tshogs brjod //
T02D1190:162b-27: rnam par smin pa de las bzlog / bde ba'i ye shes za ba'o //
T02D1190:162b-28: rnam par nyed pa dpyod par brjod //
T02D1190:162b-29: bdag gi bde ba spyad do zhes //
T02D1190:162b-30: mtshan nyid bral ba gsum las gzhan //
T02D1190:162b-31: chags dang chags dral rnam par spangs //
T02D1190:162b-32: sna tshogs dang po dga' ba nyid //
T02D1190:162b-33: rnam smin la ni mchog dga' nyid //
T02D1190:162b-34: rnam nyed dga' ba dga' bral nyid //
T02D1190:162b-35: lhan cig skyes dga' mtshan nyid bral //
T02D1190:162b-36: dga' ba ni chags pa sna tshogs pa 'byung ngo //
T02D1190:162b-38: bde ba 'dus te gcig tu nyams su myong ba ni mchog tu dga' ba'o //
T02D1190:162b-39: bdag gis bde ba nyams su myong ngo zhes sems dang sems med pa ni rnam par dga' ba'o //
T02D1190:162b-40: mtshan gzhi dang mtshan nyid dang mtshon pa rnams mi
T02D1190:162b-41: dmigs pa'i ye shes ni lhan cig skyes pa'i dga'
T02D1190:162b-42: ba'o // sna tshogs rnam pa sna tshogs brjod //
T02D1190:162b-43: ces bya ba la sogs pa nas /
T02D1190:162b-44: lhan cig skyes dga' mtshan nyid bral //
T02D1190:163a-0: zhes pa'i bar gyi tshigs su bcad pa gsum gyis gang gsungs pa de'i don ni 'di @163a * //
T02D1190:163a-2: dga' ba la sogs pa bzhi nyid do //
T02D1190:163a-4: slob dpon gsang ba shes rab dang //
T02D1190:163a-5: de ltar de bzhin bzhi pa yang //
T02D1190:163a-6: dbang ni bzhi yi grangs kyis ni //
T02D1190:163a-7: dga' ba la sogs rim shes bya //
T02D1190:163a-8: slob dpon gyi sgras ni rdo rje'o //
T02D1190:163a-9: gsang ba'i sgras ni chos 'byung ste gnyi ga dbyer med pa'i rdo rje gsum dbyer med pa'o //
T02D1190:163a-10: shes rab ni rnam par dga' ba'o //
T02D1190:163a-11: bzhi pa ni gang lhan cig skyes pa'o //
T02D1190:163a-12: de yang de bzhin no zhes pa ni sngar gyi bzhin no zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1190:163a-13: dgod pa dag pa slob dpon nyid //
T02D1190:163a-14: lta ba gsang ba de bzhin no //
T02D1190:163a-15: lag bcangs la ni shes rab nyid //
T02D1190:163a-16: de yang gnyis gnyis sprad pa'i rgyud //
T02D1190:163a-17: dgod pa dag la zhes pa ni //
T02D1190:163a-18: bya ba dang spyod pa dang rnal 'byor dang /
T02D1190:163a-19: rnal 'byor bla na med pa dang /
T02D1190:163a-21: bya ba dang spyod pa'i rgyud ni dgod pa zhes brjod do //
T02D1190:163a-22: rnal 'byor gyi rgyud ni lta ba zhes brjod do //
T02D1190:163a-23: rnal 'byor bla na med pa ni lag pa bcangs so //
T02D1190:163a-24: rnal 'byor gong na med pa ni gnyis gnyis sprad pa'i rgyud do //
T02D1190:163a-25: rgyud ni rnam pa bzhi yis kyang //
T02D1190:163a-26: dgongs pa'i skad kyi sgra yis min //
T02D1190:163a-28: 'dis ni rnam pa sna tshogs kyi skad cig gi rang bzhin /
T02D1190:163a-29: dga' ba'i ngo bo nyid slob dpon nyid du brjod pa'i dgod pa'i sgras gtan la phab pa /
T02D1190:163a-30: bya ba dang spyod pa'i rgyud kyi rnam par dag
T02D1190:163a-31: pa'i skad cig ma bzhi'i rang bzhin rnam pa sna
T02D1190:163a-33: de ltar rnam par smin pa'i rang bzhin mchog tu
T02D1190:163a-34: dga' ba'i ngo bo gsal ba'i dbang du brjod pa'i
T02D1190:163a-35: lta ba'i sgras gtan la phab pa rnal 'byor gyi
T02D1190:163a-36: rgyud kyi rnam par dag pa skad cig ma bzhi'i
T02D1190:163a-37: rang bzhin dga' ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D1190:163a-38: de ltar rnam par nyed pa'i rang bzhin dga' bral
T02D1190:163a-39: gyi ngo bo shes rab tu mngon par brjod pa'i
T02D1190:163a-40: lag pa bcangs pa'i sgras gtan la phab pa /
T02D1190:163a-41: rnal 'byor bla na med pa'i rgyud kyi rnam par
T02D1190:163a-42: dag pa skad cig ma bzhi slob dpon la sogs
T02D1190:163a-43: pa'o // de ltar mtshan nyid dang bral ba'i rang
T02D1190:163a-44: bzhin lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'i ngo bo de'i
T02D1190:163a-45: sgrar mngon par brjod pa'i gnyis gnyis sprad pa'i rgyud
T02D1190:163a-46: kyi rnam par dag pa skad cig ma bzhi'i rang
T02D1190:163a-47: bzhin dgod pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1190:163b-0: de ltar bzhi bzhis stong pa @163b nyid bcu drug gi rang bzhin nyid yin no //
T02D1190:163b-1: de ltar thams cad bzhi bzhi'o //
T02D1190:163b-2: zhes mdor bstan pa'i don rgyas par bshad pa'o //
T02D1190:163b-3: yang na dgod pa'i sgras ni rab tu gsal ba'i rang bzhin rnam par shes pa tsam mo //
T02D1190:163b-5: 'di de zhes 'byed pa'i rang bzhin du rab tu 'jug par gyur pa'i rnam par shes pa'o //
T02D1190:163b-6: lag pa bcangs pa'i sgra ni /
T02D1190:163b-7: lnga po gnyis kyi bdag nyid yul dang dbang po
T02D1190:163b-8: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i mngon par zhen pas bde
T02D1190:163b-9: ba la sogs par nyams su myong ba'i mtshan nyid
T02D1190:163b-11: gnyis gnyis sprad pa'i rgyud kyi sgras ni thabs dang
T02D1190:163b-12: shes rab dbyer med pa'i sku gsum dang ye shes
T02D1190:163b-13: lnga'i bdag nyid bde ba la sogs pa yal bar
T02D1190:163b-14: dor ba'i rang bzhin 'od gsal gyi ye shes gang
T02D1190:163b-15: de lhan cig skyes pa yin no //
T02D1190:163b-16: 'dir yang dga' ba la sogs pas rim par bshad pa de nyid gsungs pa /
T02D1190:163b-17: sems can rnams kyi dngos grub phyir //
T02D1190:163b-18: dbang ni rnam pa bzhin ru bshad //
T02D1190:163b-19: dbang gi don nyid gsungs pa //
T02D1190:163b-20: gtor dang bkrus pa zhes bya 'dis //
T02D1190:163b-21: des na dbang zhes brjod par bya //
T02D1190:163b-22: bkrus pa zhes pa ni dri ma med par byed pa ste /
T02D1190:163b-23: rim pa gnyis rnam par dag pa'i gnyi ga rnam
T02D1190:163b-24: par dag pa des glo bur pa'i dri ma bsal
T02D1190:163b-25: nas shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos kyi dbyings
T02D1190:163b-26: kyi rang bzhin skyes par byed pa dbang gi don
T02D1190:163b-27: to // dbang rnam pa bzhi nyid gsungs pa /
T02D1190:163b-28: shes rab bcu drug lon pa la //
T02D1190:163b-29: lag pa gnyis kyis yang dag 'khyud //
T02D1190:163b-30: rdo rje dril bu mnyam sbyor ba //
T02D1190:163b-31: slob dpon dbang du rab tu bshad //
T02D1190:163b-32: bla ma'i rim pa las yod pas don ni go sla ba nyid do //
T02D1190:163b-33: yang na lag pa gnyis zhes pa ni yul dang dbang po gnyis kyis so //
T02D1190:163b-34: yang dag 'khyud ces pa ni dbyer med par byas pa'o //
T02D1190:163b-35: shes rab ces pa ni gnyi ga dbyer med pa'i ye shes so //
T02D1190:163b-36: nges zhes pa ni nges pa'i don to //

T02D1190:167a-20: dam tshig gang gis gnas par bgyi //
T02D1190:167a-21: gal te dam tshig ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams
T02D1190:167a-22: cad 'dus pa yin la dam tshig de'i dam tshig
T02D1190:167a-23: gi rgyus gnas pa yin na gnas pa dmigs par
T02D1190:167a-24: 'gyur ro // gal te sdom pa ni bsdu ba
T02D1190:167a-25: bdag med mas zin pas yul la sogs pa rnam
T02D1190:167a-27: de bzhin du yang sdom pa de'i sdom pa'i rgyus
T02D1190:167a-28: kyang gnas pa yin na gnas pa dmigs par 'gyur
T02D1190:167a-29: ro // de cis gnas pa med pa'i rnal 'byor la gnas pa yin zhes pa'o //
T02D1190:167a-30: yang na dam tshig gang gis ji 'dra ba'i lha'i rnal 'byor gyis so //
T02D1190:167a-31: sdom pa gang gis zhes pa ni /
T02D1190:167a-32: ji 'dra bar lha spro ba dang bsdu ba'o //
T02D1190:167a-33: gnas par bgyi ni zhus pa'o //
T02D1190:167a-34: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T02D1190:167a-35: khyod kyis srog chags gsad pa dang //
T02D1190:167a-36: brdzun gyi tshig kyang smra bar bya //
T02D1190:167a-38: rgyun ma chad par bya ba la rab tu 'jug pa'o //
T02D1190:167a-39: khyod kyis ma byin par yang long //
T02D1190:167a-40: gzhan gyi bud med bsten par gyis //
T02D1190:167a-41: zhes pa 'di ni sdom pa ste bslab pa'o //
T02D1190:167a-42: yang na sam ni yang dag pa'o //
T02D1190:167b-1: 'di nyid gal te sgra ji bzhin pa de'i tshe
T02D1190:167b-2: bkag pa'i mi dge ba'i nyes pa la spyod par
T02D1190:167b-3: 'gyur ro // de'i phyir srog gcod pa la sogs
T02D1190:167b-4: pa'i phyir dge ba nyid ye shes kyi rnam par
T02D1190:167b-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T02D1190:167b-7: sems gcig srog chags gsod pa nyid //
T02D1190:167b-8: gang phyir srog ni sems su brjod //
T02D1190:167b-9: 'jig rten bsgral ba zhes brjod pa //
T02D1190:167b-10: brdzun gyi tshig tu rab tu bsgrags //
T02D1190:167b-11: btsun mo'i khu ba ma byin pa //
T02D1190:167b-12: gzhan gyi bud med rang 'dod mdzes //
T02D1190:167b-13: sems gcig ces pa ni zla med pa'i sems gzung ba dang 'dzin pa las rnam par grol ba'o //
T02D1190:167b-14: de ni srog bcad pa ste ji ltar zhe na /
T02D1190:167b-15: gang phyir srog ni sems su 'dod //
T02D1190:167b-17: srog sems zhes pa ni brda'o //
T02D1190:167b-18: ji skad du bcom ldan 'das kyis 'phags pa brgyad stong pa las //
T02D1190:167b-19: bdag gis sems can thams cad phung po lhag ma
T02D1190:167b-20: med par mya ngan las 'das par yongs su mya
T02D1190:167b-21: ngan las bzla bar bgyi ba'i gang dang gang yongs
T02D1190:167b-22: su mya ngan las bzla bar bya ba de yang
T02D1190:167b-24: gal te de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
T02D1190:167b-25: dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi sgra dbyangs
T02D1190:167b-26: mtha' yas pas gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang
T02D1190:167b-27: mtshungs pa'i bskal par yang sems can zhes tshig tu
T02D1190:167b-28: brjod kyang / de la gang cung zad skyes pa'am skye bar 'gyur ba'am //
T02D1190:167b-31: 'gag pa ni sems can gyi khams rnams gzod ma nas ma skyes pa'i phyir ro ;
T02D1190:167b-32: / de na yang gang skye ba dang 'gag pa mi dmigs pa de bsgral bar bgyi'o zhes pa'o //
T02D1190:167b-34: tshig ni brdzun gyi ched du ste /
T02D1190:167b-35: 'di lta bu 'di ni yang dag pa bden pa'i brdzun du smra ba'o //
T02D1190:167b-36: yang na smra ba ni sgra ste brdzun ni mi bden pa'o //
T02D1190:167b-37: gang gi phyir smra ba 'di ni byang chub kyi sems so //
T02D1190:167b-40: de yang byin nas gtong bas na smra ba ste /
T02D1190:167b-41: stong pa nyid dang snying rje dbyer med pa'i byang
T02D1190:167b-42: chub kyi sems kyi rang bzhin gang sgra n'a da'i
T02D1190:167b-43: phreng gnyis so // de dbyer med par rtogs pa
T02D1190:167b-44: yongs su spangs pa yang brdzun te dbang po las
T02D1190:168a-0: phreng gnyis so // @168a * // 'das pa'i don yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1190:168a-2: rab 'byor gal te mya ngan las 'das pa las
T02D1190:168a-3: cung zad ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i chos gcig
T02D1190:168a-4: yod na yang bdag sgyu ma lta bu rim lam
T02D1190:168a-5: lta bu'o zhes gsungs pa de ni brdzun du smra
T02D1190:168a-6: ba'i tshig go // btsun mo'i khu ba ma byin
T02D1190:168a-7: pa ni gzhan gyi nor 'phrog pa ma byin par
T02D1190:168a-9: yang na btsun mo ni bdag med ma'o //
T02D1190:168a-10: khu ba ni rdo rje 'dzin pa'o //
T02D1190:168a-11: btsun mo yang yin la khu ba yang yin pas btsun mo'i khu ba'o //
T02D1190:168a-12: de ma byin pa ni ma btang ba ste rtag tu 'byung ba'i rang bzhin nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1190:168a-13: gzhan gyi bud med ces pa ni mchog gi shes rab ma'o //
T02D1190:168a-14: de rang 'od mdzes ni rang gis smras ni rdo rje 'dzin pa'o //
T02D1190:168a-15: de'i rang ni de'i rang bzhin gyi shes rab ma'o //
T02D1190:168a-16: mdzes pa ni kun las mchog yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1190:168a-17: rdo rje snying pos rnal 'byor ma thams cad la
T02D1190:168a-18: bzod pa gsol nas dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo la
T02D1190:168a-19: sogs pa'i don zhus pa la zhus pa'i lan bcom
T02D1190:168a-20: ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa yin no //
T02D1190:168a-21: da ni bdag med ma la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor
T02D1190:168a-22: ma cha med pa'i rang bzhin rnams dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D1190:168a-23: 'khor lo la sogs pa'i thabs de rnams la the
T02D1190:168a-25: dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo la sogs pa yang kun
T02D1190:168a-26: rdzob kyi bden pa yang dbyer med pa'i don dam
T02D1190:168a-27: pa'i bden par bcom ldan 'das kyis brda gsungs pa
T02D1190:168a-28: la rnal 'byor ma rnams the tshom du gyur te
T02D1190:168a-30: de nas rnal 'byor ma thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
T02D1190:168a-31: de nas zhes pa ni kha sbyor ro //
T02D1190:168a-32: rnal 'byor ma thams cad ces pa ni ma lus pa'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pa rnams so //
T02D1190:168a-33: 'di skad ces gsol to zhes pa ni 'di lta
T02D1190:168a-34: bu'i rnam pa'i rang bzhin nyid kyis dus gsum du
T02D1190:168a-35: khyab pa'o // zhus pa nyid gsungs pa /
T02D1190:168a-36: yul de rnams kyang ci lags /
T02D1190:168a-37: dbang po rnams ni gang lags /
T02D1190:168a-38: skye mched rnams ni ci lags //
T02D1190:168a-39: phung po rnams ni gang lags /
T02D1190:168a-40: khams rnams de yang ci lags /
T02D1190:168a-41: de ltar lnga'i bdag nyid kun rdzob kyi bden pa
T02D1190:168a-42: 'di rnams kyi rang bzhin shes pa don dam pa'i
T02D1190:168b-0: bden pa yin par rnal 'byor ma rnams bgros @168b
T02D1190:168b-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T02D1190:168b-4: gzugs sgra de bzhin dri dang ni //
T02D1190:168b-5: ro dang de bzhin reg bya nyid //
T02D1190:168b-6: chos kyi khams kyi rang bzhin nyid //
T02D1190:168b-7: 'di rnams yul ni drug tu brjod //
T02D1190:168b-8: dbang po rnams ni yul drug ste //
T02D1190:168b-9: mig dang rna ba sna dang ni //
T02D1190:168b-10: lce dang lus dang de bzhin yid //
T02D1190:168b-11: 'di rnams dbang po drug po ni //
T02D1190:168b-12: gti mug rdo rje la sogs ldan //
T02D1190:168b-13: yul dang yul can dag gis ni //
T02D1190:168b-14: skye mched bcu gnyis dag tu 'gyur //
T02D1190:168b-15: phung po lnga ni gzugs la sogs //
T02D1190:168b-16: mthar ni rnam shes snying rje che //
T02D1190:168b-17: dbang po dang ni yul nyid dang //
T02D1190:168b-18: dbang po'i rnam par shes pa nyid //
T02D1190:168b-19: rnal 'byor ma rnams go bya'i phyir //
T02D1190:168b-20: khams ni bco brgyad rnams su bshad //
T02D1190:168b-21: rang bzhin gdod nas ma skyes pa //
T02D1190:168b-22: bden min brdzun min de bzhin du //
T02D1190:168b-23: thams cad chu yi zla ba ltar //
T02D1190:168b-25: 'di lta ste gtsub shing dang gtsub stan dang skyes
T02D1190:168b-26: bu'i lag pa'i rtsol ba las glo bur du me
T02D1190:168b-28: me 'di ni gtsub shing la yang mi gnas gtsub
T02D1190:168b-29: stan la yang ma yin skyes bu'i lag pa la
T02D1190:168b-31: rnam pa thams cad du yongs su btsal na gcig na yang yod pa ma yin pas /
T02D1190:168b-32: me de yang bden pa yang ma yin zhing brdzun pa yang ma yin no //
T02D1190:168b-33: de ltar chos thams cad rnal 'byor mas yid la
T02D1190:168b-34: gyis shig ces pa ni rdo rje snying po thabs
T02D1190:168b-35: kyi rang bzhin nyid kyi kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i
T02D1190:168b-36: rang bzhin don dam pa'i bden pas bstan pa yin
T02D1190:168b-37: no // thams cad chu yi zla ba ltar //
T02D1190:168b-42: skyes bu'i lag pa'i rtsol ba las glo bur du me skye bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1190:168b-43: me de yang gtsub shing la yang mi gnas //
T02D1190:168b-44: gtsub bstan la yang ma yin skyes bu'i lag pa dag la yang ma yin te /
T02D1190:168b-45: rnal 'byor ma rnams ni shes rab kyi rang bzhin
T02D1190:168b-46: gyi don dam pa'i bden pa'i rang bzhin kun rdzob
T02D1190:168b-47: kyi bden par bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa ni
T02D1190:168b-48: tshigs su bcad pa rnams kyi bsdus pa'i don to
T02D1190:168b-49: // tshigs su bcad pa 'di rnams rgyud kyi gleng
T02D1190:168b-50: gzhir gyur pa'i don dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i rgyud kyi
T02D1190:169a-0: rdo rje rigs kyi rim par phye ba'i @169a *
T02D1190:169a-1: // // bdag nyid nas rdzogs pa la thug pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1190:169a-2: rdo rje snying pos dkyil 'khor 'khor lo ci zhes
T02D1190:169a-3: bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa'i lan bcom ldan 'das
T02D1190:169a-4: kyis btab pa / dkyil ni snying po zhes brjod de //
T02D1190:169a-5: byang chub sems ni bde chen po //
T02D1190:169a-6: 'khor lo zhes tshogs nam mkha'i khams //
T02D1190:169a-7: yul la sogs pa rnam par sbyong //
T02D1190:169a-8: zhes bya ba la sogs pas bstan to //
T02D1190:169a-9: de yang rdo rje snying pos ni thabs kyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1190:169a-10: 'khor lo zhes tshogs nam mkha'i khams //
T02D1190:169a-11: yul la sogs pa rnam par sbyong //
T02D1190:169a-13: bskyed pa'i rim pas bskyed pa'i rim pa rtogs par bzhed pa yin no //
T02D1190:169a-14: dkyil ni snying po zhes brjod do //
T02D1190:169a-15: byang chub sems ni bde chen po //
T02D1190:169a-17: rdzogs pa'i rim pa dang bskyed pa'i rim pa phyin
T02D1190:169a-18: ci ma log pa bcom ldan 'das kyis dang po
T02D1190:169a-19: nyid du rdo rje snying pos zhus pa'i lan btab
T02D1190:169a-20: pa'o // da ni rnal 'byor ma rnams kyang cha
T02D1190:169a-21: shas med pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir rang bzhin
T02D1190:169a-23: byang chub sems ni bde chen po //
T02D1190:169a-24: zhes pa bzhed pa nyid do //
T02D1190:169a-25: 'khor lo zhes tshogs nam mkha'i khams //
T02D1190:169a-26: yul la sogs pa rnam par spyod //
T02D1190:169a-27: zhes pa la the tshom du gyur pa nyid sems
T02D1190:169a-28: la bzhag nas yul de rnams kyang ci lags zhes
T02D1190:169a-29: bya ba la sogs pa dbu 'dri la ba sngon
T02D1190:169a-30: du 'gro bas zhus pa'i lan btab pa ni /
T02D1190:169a-31: de la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T02D1190:169a-32: yul drug ni gzugs la sogs pa'o //
T02D1190:169a-33: de yang cis khyad 'phags she na /
T02D1190:169a-34: gti mug rdo rje la sogs ldan te drug go //
T02D1190:169a-35: gti mug ni rnam par snang mdzad rdo rje ma ning gi rim par gnas pa'i mkha' 'gro ma'o //
T02D1190:169a-36: gti mug kyang yin la rdo rje ma yang yin pas gtu mug rdo rje ma ning ngo //
T02D1190:169a-37: mig gi dbang po la gti mug rdo rje la
T02D1190:169a-38: sogs pa ni gti mug rdo rje la sogs pa'o
T02D1190:169a-40: 'dus nas mi phyed pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02D1190:169a-41: de nyid kyi phyir lnga po drug pa'i khongs su
T02D1190:169a-42: gtogs shing dbyer med pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi rang
T02D1190:169a-43: bzhin gyi yid ces pa ni brda'o //
T02D1190:169a-44: yul 'ba' zhig ni ma yin te /
T02D1190:169b-0: dbang po rnams kyang gti mug @169b rdo rje la sogs pa dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1190:169b-1: yang na gti mug rdo rje la sogs ni de
T02D1190:169b-2: bzhin gshegs pa lnga rnams dang rdo rje mkha' 'gro
T02D1190:169b-3: ma bzhi ste / gti mug rdo rje la sogs
T02D1190:169b-4: ldan ni rdo rje ma la sogs pa'i mkha' 'gro
T02D1190:169b-5: ma bzhi 'byung ba chen po lnga'i rang bzhin gti
T02D1190:169b-6: mug la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa lnga gzugs
T02D1190:169b-7: la sogs pa'i phung po lnga dang dbyer med pa'o
T02D1190:169b-8: ma bzhi ste / // de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /
T02D1190:169b-9: phung po lnga ni gzugs la sogs //
T02D1190:169b-10: mthar ni rnam shes snying rje che //
T02D1190:169b-11: zhes rdo rje snying po la bos pa ste /
T02D1190:169b-12: de ni the tshom za ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1190:169b-13: sa la sogs pa 'byung ba chen po lnga dang
T02D1190:169b-14: phung po lngas byin gyis brlabs pas nyi shu'i dbye
T02D1190:169b-16: de yang gzugs la sogs pa'i phung po lnga re
T02D1190:169b-17: re zhing yang rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i
T02D1190:169b-18: de bzhin gshegs pa lngas byin gyis brlabs pas rnam
T02D1190:169b-19: pa brgyar dbyer med pa yin no //
T02D1190:169b-20: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs
T02D1190:169b-21: pa lnga po re re zhing yang rnam pa lngar
T02D1190:169b-22: phye bas na de thug pa med pa'o //
T02D1190:169b-23: yul dang yul can dag gis ni //
T02D1190:169b-24: skye mched bcu gnyis dag tu 'gyur /
T02D1190:169b-25: gzugs la sogs pa'i yul drug dang mig la sogs
T02D1190:169b-26: pa'i dbang po drug dang gnyis po dag ni skye
T02D1190:169b-28: yang na yul ni 'byung ba chen po bzhi'o //
T02D1190:169b-29: yul can ni de bzhin gshegs pa lnga rnams te /
T02D1190:169b-30: yul yang yin la yul can yang yin pas yul dang yul can te ma ning ngo //
T02D1190:169b-31: de len cing 'dzin par byed pa'i nges pa'i tshig
T02D1190:169b-32: bstan pa na yi ge na dang yi ge la
T02D1190:169b-33: ste / yul dang yul can de ston cing brjod pa yin pas yul dang yul can no //
T02D1190:169b-34: de dag las thabs dang shes rab kyi rang bzhin las so //
T02D1190:169b-35: gang rang bzhin ni khams rnams te gzod ma nas ma skyes pa'o //
T02D1190:169b-36: rang gi dngos po ni rang bzhin no //
T02D1190:169b-37: khams ni bco brgyad dag tu bshad //
T02D1190:169b-38: khams rnams ni sa la sogs pa'i 'byung ba bzhi
T02D1190:169b-39: dang phung po lnga byin gyi brlabs pa dgu po
T02D1190:169b-41: rnal 'byor ma rnams ni bdag med ma la sogs pa'o //
T02D1190:169b-42: go bya'i phyir ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par bya ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1190:170a-0: rdo rje gsum dbyer med par @170a * //
T02D1190:170a-1: zhugs pas skye mched bcu gnyis su 'gyur ro //
T02D1190:170a-2: du zhe na phung po ni gzugs la sogs dang sa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1190:170a-3: 'du byed kyi mtha' zhes pa 'dis 'byung ba chen po bzhi yang bstan pa yin no //
T02D1190:170a-4: 'dis ni dbang po lnga dang yul bzhi dang dgu'o //
T02D1190:170a-5: dbang po'i rnam pa shes pa nyid //
T02D1190:170a-7: dbang po dang yul la rag las pa'i phyir yul dang dbang po dgu'o //
T02D1190:170a-8: 'dis ni dgu po gnyis po gang dang gang gi rang bzhin de ni ma ning ngo //
T02D1190:170a-10: gang 'di nyid gdod ma nas ma skyes pas so //
T02D1190:170a-12: de nyid ma skyes pa ste gdod ma nas ma
T02D1190:170a-13: skyes pa'i rang bzhin gyi phyir thog ma med pa'o
T02D1190:170a-14: // de nyid kyi phyir bden min te bden pa bkag pa'o //
T02D1190:170a-15: bden pa bkag pas pha rol dang tshu rol gyi
T02D1190:170a-16: rig pas brdzun pa bkag pa yin te brdzun min
T02D1190:170a-17: no // dpes cung zad phye nas byin gyis brlabs pas bstan par byas pa /
T02D1190:170a-18: thams cad chu yi zla ba ltar //
T02D1190:170a-20: de lta bur gyur ba'i yongs su shes pa yang
T02D1190:170a-21: chags pa nyid yin pas chags pa thams cad las
T02D1190:170a-22: kyang bzlog pas ni don dam pa'i bden pa yang
T02D1190:170a-24: 'dod pas zhes pa ni yongs su shes pa'o //
T02D1190:170a-25: 'dod pa ji ltar yin pa gsungs pa /
T02D1190:170a-26: gtsub shing zhes pa ni gtsub pa'i shing ngo //
T02D1190:170a-27: gtsub stan ni gtsub pa'i 'og gzhi'o //
T02D1190:170a-28: skyes bu'i lag pa'i rtsol ba las zhes pa ni lag pa'i bya ba'o //
T02D1190:170a-29: 'di'i 'du 'phrod kyi bya ba las me skye bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1190:170a-30: glo bur du zhes pa ni gang gi phyir rnam
T02D1190:170a-31: pa thams cad du yongs su btsal na me 'di
T02D1190:170a-32: mi dmigs so / me de yang gtsub shing la
T02D1190:170a-33: yang mig nas gtsub stan la yang ma yin skyes
T02D1190:170a-34: bu'i lag pa dag la yang ma yin te //
T02D1190:170a-35: rnam pa thams cad du yongs su btsal na gcig
T02D1190:170a-36: pa yang yod pa ma yin no zhes pa ni
T02D1190:170a-37: de nyid kyi phyir glo bur du skye ste /
T02D1190:170a-38: ma skyes pa nyid skyes par yongs su brtag go //
T02D1190:170a-39: me de yang bden pa yang ma yin brdzun pa
T02D1190:170a-40: yang ma yin pa ji lta ba de bzhin du
T02D1190:170a-42: lag pa'i bya ba yang bkod pa yod pa ma yin te /
T02D1190:170a-43: bya ba rnams med pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1190:170b-0: me yang me'i khams nyid kyi @170b cha shas med
T02D1190:170b-1: par bstan pa'i phyir yang cha shas dang bral ba
T02D1190:170b-2: las kyang khyad par cung zad byin gyis brlabs pa
T02D1190:170b-3: nges par bstan pa nye bar bstan to //
T02D1190:170b-4: dbang po las 'das pa bden pa gnyis dbyer med
T02D1190:170b-5: par zung 'jug tu 'byung ba'i rim pa yin pas
T02D1190:170b-6: sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul te bla ma'i zhabs kyi
T02D1190:170b-7: bka' drin las khong du chud par bya ba'o //
T02D1190:170b-8: de ltar ni ae wam gyi ye ges rgyas btab pas so //
T02D1190:170b-9: chos thams cad ni yul la sogs pa rnams so //
T02D1190:170b-10: kye rnal 'byor mas ni bden pa gnyis kyi bdag nyid kyis so //
T02D1190:170b-11: yid la gyis shig ni chos kyi dbyings su zhugs pa'o //
T02D1190:170b-12: de nas rnal 'byor ma bdag med ma la sogs
T02D1190:170b-13: pa rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma thams cad bdud rtsi
T02D1190:170b-14: lnga dang dam tshig gi rdzas thogs nas /
T02D1190:170b-15: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dpa' la mchod de rdo
T02D1190:170b-16: rje sems dpa' zhes pa ni rdo rje gsum dbyer
T02D1190:170b-17: med pa'i chos kyi sku'i rang bzhin no //
T02D1190:170b-18: bcom ldan 'das ni dbang phyug la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1190:170b-19: mchod pa ni de mngon par dang pa'i thugs kyis
T02D1190:170b-20: de mnyam pa nyid du bdag nyid kyi thugs la
T02D1190:170b-21: rnam par gzhag pa yin no //
T02D1190:170b-22: ci byas nas she na thogs nas so //
T02D1190:170b-23: bdud rtsi lnga ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'o //
T02D1190:170b-24: dam tshig gi rdzas ni go ku da ha na la sogs pa'o //
T02D1190:170b-25: 'di 'dra ba nyid ni des pa kho nar yang
T02D1190:170b-26: dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi lam yin par
T02D1190:170b-27: sems brtan par bskyed nas bdud rtsi lnga ni de
T02D1190:170b-28: bzhin gshegs pa lnga la dam tshig gi rdzas ni
T02D1190:170b-29: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus pa'o //
T02D1190:170b-30: 'dis byang chub kyi sems brtan par byas pas mchod pa yin par gsungs pa'i don nyid do //
T02D1190:170b-31: bcom ldan 'das kun du ru'i sbyor bas rjes su chags par byed ces sbyar ro //
T02D1190:170b-32: yang na gnyis su med par rtogs pas byang chub kyi sems rnam par gzhag go //
T02D1190:170b-33: rdo rje bdud rtsi'i ro yang 'thud du 'jug par byed do ni bcom ldan 'das so //
T02D1190:170b-34: yang na bdud rtsi ni byang chub sems so //
T02D1190:170b-35: de'i ro ni nyams su myong ba'i mtshan nyid bstar ba'o //
T02D1190:170b-36: yang na bsdu ba rang bzhin gyis brlab par byas pa'i tha tshig go //
T02D1190:171a-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes nas rang byin gyis @171a * //
T02D1190:171a-2: 'dis ni rdo rje rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi kun
T02D1190:171a-3: du ru'i sbyor bas rjes su chags pa'i bar bdud
T02D1190:171a-4: rtsi bcud kyis len gyis kyang bcom ldan 'das mnyes
T02D1190:171a-5: te bcom ldan 'das ma yang mnyes pas bcom ldan
T02D1190:171a-6: 'das kyis rang byin gyis brlab pa bstan pa'o //
T02D1190:171a-7: kye kye rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma //
T02D1190:171a-8: sangs rgyas kun gyis phyag mdzad pa'i //
T02D1190:171a-9: de nyid bdag gis gsang byas pas //
T02D1190:171a-10: rdo rje mchod pa'i byin rlabs kyis //
T02D1190:171a-11: bshad kyis dad pas rab tu nyon //
T02D1190:171a-12: gsang byas pa ni gang nyan thos la sogs pa'i
T02D1190:171a-13: spyod yul ma yin pa'i de kho na nyid de
T02D1190:171a-15: dad pas nyon zhes pa ni nyan pa'i dbang pos zung shig pa ste //
T02D1190:171a-16: brjod du med pa nyid tshig gis bstan pa'o //
T02D1190:171a-17: byin rlabs kyi ni bcom ldan 'das kyis byin rlabs 'di'o //
T02D1190:171a-18: yang na byin rlabs bstan pa ni sprul pa'i skus
T02D1190:171a-19: chos kyi sku dang longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dbyer
T02D1190:171a-20: med par rdzogs par gyur pa'o //
T02D1190:171a-21: yang na kun du ru'i sbyor ba ni rdo rje dang padma mnyam par sbyor bas so //
T02D1190:171a-22: rjes su zhes pa ni rim pas chags par gyur pa ste chags pa dang /
T02D1190:171a-24: chags pa chen po rnam par dga' ba la thug par de thob pa'o //
T02D1190:171a-25: de nas rdo rje bdud rtsi'i ro yang 'thung ngu
T02D1190:171a-26: 'jug par byed do zhes pa la bdud rtsi ni
T02D1190:171a-27: khu ba'o // ro ni bden pa chen po yin pas bdud rtsi'i ro'o //
T02D1190:171a-28: de rdo rje ni dbyer mi phyed pa'o //
T02D1190:171a-29: de 'thung du 'jug par byed pa ni de rtogs
T02D1190:171a-30: pas tshim pa'i rang bzhin nyid kyis bzhi pa rdzogs
T02D1190:171a-31: pa'o // de nas rgyu de gnyis kyi phyir bzhi pa nyid rgyu'o //
T02D1190:171a-32: gang phyi nas tha mar gyur pa ni gang gi
T02D1190:171a-33: phyir bzhi pa nyid la thug pa de nyid bcom
T02D1190:171a-35: dgyes nas ni chags pa thams cad mnyam snyoms su gnas pa'i rang bzhin gyis bcom ldan 'das so //
T02D1190:171a-36: byin gyis brlabs pa bstan pa ni /
T02D1190:171a-37: thams cad du khyab pa'i phyir dus thams cad las te //
T02D1190:171a-38: rnam pa thams cad sdom pa gcig pa'i phyir yang ngo //
T02D1190:171a-39: de nyid kyi phyir bstan pa ni sprul pa'i sku
T02D1190:171a-40: sna tshogs kyi rang bzhin dbang po'i gzhu dang mtshungs
T02D1190:171a-42: de nas sprul pa'i sku las longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'o //
T02D1190:171a-43: kye kye rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma //
T02D1190:171b-0: bshad kyis rab tu @171b nyon zhes pa ni gnyi ga yang bod pa ste /
T02D1190:171b-1: dbyer med pa ni nam mkha' la spyod pa'i sgra'o //
T02D1190:171b-2: de yang de dang dbyer med pa nyid chos kyi sku'o //
T02D1190:171b-3: gsang mdzad pa'i ni chos kyi sku 'di dbang po las 'das pa'o //
T02D1190:171b-5: rdo rje mchod pa'i byin rlabs kyis //
T02D1190:171b-7: mchod pa zhes pa ni mchod pa'i bya ba ste /
T02D1190:171b-8: rdo rje gsum dbyer med pa'i ye shes so //
T02D1190:171b-9: de nyid rdo rje ste rdo rje 'dzin pa'o //
T02D1190:171b-10: de nyid byin brlabs ni shin tu rnam par dag
T02D1190:171b-11: pa chos kyi rang bzhin kun rdzob kyi bden pa'o
T02D1190:171b-12: // de dang dbyer med pa'i rang bzhin nyid kyis yin par dgongs so //
T02D1190:171b-13: bdag gis zhes pa ni bdag nyid do //
T02D1190:171b-14: sangs rgyas kun gyis ni me long lta bu la sogs pa'i ye shes lngas so //
T02D1190:171b-15: phyag mdzad pa ni rdo rje gsum dbyer med pa nyid kyis nges pa'o //
T02D1190:171b-16: de nas lha mo thams cad rangs par gyur te
T02D1190:171b-17: pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas
T02D1190:171b-18: bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal
T02D1190:171b-20: bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi gsung nyan no zhes pa
T02D1190:171b-21: ni sku gsum dang ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid yang
T02D1190:171b-22: dag pa'i ye shes rtogs pa'i ni lha mo thams
T02D1190:171b-23: cad ni ma lus pa'i rol pa dang ldan pa
T02D1190:171b-24: rnams so // de nyid kyi phyir rangs par gyur
T02D1190:171b-25: ni spro ba dang bsdu ba'i bdag nyid kyi ye
T02D1190:171b-26: rnams so // shes so // de nas zhes pa ni bden pa gnyis dbyer med par rtogs pa'o //
T02D1190:171b-27: btud nas ni sku gsung thugs dbyer med pas so //
T02D1190:171b-28: 'dug par gyur nas pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga
T02D1190:171b-29: sa la btsugs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba
T02D1190:171b-30: de logs su thal mo sbyar nas zhes pa ni
T02D1190:171b-32: bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung nyan par gyur to //
T02D1190:171b-33: da ni bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T02D1190:171b-34: bza' btung ji ltar rnyed pa dang //
T02D1190:171b-35: bgrod dang bgrod min mi spang zhing //
T02D1190:171b-36: ma lus pa'i yul la sogs pa rnams ni gdod
T02D1190:171b-37: ma nas ma skyes pa'i rang bzhin nyid kyi dbyings
T02D1190:171b-38: kyi rang bzhin pas bza' ba dang btung ba la
T02D1190:171b-39: sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa de la yod pa
T02D1190:171b-41: 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad las rnam par grol pas
T02D1190:171b-42: spros pa med pa'i spyod pas 'khyam pa yin par
T02D1190:171b-43: dgongs so // yang na bza' btung ji ltar rnyed pa dang /
T02D1190:171b-44: mi spang zhing zhes pa ni kun nas snang ba dang brjod pa dag rnam par dag pa'o //
T02D1190:172a-3: rig pa rnam par dag pa'o //
T02D1190:172a-4: 'dis ni rdo rje gsum rnam par dag pa nyid de ye shes yin no //
T02D1190:172a-5: khrus dang gtsang sbra mi bya ste //
T02D1190:172a-6: grong pa'i chos ni spang mi bya //
T02D1190:172a-8: gtsang sbra ni ma dag pa sbyong bar byed pa
T02D1190:172a-9: ste de kho na nyid kyi rnal 'byor pas mi
T02D1190:172a-10: bya'o // grong pa'i chos ni spang mi bya ni
T02D1190:172a-11: grong pa'i chos spyod pa yang bya ba nyid yin
T02D1190:172a-12: bya'o // no // yang na khrus ni dbang bskur nges so //
T02D1190:172a-13: gtsang sbra ni dri ma med par byas shing sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag pa'o //
T02D1190:172a-14: de mi bya ste zhes pa ni gnyen po bsgoms pas rnam par dag pa ma yin no //
T02D1190:172a-16: de nas dngos po thams cad kyi //
T02D1190:172a-17: dag pa de bzhin nyid du brjod //
T02D1190:172a-20: grong pa'i chos ni spang mi bya ni de nyid
T02D1190:172a-21: la bzhi pa'i phyag rgyas de bzhin nyid du rtogs
T02D1190:172a-24: blo ldan gsang sngags mi bzla zhing //
T02D1190:172a-25: bsam gtan nyid ni dmigs mi bya /
T02D1190:172a-26: gnyid ni spang bar mi bya ste //
T02D1190:172a-27: dbang po rnams ni mi dgag go //
T02D1190:172a-28: zhes pa ni phyi rol gyi sngags la gzhol nas
T02D1190:172a-29: rdo rje bzlas pa mngon par mi shes pas 'grub
T02D1190:172a-31: sngags kyi bzlas pa bkag pa'o //
T02D1190:172a-33: blo ldan bsam gtan nyid ni dmigs mi bya //
T02D1190:172a-35: phyag dang zhal gyi rnam pa la sogs pa sprul
T02D1190:172a-36: pa'i sku'i lha bsgom pa rdo rje bzlas pa'i nang
T02D1190:172a-37: nyid du 'dus pa yin pas lha lhag par dmigs
T02D1190:172a-38: pa dgag pa'o // gnyid ni spang bar mi bya ste //
T02D1190:172a-40: skye ba dang 'chi ba'i kun du rtog pa yongs su spangs pa yin par dgongs so //
T02D1190:172a-41: dbang po rnams ni mi dgag go //
T02D1190:172a-43: kun rdzob kyi bden pa dang dbyer med pa nyid
T02D1190:172a-44: kyi don dam pa'i bden pa'i ye shes the tshom
T02D1190:172a-45: med par rnyed pa yin no //
T02D1190:172a-47: blo ldan gsang sngags mi bzla zhing //
T02D1190:172a-49: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i rang bzhin bstan to //
T02D1190:172a-50: bsam gtan nyid ni dmigs mi bya //
T02D1190:172a-52: chos kyi sku'i rang bzhin bstan pa'o //
T02D1190:172a-53: gnyid ni spang bar mi bya ste //
T02D1190:172a-55: gti mug bral bar bkag pas 'dis ni sprul pa'i sku bstan pa yin no //
T02D1190:172b-0: 'dir yang longs spyod rdzogs pa'i @172b sku rnal 'byor
T02D1190:172b-1: ma rnams la bstan pas dang po nyid du 'byung
T02D1190:172b-2: ba nyid de / rjes thogs su chos kyi sku
T02D1190:172b-3: dang sprul pa'i sku nye bar bstan pa yin no
T02D1190:172b-4: ba nyid de / // da ni sku gsum dbyer med pa nyid mngon par gsal bar byas pa /
T02D1190:172b-5: ba la thams cad bza' bar bya /
T02D1190:172b-6: rigs lnga dag dang mnyam par spyad //
T02D1190:172b-7: dogs pa med pa'i sems kyis ni //
T02D1190:172b-8: btsun mo thams cad dga' bar bya //
T02D1190:172b-9: chos thams cad ni chos kyi dbyings las byung ba'i
T02D1190:172b-10: phyir yongs su bcad pa cung zad kyang med par
T02D1190:172b-11: 'byung ngo // 'di'i phyir na ba la thams cad bza' bar bya'o //
T02D1190:172b-12: rgyu'i sbyor ba dang bral bas kyang chos thams cad
T02D1190:172b-13: ni mtshan ma med pa'i rang bzhin gyis ni rigs
T02D1190:172b-14: lnga mtshungs pa nyid du spyad par bya'o //
T02D1190:172b-15: ma lus pa'i rtog pa yongs su spang pa'i byir
T02D1190:172b-16: reg tu rung ba dang mi rung ba'i kun du
T02D1190:172b-17: rtog pa med par btsun mo thams cad dga' bar
T02D1190:172b-18: bya'o // 'di ji ltar yin pa de gsungs pa /
T02D1190:172b-19: dogs pa med pa'i sems kyis ni //
T02D1190:172b-20: rnam par mi rtog pa'i sems kyi rgyus yin no //
T02D1190:172b-21: 'dis ni stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa
T02D1190:172b-22: dang smon pa med pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo
T02D1190:172b-24: dogs pa med pa'i sems kyis ni //
T02D1190:172b-25: zhes pa rdo rje gsum mi phyed pa rnam par dag pa'o //
T02D1190:172b-27: bshes la sdug par mi bya zhing //
T02D1190:172b-28: de bzhin gdug la sdang mi bya //
T02D1190:172b-29: rdo shing 'jim pa'i bdag nyid kyi //
T02D1190:172b-30: lha 'di rnams la phyag mi bya //
T02D1190:172b-31: zhes pa bshes ma yin pa'i kun du rtog pa
T02D1190:172b-32: thams cad spangs pa nyid kyi phyir bshes la sdug
T02D1190:172b-33: par zhes pa la sogs pa phyed snga ma'o //
T02D1190:172b-34: nang gi lha'i rang bzhin las sems g-yo ba med pas /
T02D1190:172b-35: phyi rol gyi lha'i rnam par rtog pa yid dga' ba med pa'i phyir /
T02D1190:172b-36: rdo shing 'jim pa'i rang bzhin gyi //
T02D1190:172b-37: lha 'di rnams mdun du byung ba na phyag mi bya zhes pa'o //
T02D1190:172b-38: yang na bshes kyi sgras dbang ba rnams so //
T02D1190:172b-39: sdug pa ni chags pas te de mi bya'o //
T02D1190:172b-40: sdug pa zhes pa ma ning ste /
T02D1190:172b-41: byams pa bsgom pas mnyam pa nyid kyi ma ning nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1190:172b-42: gdug la sdang zhes pa gdug pa'i sems la zhe sdang gnyis 'dod par mi bya ste /
T02D1190:172b-43: sdang zhes pa ma ning gnyis su med pas so //
T02D1190:172b-44: lha ni rol par byed pa ste 'di rnams la
T02D1190:172b-45: rol pa de yod pa'i phyir lha yul rnams so
T02D1190:173a-1: phyag mi bya ste de'i mngon par zhen pa med par bya'o //
T02D1190:173a-3: rdo shing 'jim pa'i rang bzhin rnams te bems po'i
T02D1190:173a-4: rnam par rtog pas rnam par gnas zhes dgongs pa'o
T02D1190:173a-5: // rigs lnga la ni mnyam par spyad /
T02D1190:173a-6: ces mdor bstan pa'i don sangs rgyas par bshad pas /
T02D1190:173a-7: g-yung mo gdol pa ko lpags mkhan //
T02D1190:173a-8: phyag dar mkhan sogs reg ring dang //
T02D1190:173a-9: bram ze rgyal rigs rje dmangs rnams //
T02D1190:173a-10: bdag gi lus ltar reg par bya //
T02D1190:173a-11: zhes pa don rab tu gsal ba kho na'o //
T02D1190:173a-12: yang na g-yung mo la sogs pa lnga dang /
T02D1190:173a-13: bram ze rgyal rig la sogs pa lnga dang gnyis
T02D1190:173a-14: ni phyi dang nang gi bdag nyid gnyis bstan pa'o
T02D1190:173a-15: // bdag gi lus ltar zhes pa sems kyi lus
T02D1190:173a-16: nyid kyi phyir rang gi lus lta bur chos thams
T02D1190:173a-18: sems de yang chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin nyid du rtogs par bya'o zhes pa'o //
T02D1190:173a-19: bdud rtsi lnga dang bu ram chang //
T02D1190:173a-20: dug dang nim pa bu btsas skyes //
T02D1190:173a-21: skyur dang mngar dang bska ba sogs //
T02D1190:173a-22: kha ba lan tshva tsha ba dang //
T02D1190:173a-23: dri ba dri zhim chung dang khrag / byang chub sems bsres rab tu bza' //
T02D1190:173a-24: zhes pa byang chub sems kyi sgras gnyis su med
T02D1190:173a-25: par rtogs pa ste the tshom dang bral ba nyid
T02D1190:173a-26: kyis kun du spyad par bya'o zhes pa ste don
T02D1190:173a-28: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /
T02D1190:173a-29: gnyis med ye shes sems kyis ni //
T02D1190:173a-30: mi bza' cung zad yod ma yin //
T02D1190:173a-31: rang byung me tog rnyed nas ni //
T02D1190:173a-32: padma'i snod du gzhag bya zhing //
T02D1190:173a-33: lud pa dang ni snabs dag gis //
T02D1190:173a-34: gcig tu byas nas btung bar bya'o //
T02D1190:173a-38: lud pa dang ni snabs dag gis //
T02D1190:173a-39: zhes pa kha dad sna'i bu ga dag bsres te /
T02D1190:173a-40: n'a da'i phreng ba gnyis kha dang sna'i bu ga
T02D1190:173a-41: las 'og tu drangs te khu ba'i gzugs kyis padma'i
T02D1190:173a-42: snod du ste lha mo'i padma'i nang du gzhag par
T02D1190:173a-43: bya'o // de nas rang byung me tog khu ba
T02D1190:173a-44: dang bde ba'i rnam pa dbyer med pas byang chub
T02D1190:173a-45: kyi sems btung zhing bsdu bar bya'o //
T02D1190:173a-46: rnyed pa ni yang dag pa'i ye shes 'di nyid ces pa nges pa'i don to //
T02D1190:173a-47: bdud rtsi lnga la sogs pa bza' ba cung zad
T02D1190:173a-48: yod ma yin zhes pa'i bar gyis rdo rje mngon
T02D1190:173a-49: par zhen pa yongs su spong ba'o //
T02D1190:173a-50: rang byung me tog rnyed nas ni //
T02D1190:173b-0: btung bar @173b bya zhes pa'i bar gyis thugs rdo rje'i mngon par zhen pa yongs su spang ba'o //
T02D1190:173b-1: lud pa dang ni snabs dag ni //
T02D1190:173b-2: padma'i snod du gzhag bya zhing //
T02D1190:173b-3: zhes pa'i bar gyis gsung rdo rje'i mngon par zhes pa yongs su spong ba'o //
T02D1190:173b-4: da ni rdo rje gsum gyi mngon par zhen pa yongs su spang pa gsungs pa /
T02D1190:173b-5: smad g-yogs kha dog sna tshogs dang /
T02D1190:173b-6: ro bsregs thal bas de bzhin brgyan //
T02D1190:173b-7: me tog yi dags gnas rnyed pas //
T02D1190:173b-8: mgo skyes mchog ni bcing bar bya //
T02D1190:173b-9: sku chos 'byung nam mkha'i khams la g-yogs rdo rje gsum dbyer med pa sku rdo rje'o //
T02D1190:173b-10: sna tshogs kyi skras rdo rje gsum dbyer med pa thugs rdo rje'o //
T02D1190:173b-12: ro bsregs thal bas ni chos kyi dbyings kyi bdag nyid mchog tu gyur pa'i rgyus so //
T02D1190:173b-13: 'di ni rdo rje gsum dbyer med pa ste /
T02D1190:173b-14: rdo rje gsum brgyan pa mchog ste bla ma dgu'i
T02D1190:173b-15: bdag nyid can gyi dkyil 'khor gyi ngo bo nyid
T02D1190:173b-16: kyi phyir ro // de yang mgo skyes te /
T02D1190:173b-17: spyi bor rang gi dbang por 'gyur ro zhes pa'i gsung las so //
T02D1190:173b-18: de ci ltar dgu'i bdag nyid can yin zhes gsungs pa me tog bdag med ma /
T02D1190:173b-19: rnyed pa ni yi dags gnas /
T02D1190:173b-20: rdo rje 'chang gi gnas su byang chub kyi sems kyi rang bzhin gyis bcing bar bya'o //
T02D1190:173b-21: gnyis dbyer med par gnas par bya'o //
T02D1190:173b-22: de'i phyir dgu bdag nyid can ces brjod do //
T02D1190:173b-23: kun rdzob don ni smad g-yogs zhes pa ni yongs su bgos pa'o //
T02D1190:173b-24: kha dog sna tshogs zhes pa ni stag gi pags pa'o //
T02D1190:173b-25: yang na kha dog sna tshogs nyid ni phyag dar khrod kyi ras so //
T02D1190:173b-26: ro bsregs thal bas ni thal ba rnams kyis so //
T02D1190:173b-27: des rnal 'byor pa brgyan pa ni rgyan du byas pa'o //
T02D1190:173b-28: yi dags gnas kyi me tog ni dur khrod kyi sa nas rnyed pa'o //
T02D1190:173b-29: rnyed pas mgo skyes legs par bcing ni dam por ro //
T02D1190:173b-30: gza' btung ji ltar rnyed pa dang //
T02D1190:173b-31: zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas rnyed nas mgo
T02D1190:173b-32: skyes legs par bcing zhes pa la thug pas yal
T02D1190:173b-33: ma lus par rnam par dag pa yin pa ches
T02D1190:173b-34: gsal ba nyid du snang ba'o //
T02D1190:173b-35: bza' btung ji ltar rnyed pa dang //
T02D1190:173b-36: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i bya ba yang dbang
T02D1190:173b-37: po rnam par dag pa med na mi 'grub par
T02D1190:173b-39: de nas rdo rje snying pos gsol pa /
T02D1190:173b-40: thams cad yul gyi rnam dag pa //
T02D1190:174a-2: nges par dbang po drug gi grangs //
T02D1190:174a-3: rnam par dag pa mdzad pa ni //
T02D1190:174a-4: yul gyi rnam par dag pa sngar //
T02D1190:174a-6: dbang po drug gi rnam par dag pa yang ma gsungs so zhes rdo rje snying pos zhus pa'o //
T02D1190:174a-7: zhus pa de la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T02D1190:174a-8: mig la gti mug rdo rje ma //
T02D1190:174a-9: rna ba zhe sdang rdo rje ma //
T02D1190:174a-10: sna la ser sna rdo rje ma //
T02D1190:174a-11: lus la phrag dog rdo rje ma //
T02D1190:174a-12: kha la 'dod chags rdo rje ma //
T02D1190:174a-13: yid la bdag med rnal 'byor ma //
T02D1190:174a-14: mig la gti mug rdo rje ma //
T02D1190:174a-16: gti mug ni rnam par snang mdzad do //
T02D1190:174a-17: rdo rje ma ni de rnam par dag pa'i mkha' 'gro ma'o //
T02D1190:174a-18: 'dis ni gnyi ga dbyer med par rnam par dag pa mig gi dbang po'o //
T02D1190:174a-19: rna ba zhe sdang rdo rje ma //
T02D1190:174a-21: zhe sdang rdo rje dang dbyer med pa'i rnam par dag pa rna ba'i dbang po'o //
T02D1190:174a-22: sna la ser sna rdo rje ma //
T02D1190:174a-24: phra ma rdo rje dang dbyer med par rnam par dag pa sna'i dbang po'o //
T02D1190:174a-25: kha la 'dod chags rdo rje ma //
T02D1190:174a-27: 'od dpag med rdo rje dang dbyer med par rnam par dag pa lce'i dbang po'o //
T02D1190:174a-28: lus la phrag dog rdo rje ma //
T02D1190:174a-30: phrag dog ni don yod grub pa'o //
T02D1190:174a-31: de rnam par dag pa ni mkha' 'gro ma'o //
T02D1190:174a-32: de gnyi ga dbyer med par rnam par dag pa lus kyi dbang po'o //
T02D1190:174a-33: yid la bdag med rnal 'byor ma //
T02D1190:174a-35: rdo rje sems dpa' dang dbyer med pa'i mkha' 'gro ma rnam par dag pa yid kyi dbang po'o //
T02D1190:174a-36: dbang po rnams ni dag pa'i phyir //
T02D1190:174a-37: 'dis ni go cha sems dpa' che //
T02D1190:174a-38: 'dis ni zhes pa ni gti mug la sogs pa rnams kyis so //
T02D1190:174a-39: go cha zhes pa ni brtan par bsgribs pa'o //
T02D1190:174a-40: gang rnams she na dbang po rnams te /
T02D1190:174a-41: mig la sogs pa rnams so //
T02D1190:174a-42: ci'i don du yin pa de gsungs pa rnam dag phyir ro //
T02D1190:174a-43: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi rgyus so //
T02D1190:174a-44: de nyid kyi phyir sems dpa' che zhes pa ni rdo rje snying po la bos pa ste /
T02D1190:174a-45: sems dpa' chen po ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku
T02D1190:174a-46: yin pa las gang gi phyir longs spyod rdzogs pa'i
T02D1190:174a-47: sku yis 'gro ba'i don byed pa la 'jug pa'i
T02D1190:174a-48: phyir ro // de nyid kyi phyir rdo rje snying po yang sdud pa po yin par brjod do //
T02D1190:174a-50: skye bo mi bzad pa yi las //
T02D1190:174b-1: thabs dang bcas na de nyid kyis //
T02D1190:174b-5: srid pa nyid kyis srid pa dag / ces bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D1190:174b-6: da ni dbang po'i rnam par dag pa zhus pa /
T02D1190:174b-7: rnam pa ma dag par dag pa lta bu'i dag pa yin par shes nas //
T02D1190:174b-8: dam tshig gi brda tha snyad du mtshon dka' ba yin par blo la bzhag nas //
T02D1190:174b-9: rdo rje snying pos gsol pa /
T02D1190:174b-10: gsang ba'i skad ni ci zhes bgyi //
T02D1190:174b-11: rnal 'byor ma yi dam tshig che //
T02D1190:174b-12: nyan thos la sogs mi shes pa /
T02D1190:174b-13: dgod dang lta ba dag gis dang //
T02D1190:174b-14: 'khyud dang de bzhin gnyis gnyis kyis //
T02D1190:174b-15: rgyud kyang rnam pa bzhi rnams kyi //
T02D1190:174b-16: dgongs pa'i skad ni ma bsgrags pa //
T02D1190:174b-18: 'dus pa'i skad dam dgongs pa'i skad do //
T02D1190:174b-20: n'a da gnyis dbyer med pa'i n'a da'o //
T02D1190:174b-21: de yang rnal 'byor ma'i ni bdag med ma la
T02D1190:174b-22: sogs pa'i lo dam tshig ni 'byung ba la de
T02D1190:174b-23: yang ma ning gi skad kyi dam tshig kyang ngo
T02D1190:174b-24: // de yang nyan thos la sogs pas mi phyed pa'o //
T02D1190:174b-25: dgongs pa'i skad ces pa'i phyogs ltar na /
T02D1190:174b-26: nyin mo dang mtshan mo gnyis dbyer med pa'i skad cig ni thun mtshams so //
T02D1190:174b-27: snang ba dang snang ba mched pa dang snang ba thob pa gang de bsgrub par bya ba'o //
T02D1190:174b-28: de lta bur gyur pa'i skad kyi rgyu mtshan ni ma ning ngo //
T02D1190:174b-29: de nyid rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi dam tshig yin par gsungs pa'i don nyid do //
T02D1190:174b-30: yang na 'dus pa'i skad ces pa ni skyes pa
T02D1190:174b-31: dang bud med dang ma ning gi rang bzhin 'dus
T02D1190:174b-32: pas rdo rje gsum dbyer med pa nyid kyi skad
T02D1190:174b-33: gang gzhom du med pa'i rang bzhin 'od gsal gyi
T02D1190:174b-34: ye shes so // de nyid rnal 'byor ma'i dam
T02D1190:174b-35: tshig ni 'di la yod pas rnal 'byor ma ste
T02D1190:174b-36: phul du byung ba'i don 'di las rtag pa nyid
T02D1190:174b-37: du rnal 'byor dang ldan zhing stong pa nyid dang
T02D1190:174b-38: snying rje dbyer med pa'i rang bzhin nyid do //
T02D1190:174b-39: de la dam tshig ni de dang shin tu dbyer
T02D1190:174b-40: med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cas 'dus pa'o
T02D1190:174b-41: // de yang ma ning gi dam tshig go //
T02D1190:174b-42: de yang nyan thos la sogs mi shes pa ni
T02D1190:174b-43: mtshan mar 'dzin pa la sogs pa rnams kyis mtshon
T02D1190:174b-45: gang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'phags pa brgyad stong pa las gsungs pa /
T02D1190:175a-1: spyod pa zhes spyod na mtshan ma la spyod pa'o //
T02D1190:175a-2: bdag byang chub sems dpa' zhes spyod na mtshan ma la spyod pa ste /
T02D1190:175a-3: 'dis thabs la mi mkhas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
T02D1190:175a-4: sems dpa' chen po yin par rig par bya'o zhes
T02D1190:175a-5: gsungs so // 'di ji ltar yin pa de gsungs pa /
T02D1190:175a-6: gang gi phyir 'dus pa'i skad dam thun mtshams kyi
T02D1190:175a-7: skad kyang rung ste ma bsgrags pa ni ma bstan
T02D1190:175a-8: pa'o // gang gis she na rgyud kyis te bye brag tu bshad pas so //
T02D1190:175a-9: gang rnams kyi zhen rnam pa bzhi rnams kyi'o //
T02D1190:175a-10: bzhi po nyid gang gi yin pa gsungs pa /
T02D1190:175a-11: dgod dang lta ba dag gis kyang //
T02D1190:175a-12: kyang gi sgra ni gang gi phyir gyi don to //
T02D1190:175a-13: 'khyud dang de bzhin gnyis gnyis kyis //
T02D1190:175a-14: zhes pa ni ji ltar 'khyud pa dang gnyis gnyis de bzhin du yin pa nyid kyi don to //
T02D1190:175a-16: bya ba dang spyod pa dang rnal 'byor bla na
T02D1190:175a-17: med pa'i rgyud kyis kyang dgongs pa'i skad ma gsungs
T02D1190:175a-18: pa nyid nyan thos pa la sogs pa'i yang spyod
T02D1190:175a-19: yul ma yin pa 'di dgongs pa'i skad 'di ma
T02D1190:175a-20: ning yin no // yang na 'dus pa'i skad dam dgongs pa'i skad kyang rung ste /
T02D1190:175a-21: dgongs pa'i skad ni ma grags pa //
T02D1190:175a-23: bzhi pa sgra'i yul ma yin pa ste mtshan ma
T02D1190:175a-24: las shin tu 'das nas cha med pa'i phyir ro
T02D1190:175a-26: rnam pa bzhi rnams kyis zhes pa ni dga' ba
T02D1190:175a-27: la sogs pa lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'i mtha'
T02D1190:175a-28: rnams kyi'o // gang gis she na rgyud kyis te bye brag tu bshad pas so //
T02D1190:175a-30: dgod dang lta ba dag gis kyang ste rnam pa
T02D1190:175a-31: sna tshogs dang rnam par sbyin pa dag gis so
T02D1190:175a-32: // 'khyud dang de bzhin gnyis gnyis kyi //
T02D1190:175a-34: rnam par nyed pa dang mtshan nyid dang bral bas kyang ngo //
T02D1190:175a-35: mang po'i tshig ni bsdu ba'o //
T02D1190:175a-37: ji ltar de bzhin bzhi pa yang //
T02D1190:175a-39: mtshan ma las shin tu 'das pas brjod du med pa'i phyir /
T02D1190:175a-40: brjod du med pa'i bdag nyid de yang brjod du med pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1190:175a-41: rang rig pa'i rang bzhin yang med cing rdo rje
T02D1190:175a-42: gsum dbyer med pa nyid gzhom du med pa'i dgongs
T02D1190:175a-43: pa'i skad 'od gsal ba gzod ma nas ma skyes
T02D1190:175a-44: pa'i chos kyi dbyings shin tu rnam par dag pa'i
T02D1190:175b-0: sgyu ma la sogs pa'i dpe bcu gnyis kyis @175b
T02D1190:175b-1: sbyar ba sku gsum gyi rang bzhin du khyab pa
T02D1190:175b-2: 'gro ba'i don bya ba la 'jug pa'i rgyu yin
T02D1190:175b-3: no // skabs 'dir rdo rje sems dpas bka' stsal pa /
T02D1190:175b-4: 'di nyid kyi yul yin pa'i phyir zhes dgongs so //
T02D1190:175b-5: de ci'i na ngas bshad kyis /
T02D1190:175b-6: khyod ni rtse gcig sems kyis nyon //
T02D1190:175b-7: ngas zhes pa ni n'a da gnyis kyi bdag nyid tshig gis brjod pa'o //
T02D1190:175b-8: de yang nyan pa'i spyod yul longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'o //
T02D1190:175b-9: khyod ni zhes pa ni sprul pa'i sku'o //
T02D1190:175b-10: rtse gcig sems zhes pa ni chos kyi sku dang dbyer med pas sku gsum dbyer med pa'o //
T02D1190:175b-12: dgongs pa'i skad dam 'dus pa'i skad kyang rung ste skad chen po'o //
T02D1190:175b-13: dam tshig brda ni rgyas pa ru //
T02D1190:175b-14: 'dus pa'i skad ces pa ni bshad zin to //
T02D1190:175b-16: skad chen po ni nyan thos la sogs pa'i spyod yul ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1190:175b-17: dam tshig brda ni rgyas pa ru //
T02D1190:175b-19: gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi lha rnams 'byung ba'i sa bon nyid kyis brda rgyas pa ste /
T02D1190:175b-20: sgra ji bzhin pa la sogs pa chos kyi phung
T02D1190:175b-21: po brgyad khri bzhi stong gi tshogs yin pa'i phyir
T02D1190:175b-22: ro // dgongs pa'i skad gsungs pa /
T02D1190:175b-23: ma da na chang ba la sha //
T02D1190:175b-24: 'du ba ma la ya dzam brjod //
T02D1190:175b-25: 'gro ba khe ta ro shr'a ba //
T02D1190:175b-26: rus pa'i rgyan ni ri ram shu /
T02D1190:175b-27: 'ong ba phrem kha nam du brjod //
T02D1190:175b-28: cang te'u kri pi tu ru brjod //
T02D1190:175b-29: skal med dum du ram du brjod //
T02D1190:175b-30: skal ldan ka lim dza rar 'dod //
T02D1190:175b-31: reg med dind'i ma zhes brjod //
T02D1190:175b-32: thod pa padma bh'a dza na //
T02D1190:175b-33: bza' ba tri pi ta zhes bya //
T02D1190:175b-34: tshod ma m'a la tvinda nam //
T02D1190:175b-35: bshang ba tsa tu sa mar brjod //
T02D1190:175b-36: gci pa kastu ri zhes brjod //
T02D1190:175b-37: rang 'byung si hlar shes par bya //
T02D1190:175b-38: khu ba ka rb'ur zhes brjod //
T02D1190:175b-39: sha chen s'a li dza zhes brjod //
T02D1190:175b-40: dbang po gnyis sbyor kun du du ru //
T02D1190:175b-41: rdo rje bo la zhes brjod de //
T02D1190:175b-43: yi ge'i dbye bas phye ba las //
T02D1190:175b-44: rigs ni rnam pa lnga ru bshad //
T02D1190:175b-45: 'di ni gsang ba'i skad yin no //
T02D1190:175b-46: sangs rgyas lnga ni mthar thug pa //
T02D1190:175b-47: g-yung mo rdo rje'i rigs su bshad //
T02D1190:175b-48: gar ma de bzhin padma'i rigs //
T02D1190:175b-49: rams 'tshed ma ni rin chen rigs //
T02D1190:175b-50: skye gnyis de bzhin gshegs par brjod //
T02D1190:175b-51: tshos ma las kyi rigs nyid de //
T02D1190:175b-52: phyag rgya 'di rnams dngos grub ster //
T02D1190:176a-0: ma da na chang zhes pa ni thugs @176a * //
T02D1190:176a-1: kyi rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin to //
T02D1190:176a-2: ba la sha zhes pa ni sku rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin to //
T02D1190:176a-3: 'du ba ma la ya dza zhes pa ni gsung rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin te /
T02D1190:176a-4: chos kyi sku gsum bstan pa yin no //
T02D1190:176a-5: 'gro ba khe ta zhes pa ni gsung rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin to //
T02D1190:176a-6: ro shr'a ba zhes pa ni sku rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin to //
T02D1190:176a-7: rus pa'i rgyan ni ni ram shu zhes pa ni
T02D1190:176a-8: thugs rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin te 'di rnams ni
T02D1190:176a-9: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku gtso bor byas pa'i sku
T02D1190:176a-10: gsum bstan te // 'ong ba phrem kha nam zhes pa ni thugs rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin to //
T02D1190:176a-11: shes rab can zhes pa ni bod pa ste /
T02D1190:176a-12: rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor lo'i rnam dag bstan to ;
T02D1190:176a-13: / cang te'u kri pi ta zhes pa ni gsung rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin to //
T02D1190:176a-14: 'di ni sprul pa'i skur dmigs pa'i sku gsum bstan pa yin no //
T02D1190:176a-15: lugs las bzlog pas rigs ni rnam pa lngar bshad
T02D1190:176a-16: pa ni 'di re re'i rigs rnam pa lnga po
T02D1190:176a-17: de yang ni mkha' 'gro ma bco lnga'i rang bzhin
T02D1190:176a-18: la re re zhing yang dkyil 'khor yin no //
T02D1190:176a-20: srid gsum yongs gyur thams cad ni //
T02D1190:176a-21: gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam par spangs //
T02D1190:176a-24: de ni rigs kyi dbye bas phye ba las te /
T02D1190:176a-25: yi ge'i dbye bas ni yi ge aa la sogs
T02D1190:176a-26: pa aam gi bar du dbyangs bco lnga rnams so
T02D1190:176a-27: // de rnams kyi dbye bas ni sna tshogs pa nyid du phye bas /
T02D1190:176a-28: de las byung ba'i mkha' 'gro ma nyid ni rtsa'i
T02D1190:176a-29: gzugs sam sngags kyi gzugs su nyams su myong ba
T02D1190:176a-31: de nyid rdo rje gsum dbyer med pa'i rdo rje
T02D1190:176a-32: gsum gyi ngo bo mkha' 'gro ma bco lnga'i rang
T02D1190:176a-33: bzhin byang chub sems kyi ngo bo yi ge aa
T02D1190:176a-34: la sogs pa yongs su gyur pa las 'byung ba'o
T02D1190:176a-36: kakko la zhes pa ni chos 'byung bdag med ma'o //
T02D1190:176a-37: can zhes pa ni rdo rje 'dzin pa'o //
T02D1190:176a-38: 'dod ces pa ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes nyid yin pa'i don to //
T02D1190:176a-39: skal ldan ka lim dza rar 'dod //
T02D1190:176a-40: ces pa ni gsung rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin to //
T02D1190:176a-41: rigs med dind'i ma ru brjod //
T02D1190:176a-43: thugs rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin to //
T02D1190:176a-44: thod pa padma'i snod yin te //
T02D1190:176a-46: sku rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin to //
T02D1190:176a-47: 'dis ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skur dmigs pa'i sku gsum bstan to //
T02D1190:176b-0: bza' ba tri pi ta @176b zhes pa ni sku rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin to //
T02D1190:176b-1: tshod ma m'a la tvim da na //
T02D1190:176b-3: gsung rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin to //
T02D1190:176b-4: bshang ba tsa tu sa mar brjod //
T02D1190:176b-6: thugs rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin te 'dis ni sprul
T02D1190:176b-7: pa'i skur dmigs pa'i sku gsum nye bar bstan to
T02D1190:176b-8: // gci ba kastu ri zhes pa ni thugs rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin to //
T02D1190:176b-9: rang byung si hlar shes par bya //
T02D1190:176b-11: gsung rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin to //
T02D1190:176b-12: khu ba karp'u ra zhes brjod //
T02D1190:176b-14: sku rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin to //
T02D1190:176b-15: 'dis ni chos kyi skur dmigs pa'i sku gsum bstan pa yin no //
T02D1190:176b-16: 'dis ni rdo rje gsum dbyer med par re re
T02D1190:176b-17: zhing yang sku gsum lugs su 'byung ba dang lugs
T02D1190:176b-18: las bzlog pas rdo rje gsum byin gyis brlabs pa'i
T02D1190:176b-19: phyir dgu'i bdag nyid kyi rdo rje 'dzin pa'i dkyil
T02D1190:176b-20: 'khor ro // rigs 'di nyid re re zhing de bzhin gshegs pa lngas byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
T02D1190:176b-21: lugs su 'byung ba dang lugs las bzlog pas de yang ji ltar zhe na /
T02D1190:176b-22: de ni yi ge'i dbye bas phye ba las te /
T02D1190:176b-23: yi ge ka la sogs pa sde tshan lnga'i yi
T02D1190:176b-24: ge re re zhing yang de bzhin gshegs pa lngas
T02D1190:176b-25: byin gyis brlabs pas gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed
T02D1190:176b-26: dang mnyam pa sgyu ma la sogs pa'i dpes bstan
T02D1190:176b-27: pa sku gsum gyi rang bzhin 'gro ba'i don bya
T02D1190:176b-28: ba la 'jug pa'i rgyu de bzhin gshegs pa thams
T02D1190:176b-29: cad kyi sku mkha' 'gro ma bdag med ma dang
T02D1190:176b-33: bstan zin pa nyid kyi don to //
T02D1190:176b-34: rdo rje gsum bsdu ba gsungs pa /
T02D1190:176b-35: sha chen s'a li dza zhes brjod //
T02D1190:176b-37: rang byung gi ye shes so //

T02D1190:177a-0: g-yung mo rdo rje'i rigs su @177a * //
