T02D1190:195b-0: bde ba 'khor lo ni bde ba chen po'i 'khor @195b lo nyid yin no //
T02D1190:195b-1: ji ltar yin pa gsungs pa /
T02D1190:195b-2: gang phyir bde chen 'khor lo spyi bor gnas pa mi g-yo ba'i rang bzhin la /
T02D1190:195b-4: phal chen yang 'di yin la dge 'dun yang 'di yin pas dge 'dun phal chen te /
T02D1190:195b-5: cher 'dus shing 'tshogs pas phung po dang khams dang skye mched la sogs pa bsdu ba'o //
T02D1190:195b-6: de 'di la yod par byas pas de yang bde
T02D1190:195b-7: ba chen po nyid yin te ngo bo nyid kyi
T02D1190:195b-8: sku'o // sku gsum yongs su rdzogs pa yang dag
T02D1190:195b-9: par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi ye shes ma lus
T02D1190:195b-10: par bsags pa'i rang bzhin gyi sku ma ning du
T02D1190:195b-12: sde pa bzhi'i gnas gsungs pa //
T02D1190:195b-13: lto ba gnas su brjod par bya //
T02D1190:195b-15: lto ba ni mngal chos 'byung gi mtha' na yod pa'o //
T02D1190:195b-16: dge gnas su ni gnas par brjod do //
T02D1190:195b-17: sde pa bzhi nyid gsungs pa //
T02D1190:195b-20: 'dod chags bral ba ni chags pa dang bral ba'i rang bzhin lhan cig skyes pa'o //
T02D1190:195b-21: 'dod chags dang bral ba rnams kyi chos gos gsungs pa /
T02D1190:195b-22: mngal gyi khru ma chos gos nyid ni khru mas gtums pa ste /
T02D1190:195b-23: gang du khru ma zhes rab tu grags pa'o //
T02D1190:195b-24: des gtums nas gnas pas so //
T02D1190:195b-25: de'i khru ma chos gos zhes pa ni bsgribs kyang
T02D1190:195b-26: gsal la sgrib pa med pa nyid sgrib pa yin
T02D1190:195b-27: pa'i don to // mkhan po gsungs pa /
T02D1190:195b-28: de bzhin ma ni mkhan po nyid //
T02D1190:195b-29: ma ni skyed ma ste de nyid mkhan po'o //
T02D1190:195b-30: gang gi phyir de'i bde ba'i ye shes nyid de shes pa'o //
T02D1190:195b-31: mgo bor thal mo sbyar ba phyag //
T02D1190:195b-32: gang gi phyir lhums na zhugs pa'i gnas skabs na
T02D1190:195b-33: lag pa gnyis spyi bor thal mo sbyar nas gnas

T02D1190:195b-35: sbyor du spyi bor bde ba chen po'i 'khor lor
T02D1190:195b-36: ro // phyag ni khams la mngon par 'dud pa'o //
T02D1190:195b-38: 'gro ba'i bya ba khrims kyi gnas //

T02D1190:195b-40: yang na bslab pa'i gzhi zhes pa ni rig pa nye bar len pa'i shes pa'o //
T02D1190:195b-41: 'gro ba'i bya ba zhes pa ni rdo rje gsum dbyer med pa'i ye shes so //
T02D1190:195b-42: sngags kyi bzlas pa gsungs pa /
T02D1190:196a-1: dang ham yid skyob par gyur pa'i phyir na sngags te /
T02D1190:196a-2: a'a li k'a li'i n'a da phreng gnyis so //
T02D1190:196a-3: de nyid bzlas pa ste de tshig gi mtshan ma'o //
T02D1190:196a-4: aa dang ham ni aa ham gyi yi ge'o //
T02D1190:196a-5: yang na yi ge aa dang ham gyi rang bzhin yin te /
T02D1190:196a-6: de bzhin zhes pa ni ji ltar 'gro ba'i bya ba de bzhin du aa ham ngo ;
T02D1190:196a-7: / ji ltar aa ham de bzhin du 'gro ba'i bya ba'o //
T02D1190:196a-8: skye gnas 'khor lo'i rnam pa aa //
T02D1190:196a-9: bde chen gyi yang rnam pa ham //
T02D1190:196a-10: gang skye gnas kyi 'khor lo'i yi ge aam ma ning la /
T02D1190:196a-11: de bde ba chen po'i yi ge ham ngo //
T02D1190:196a-12: gang bde ba chen po'i yi ge ham de ni skye gnas kyi 'khor lo'i yi ge aam ngo //
T02D1190:196a-13: 'dis ni gnyis ka sbyor ba las aa ham ngo //
T02D1190:196a-14: sngags kyi bzlas pa sgra'i rang bzhin sgra yang cha med pa'i cha'o //
T02D1190:196a-15: gcer bu skra dang kha spu bregs //
T02D1190:196a-16: sngags 'don skyes pa dge slong nyid //
T02D1190:196a-17: ces bya ba ni sla ba'i don to //
T02D1190:196a-18: yang na skyes pa zhes pa ni rdzogs pa ste
T02D1190:196a-19: skye ba dang bral ba gzod ma nas ma skyes
T02D1190:196a-21: dge slong nyid ni sangs rgyas te sprul pa'i sku'i rang bzhin no //
T02D1190:196a-22: sngags 'don pa zhes pa ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02D1190:196a-23: gcer bu zhes pa 'dis ni sgrib pa med pa'i
T02D1190:196a-24: mtha' chos kyi sku'i rang bzhin de yang bcom ldan
T02D1190:196a-25: 'das so // skra dang kha spu bregs zhes pa
T02D1190:196a-26: ni de nyid stobs kyi rang bzhin lhun gyis grub
T02D1190:196a-27: pas sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa yin par dgongs so
T02D1190:196a-28: 'das so // // 'di rnams rkyen gyis sems can rnams //
T02D1190:196a-29: sangs rgyas nyid du the tshom med //
T02D1190:196a-30: don ni gsal ba nyid do //
T02D1190:196a-32: 'di dag rkyen gyis sems can rnams sku gsung thugs rnams so //
T02D1190:196a-33: sangs rgyas nyid du the tshom med do //
T02D1190:196a-34: zla ba bcu ni sa rnams nyid //
T02D1190:196a-35: sems can sa bcu'i dbang phyug go //
T02D1190:196a-36: sems can rnams ni sa bcu pa gnas bcu rnams lnga po gnyis so //
T02D1190:196a-37: yang zla ba rtsis las 'das pas rigs mtha' yas pa yin par dgongs so //
T02D1190:196a-38: de nyid kyi phyir sa bcu'i dbang phyug ste /
T02D1190:196a-39: gnas bcu'i bdag po rnams sku gsum nyid ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin yin pa'i don to //
T02D1190:196a-40: de nas rnal 'byor ma bdag med ma la sogs pa'i lha mo thams cad la 'di ltar ste /
T02D1190:196b-1: / ri khrod lo ma can dang /
T02D1190:196b-2: ae ma'o bde ba la sogs pa ri rab kyi
T02D1190:196b-3: rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i rnal 'byor ma rnams
T02D1190:196b-5: mchog tu ngo mtshar du gyur cing /
T02D1190:196b-8: sa la 'gyel ba dang 'dar bar gyur to //
T02D1190:196b-9: de nas zhes pa ni rjes thogs su'o ;
T02D1190:196b-10: / thams cad ni bdag med ma la sogs pa'o //
T02D1190:196b-11: ae ma bde ba ni thog ma dang tha ma
T02D1190:196b-12: med pa'i rnal 'byor ma 'di la sogs pa ri
T02D1190:196b-13: rab kyi rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i rnal 'byor
T02D1190:196b-14: ma rnams tshig 'di rnams rna bas thos nas 'dar
T02D1190:196b-15: bar gyur cing skrag pa dang /
T02D1190:196b-17: sa la 'gyel ba rnams te 'dis ni byin rlabs bstan to //
T02D1190:196b-18: dkyil 'khor ba rnams kyang rnal 'byor ma rnams dang
T02D1190:196b-19: gnyis su med pa las khu bar gyur par bstan
T02D1190:196b-20: to // yang rdo rje can gyis lha mo de
T02D1190:196b-21: thams cad gzigs nas brlab pa'i phyir yang dag par
T02D1190:196b-22: to // bstod pa // rdo rje can ni rdo rje 'dzin pa'o //
T02D1190:196b-23: mi phyed pa'i ye shes can no //
T02D1190:196b-24: yang dag par bstod pa ni sgras bskul ma 'debs
T02D1190:196b-25: te yang bslang ba'i phyir ni spro ba'i phyir ro
T02D1190:196b-26: // lha mo de thams cad ces pa ni thabs
T02D1190:196b-27: kyi rang bzhin nyid de rnams shes rab yin pas
T02D1190:196b-30: sa dang chu rlung byin za yi //

T02D1190:196b-32: gang zhig sus kyang mi shes pa //
T02D1190:196b-33: de nyid nga yis spro yis nyon //
T02D1190:196b-34: nyon ni mtshan ma med par 'dzin pa las grol bar nyon cig pa'o //
T02D1190:196b-35: ci yin pa'i dogs pa bsu ba /
T02D1190:196b-36: de nyid spro yis ni spro ba'i de nyid kyang ngo //
T02D1190:196b-37: gang zhig ni gang yang ngo //
T02D1190:196b-38: sus kyang mi shes pa ni spros pa gang yang ngo //
T02D1190:196b-39: mi shes pa ni mi shes pa ste rten dang
T02D1190:196b-40: brten pa nyid kyi rnam par gzhag pa yin par
T02D1190:196b-41: dgongs so // bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung rmi lam lta bu nye bar thos nas /
T02D1190:196b-42: de dag thams cad srog rnyed par gyur to //
T02D1190:196b-43: bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung zhes pa ni sku gsum gcig pa'i sku'i gsung thos nas so //
T02D1190:196b-45: rmi lam lta bur bden pa yang ma yin brdzun pa yang ma yin par ro //
T02D1190:196b-46: de rnams thams cad srog rnyed par gyur to ni
T02D1190:196b-47: srog rnyed pa ste mtshan ma med pa nyid mtshan
T02D1190:196b-48: ma'i rang bzhin snyam du bsam pa chos kyi sku
T02D1190:197a-0: nyid longs spyod pa'i sku yin pas @197a * //
T02D1190:197a-1: sku gnyis dbyer med par gyur to //
T02D1190:197a-2: sku gnyis po de yang sprul pa'i sku dang dbyer med par bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1190:197a-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T02D1190:197a-4: sems can rnams ni sangs rgyas nyid //
T02D1190:197a-5: 'on kyang glo bur dri mas bsgribs //
T02D1190:197a-6: de nyid bsal nas sangs rgyas nyid //
T02D1190:197a-7: sems can rnams zhes pa ni srid gsum du gyur
T02D1190:197a-8: pa sprul pa'i sku dang dbyer med pa gnyis kyi
T02D1190:197a-9: sku can no // sangs rgyas nyid do //
T02D1190:197a-10: de ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi yon tan 'di rnams med pa yin pa gsungs pa /
T02D1190:197a-11: 'on kyang glo bur dri mas bsgribs ni glo bur gyi sgras ni 'brel med pa can no //
T02D1190:197a-12: de lta bur gyur pa dri ma ste dri ma
T02D1190:197a-13: lta bur gzung ba'i mngon par zhen pa phung po
T02D1190:197a-14: lnga rnams so // des bsgribs pa ni bsgribs par byas pa'o //
T02D1190:197a-15: de yang sems can rnams rang bzhin gyis dag pa'o //
T02D1190:197a-16: de skad du 'phags pa'i zhal snga nas /
T02D1190:197a-17: ji ltar nyi zla dri med kyang //
T02D1190:197a-18: sgra gcan kha sprin khug rna dang //
T02D1190:197a-19: rdul tshub dud sogs dri ma ni //
T02D1190:197a-20: dri ma lnga po rnams kyis bsgribs //
T02D1190:197a-21: de nyid bsal nas zhes pa ni //
T02D1190:197a-22: gzung ba'i mngon par zhen pa yongs su spangs pa'o //
T02D1190:197a-23: sangs rgyas zhes pa ni bstan pa'i mkha' 'gro mar 'dod par brjod do //
T02D1190:197a-24: de ltar bcom ldan 'das 'di bden pa yang ma mchis brdzun pa yang ma mchis te /
T02D1190:197a-25: gang bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa 'di bden pa yang ma yin brdzun pa yang ma yin pa'o //
T02D1190:197a-26: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T02D1190:197a-27: de dpes dben par sems can rnams sangs rgyas nyid yin par gsungs pa /
T02D1190:197a-28: gang zhig mi shes 'jig rten pa /
T02D1190:197a-29: btsan dug zos pas brgyal bar 'gyur //
T02D1190:197a-30: rmongs spangs de nyid yid kyis ni //
T02D1190:197a-31: de yi de nyid yongs su gcod //
T02D1190:197a-32: de bzhin zhi bzhi thabs shes shing //
T02D1190:197a-33: kye yi rdo rje nga la gson //
T02D1190:197a-34: ma rig sogs pas mi 'dzin cing //
T02D1190:197a-35: gti mug la sogs lci bas min //
T02D1190:197a-42: gang mi shes pa ste gang sems med pa dug
T02D1190:197a-43: gi de kho na nyid mi shes pa gang ngo
T02D1190:197b-0: // gang yang de nyid yid kyis ni dug gi de kho na nyid kyi @197b yid kyis so //
T02D1190:197b-1: de rmongs ni gti mug spangs par gyur pa'o //
T02D1190:197b-3: de'i de nyid ni de'i mchog go //
T02D1190:197b-4: yongs su gcod ni chad pa'o //
T02D1190:197b-6: dpe bstan nas don gsungs pa /
T02D1190:197b-7: de bzhin zhi ba'i thabs shes shing ni de bzhin
T02D1190:197b-8: du mya ngan las 'das pa'i thabs rig pa gang
T02D1190:197b-11: ma rig pa la sogs pas so //
T02D1190:197b-12: ma rig pa'i 'ching bas de 'ching ste /
T02D1190:197b-13: gang yang des dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i rgyud rnams thos na'o //
T02D1190:197b-14: gti mug la sogs bcing bas min //
T02D1190:197b-16: 'dzin pa yang min te mi 'dzin pa nyid yin pa'i don to //
T02D1190:197b-17: yang na de bzhin zhi ba'i thabs shes shing ngo //
T02D1190:197b-19: gang gi phyir dgyes pa'i rdo rje rnams thos pa
T02D1190:197b-20: byas pa ni spro ba'i rang bzhin gyi phyir mang
T02D1190:197b-21: po'i tshig go // spro ba yang de kho na nyid yin pa mi 'dzin te /
T02D1190:197b-23: gti mug la sogs pas bcings te ma rig pa la sogs pas so ;
T02D1190:197b-24: / cir gyur pas she na ma rig pa la sogs pas so //
T02D1190:197b-25: ma rig pa nyid gang dag gis dang po thog ma yin pa des te /
T02D1190:197b-26: ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed kun no zhes bya ba'i tshig gis so //
T02D1190:197b-27: sems can rnams ni sangs rgyas nyid //
T02D1190:197b-28: ces pa yid ces par gsungs pa /
T02D1190:197b-29: rang dang rang gi rtog pa las //
T02D1190:197b-30: sangs rgyas ma yin sems can ni //
T02D1190:197b-31: gcig kyang yod pa ma yin no //
T02D1190:197b-32: dmyal ba yi dags byol song dang //
T02D1190:197b-33: lha dang lha min mi rnams dang //
T02D1190:197b-34: bshad pa'i srin bu la sogs pa //
T02D1190:197b-35: lha dang lha ma yin gyi yang //
T02D1190:197b-36: bde ba gang phyir mi shes pa //
T02D1190:197b-37: rtag tu rang bzhin bde ba can //
T02D1190:197b-38: 'jig rten khams ni gang du yang //
T02D1190:197b-39: sangs rgyas gzhan du rnyed mi 'gyur //
T02D1190:197b-40: sangs rgyas ma yin pa'i sems can gcig kyang yod pa ma yin te /
T02D1190:197b-42: ji ltar zhe na rtogs pa las so //
T02D1190:197b-45: bdag nyid dang bdag nyid kyi dmyal ba la sogs sems can gyi 'gro ba yang ngo //
T02D1190:197b-46: rtag tu ni rgyun ma chad par ro //
T02D1190:197b-47: rang bzhin bde ba can ni rang bzhin las te /
T02D1190:197b-48: rang gi bde ba las yin par dgongs so //
T02D1190:197b-49: ji ltar yin pa gsungs pa /
T02D1190:198a-0: gang gi phyir dmyal ba la sogs pa'i sems can gyis @198a * //
T02D1190:198a-1: lha dang lha ma yin la sogs pa rnams kyi bde ba mi shes te /
T02D1190:198a-2: de ni rang bde bar rtogs pa'i phyir thams cad nyid sangs rgyas so //
T02D1190:198a-4: 'jig rten khams ni gang du ni srog chags rnams la'o //
T02D1190:198a-5: gang du yang ni gang yang ngo //
T02D1190:198a-6: sangs rgyas rnyed mi 'gyur ni mi 'thob pa'o //
T02D1190:198a-8: sems ni gang gi phyir sangs rgyas nyid do //
T02D1190:198a-9: sems las sangs rgyas gzhan du bstan du med de //
T02D1190:198a-10: sems kyi lus yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1190:198a-11: chos rnams thams cad kyi dmyal ba la sogs pa
T02D1190:198a-12: thams cad nyid kyang rang gi sems lus te 'di'i
T02D1190:198a-14: / sems nyid rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so //
T02D1190:198a-15: ji ltar shes par bya ba yin pa gsungs pa //
T02D1190:198a-16: gdol pa smyig ma mkhan la sogs //
T02D1190:198a-17: gsod don don du sems pa rnams //
T02D1190:198a-18: de yang dgyes rdo rje shes nas //
T02D1190:198a-20: gdol pa ni gsod pa'i las can no //
T02D1190:198a-21: smyig ma mkhan ni mda' mkhan no //
T02D1190:198a-23: gsod don gyis ni don gyi don te don ni dgos pa'o //
T02D1190:198a-24: sems par byed pas na de sems pa rnams te /
T02D1190:198a-25: rtag tu srog chags gsod pa la dga' ba'i phyir /
T02D1190:198a-26: 'di rnams kyi sangs rgyas nyid ni shin tu rgyad
T02D1190:198a-27: ring ba nyid de des kyang 'grub par 'gyur par
T02D1190:198a-30: dgyes rdo rje shes nas te /
T02D1190:198a-31: sems gcig pa'i lus su chos thams cad rtogs pa'o //
T02D1190:198a-32: 'on kyang glo bur dri mas bsgribs //
T02D1190:198a-33: zhes mdor bstan pa'i don gsungs pa //
T02D1190:198a-34: byis pa mi shes pas bsgribs pas //
T02D1190:198a-36: 'gro ba drug gi srid pa'i mthar //
T02D1190:198a-38: mi shes pas bsgribs pa ni chos rnams thams cad
T02D1190:198a-39: sems tsam nyid du gang gis mi shes pa de
T02D1190:198a-40: nyid sgrib pa'o // de nyid kyi phyir byis pa ni mi shes pa'o //
T02D1190:198a-42: sems nyid rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid /
T02D1190:198a-43: ces pa gang gis mi shes pa'o //
T02D1190:198a-44: de 'khor bar gyur ni yang dang yang du skye zhing 'gag pa'o //
T02D1190:198a-45: de nyid kyi phyir rmongs pa ste /
T02D1190:198a-46: ma rig pas bsgribs pa rnams so //
T02D1190:198a-47: gang du zhe na srid pa'i mthar te skye ba'i rgyur ro //
T02D1190:198b-0: skye ba nyid 'ching ba'i rgyu yin pa'i @198b phyir ro //
T02D1190:198b-2: 'gro ba drug ste lha la sogs pa 'gro ba drug gi rang bzhin la'o //
T02D1190:198b-3: de nyid bsal na sangs rgyas nyid //
T02D1190:198b-4: ces mdor bstan pa'i don gsungs pa //
T02D1190:198b-5: rdo rje snying po snying rje che //
T02D1190:198b-6: kye yi rdo rje'i thabs rnyed nas //
T02D1190:198b-7: gang zhig yul rnams rnam sbyong ba /
T02D1190:198b-10: // / des ni bla med rnyed par 'gyur //
T02D1190:198b-11: gang dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i rang bzhin gyi thabs rnyed
T02D1190:198b-12: nas yul rnams sbyong ba de bla na med pa
T02D1190:198b-13: rnyed de / bla na med pa yang dag par
T02D1190:198b-14: rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon du byed par 'gyur ro
T02D1190:198b-15: rnyed de / // de nyid kyi phyir yul rnams
T02D1190:198b-16: sbyang pa nyid de glo bur pa'i dri ma bsal
T02D1190:198b-17: ba nyid de'i yang thabs dgyes pa'i rdo rje nyid
T02D1190:198b-18: yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin no //
T02D1190:198b-19: dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i thabs kyis yul rnam par sbyong
T02D1190:198b-20: ba nyid dgyes pa rdo rje'i rang bzhin yul rnam
T02D1190:198b-22: sems 'ba' zhig khams gsum dang dbyer med pa'i dgyes pa'i rdo rje ste /
T02D1190:198b-24: de nyid kyi phyir sems can rnams ni sangs rgyas nyid du the tshom med do //
T02D1190:198b-25: sa ni pukka s'ir bshad pa //
T02D1190:198b-26: ji ltar mi bskyod phyag rgya lags //
T02D1190:198b-27: gang phyir gti mug sra ba nyid //
T02D1190:198b-28: sku ni rnam snang nyid gsungs pa //
T02D1190:198b-30: sngar rdo rje snying po'i bsngags pa gsungs pa //
T02D1190:198b-31: de nas rdo rje snying pos dgyes pa'i rdo rje
T02D1190:198b-32: nyid yul la sogs pa rnam par dag pa yin
T02D1190:198b-33: par sems la bzhag nas the tshom za bar gyur
T02D1190:198b-34: te // ji ltar mi bskyod phyag rgya lags //
T02D1190:198b-36: rgyu 'dis na zhus pa'i lan yang 'debs te /
T02D1190:198b-37: sku rdo rje ji ltar na thugs rdo rjer 'gyur zhes pa'o //
T02D1190:198b-38: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa //
T02D1190:198b-39: lus spangs nas ni sems kyis ni //
T02D1190:198b-40: mdzes pa gzhan du mi 'gyur ro //
T02D1190:198b-41: de phyir rnam par snang mdzad sems //
T02D1190:198b-42: sku la thugs kyi phyag rgyas gdab //
T02D1190:198b-43: de yi phyir lus nyid sems so //
T02D1190:198b-44: chu khams ri khrod mar bshad pa //
T02D1190:198b-45: mi bskyod khu ba'i gzugs can nyid //
T02D1190:198b-46: gtso bo mi bskyod phyag rgyas ni //
T02D1190:198b-47: ri khrod ma la phyag rgya rigs //
T02D1190:198b-48: ri khrod ma chu'i khams de la thugs kyis rgyas gdab par rigs te //
T02D1190:198b-49: 'dis ni gsung rdo rje nyid thugs rdo rje la //
T02D1190:198b-50: thugs rdo rje nyid gsung rdo rje ste //
T02D1190:198b-51: thugs kyi rdo rje yang sku rdo rje nyid yin no //
T02D1190:199a-2: sems spangs nas ni lus kyi ni //
T02D1190:199a-3: gnas pa gzhan du mthong mi 'gyur //
T02D1190:199a-4: de'i phyir sems ni gti mug 'gyur //
T02D1190:199a-5: thugs la gti mug phyag rgyas gdab //
T02D1190:199a-6: de'i phyir sems las tha dad pa'i lus ni mi dmigs te de bas na thugs nyid sku'o //
T02D1190:199a-7: de lta bas na sku gsung thugs nyid thugs so //
T02D1190:199a-8: sa'i rang bzhin gyi mkha' 'gro ma gnyis bstan nas
T02D1190:199a-9: me'i rang bzhin gyi gdol ba mo'i dbang du byas
T02D1190:199a-10: te gsungs pa / me ni gdol pa mor bshad pa /
T02D1190:199a-11: 'dod chags phyag rgyas gdol pa mo //
T02D1190:199a-12: rigs te phyag rgya gzhan min //
T02D1190:199a-13: ji ltar rin chen phyag rgya lags //
T02D1190:199a-14: gdol pa ma gsung rdo rjes rgyas gdab par rigs
T02D1190:199a-15: na ji ltar rin chen gtso bo'i rgyas gdab ces
T02D1190:199a-16: zhus pa'o // de la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T02D1190:199a-17: gang phyir 'dod chags khrag bshad pa //
T02D1190:199a-18: khrag ni rin chen 'byung ldan nyid //
T02D1190:199a-19: drod ni khrag gi rang bzhin phyir //
T02D1190:199a-20: 'dod chags ser sna'i phyag rgyas gdab //
T02D1190:199a-21: gang gi phyir 'dod chags ni khrag tu bshad pa'i khrag ni rin chen gtso bo'o //
T02D1190:199a-23: drod kyang khrag gi rang bzhin la //
T02D1190:199a-24: khrag kyang phra ma'i rang bzhin te //
T02D1190:199a-25: phra ma nga rgyal rdo rje yin //
T02D1190:199a-26: zhes pa'i tshig gis na thugs nyid kyis rgyas gdab pa yin par dgongs so //
T02D1190:199a-27: rlung gi khams kyi rang bzhin gyi g-yung mo'i dbang du byas te gsungs pa /
T02D1190:199a-28: gang phyir g-yung mo rlung nyid de //
T02D1190:199a-29: don yod rlung gi gzugs can nyid //
T02D1190:199a-30: don yod phyag rgyas g-yung mo la //
T02D1190:199a-31: gtso bo phyag rgya rigs par 'gyur //
T02D1190:199a-32: don yod grub pa'i phyag rgyas g-yung mo la rigs zhes zhus pa'o //
T02D1190:199a-34: 'dod chags ma gtogs khrag dog ni //
T02D1190:199a-35: gzhan du yod pa ma yin te //
T02D1190:199a-36: de phyir 'dod chags phyag rgya yis //
T02D1190:199a-37: mkhas pas g-yung mo phyag rgyas gdab //
T02D1190:199a-39: 'dod chags 'od dpag tu med pa gsung rdo rje
T02D1190:199a-40: de yang thugs rdo rje'i phyag rgya nyid rlung gi
T02D1190:199a-41: khams kyi rang bzhin gyi g-yung mo yang thugs yin
T02D1190:199a-42: par dgongs so // 'dis ci bstan na /
T02D1190:199a-43: phung po lnga'i rang bzhin gyi bdag med ma la sogs pa mkha' 'gro ma dang /
T02D1190:199a-44: sa la sogs pa 'byung ba chen po bzhi'i rang
T02D1190:199b-0: bzhin gyi pukka s'i la @199b sogs pa'i mkha' 'gro
T02D1190:199b-1: ma bzhi po thams cad nyid thugs kyi phyag rgyas
T02D1190:199b-2: gdab pa'o // mkha' 'gro ma gzhan bzhi po nyid
T02D1190:199b-3: thugs kyi rgyas gdab pa nyid yin pa gsungs pa
T02D1190:199b-4: gdab pa'o // / gang phyir gzugs ni sra ba nyid //
T02D1190:199b-5: dkar mo snang mdzad gsungs pa nyid //
T02D1190:199b-6: sngar gsungs nyid kyi rigs pa yis //
T02D1190:199b-7: sems kyi bdag pos phyag rgyas gdab //
T02D1190:199b-8: gzugs ni gti mug gi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir sra ba nyid de /
T02D1190:199b-9: de yang dkar mo snang mdzad gsungs pa nyid ni
T02D1190:199b-10: rnam par snang mdzad sku'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir
T02D1190:199b-11: ro // sngar gsungs nyid kyi zhes pa ni sku la thugs kyis rgyas gdab pa'o //
T02D1190:199b-12: de nyid rigs pas chom rkun ma //
T02D1190:199b-14: sgra'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir rin chen gtso bo'i
T02D1190:199b-15: rnam par dag pa 'od dpag tu med pa la
T02D1190:199b-16: 'od dpag med kyang mi bskyod pa'i rnam par dag
T02D1190:199b-17: pa'o // de bzhin ro langs ma nyid dang //
T02D1190:199b-19: dri'i rang bzhin 'od dpag tu med pa rnam par dag pa nyid mi bskyod pa'o //
T02D1190:199b-20: de yi rigs pas gha sma r'i //
T02D1190:199b-21: zhes pa ni ro'i rang bzhin don yod grub pa'i rnam par dag pa nyid mi bskyod pa'o //
T02D1190:199b-22: de las ma log rgyad gdab po //
T02D1190:199b-24: phyin ci ma log par bdag med ma la sogs pa'i rim pa nyid kyis yin par dgongs so //
T02D1190:199b-25: sa spyod ma dang mkha' spyod ma'i mkha' 'gro ma gnyis ni phyis gsal bar brjod par bya'o //
T02D1190:199b-26: sku gsung thugs rnams ni thugs kyi rang bzhin yin
T02D1190:199b-27: pas khongs su 'dus pa'i phyir mkha' 'gro ma gnyis
T02D1190:199b-28: logs shig tu ma smras pa'o //
T02D1190:199b-29: da ni sems tsam du gcig par rnam par rtog pa'i phyir sangs rgyas nyid yin te //
T02D1190:199b-30: glo bur gyi dri mas bsgribs pa'i sems can rnams
T02D1190:199b-31: ji ltar gtor ma chen po dang mchod pa chen
T02D1190:199b-32: po bya ba yin zhing dbang po thams cad tshim
T02D1190:199b-33: pa ji ltar yin pa blo la bzhag nas gsungs
T02D1190:199b-34: pa / dgyes pa'i rdo rje rdo rje 'dzin //
T02D1190:199b-35: snyoms 'jug gnas pa'i lha nyid la //
T02D1190:199b-36: sems can don phyir gtor ma che //
T02D1190:199b-37: de la bdag med mas zhus pa //
T02D1190:199b-38: snyoms 'jug ces pa ni gnyis su med par rtogs pa'i kun rdzob kyi bdag nyid do //
T02D1190:199b-39: dgyes pa'i rdo rje ni bsdu ba'i bdag nyid do //
T02D1190:199b-40: rdo rje 'dzin zhes pa ni bden pa gnyis dbyer med pa'o /
T02D1190:200a-0: de la ni rnam par gzhag pa de la bdag @200a * //
T02D1190:200a-2: gtor ma che ni yang dag pa'i mchod pa'o //
T02D1190:200a-3: sems can don phyir ni srid gsum du gyur pa rnams kyi phyir ro //
T02D1190:200a-4: ae wam rnam par bzhugs nas ni //
T02D1190:200a-5: bgegs dang log par 'dren pa las //
T02D1190:200a-6: sems can rnams kyi srog bsrung phyir //
T02D1190:200a-7: rdo rje sems dpas gtor ma bstan //
T02D1190:200a-8: ae wam rnam par zhes pa ni kha sbyor gyi rnal 'byor ro //
T02D1190:200a-9: de nyid kyi phyir bzhugs nas ni ste dam tshig gi tshul las ma 'das pa'o //
T02D1190:200a-10: de nyid kyi phyir rdo rje sems dpa'o //
T02D1190:200a-11: gtor ma ni mchod pa sbyar ba'o //
T02D1190:200a-13: sems can rnams kyi ni sku gsum gyi rang bzhin rnams kyi'o //
T02D1190:200a-14: srog bsrung phyir ni rnam par shes pa tsam du rtogs par bya ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1190:200a-15: ci'i phyir zhe na bgegs dang ste dbang por rnams las so //
T02D1190:200a-16: log par 'dren pa las ni sems las so //
T02D1190:200a-43: aom aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dharm'a n'am a'a dya nudpa nna tv'a ta /
T02D1190:200a-44: aom a'a h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D1190:200a-45: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'an badzra sva bh'a wa a'atma
T02D1190:200a-46: ko nya ham zhes pas stong pa nyid rnam par
T02D1190:200a-47: bsgoms nas / de'i nang du yi ge aa dmar
T02D1190:200a-48: po bsgoms la de yongs su gyur pa las thod
T02D1190:200a-49: pa 'dab ma brgyad pa rnam par bsgoms la de'i
T02D1190:200a-50: nang du bhr'um a'aim dzr'am kham h'um yongs su gyur
T02D1190:200a-51: pa las rnam par snang mdzad dang /
T02D1190:200a-56: bi ra shu ma mu'i yi ge lnga yongs su gyur pa las sam /
T02D1190:200a-57: gro ku da ha na la sogs pa yang ngo //
T02D1190:200a-58: de'i 'og tu du ba lta bu'i yi ge yam dang /
T02D1190:200a-59: khrag lta bu'i yi ge ram bsgoms pa las rlung
T02D1190:200a-60: dang me gnyis 'bar bar bsgoms shing me des bsgol
T02D1190:200a-61: bas gcig tu gyur nas khu bar zhu bar blta'o
T02D1190:200a-62: // de'i steng du yi ge h'um nag po de
T02D1190:200a-63: yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje ra bltas la
T02D1190:200a-64: // / de'i nang du de bzhin gshegs pa lnga rnams dang /
T02D1190:200a-65: lha mo rnams dmigs la rdo rje dang lhan cig tu zhu bar bltas nas /
T02D1190:200a-66: thod pa de'i steng du yi ge aam dkar po
T02D1190:200b-0: @200b de yongs su gyur pa las zla ba'i dkyil
T02D1190:200b-1: 'khor bltas la / de yang der khu bar zhu bar gyur par bltas te /
T02D1190:200b-2: aom a'a: h'um zhes pa'i yi ge gsum gyis gtor ma bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin rdzogs par bya'o //
T02D1190:200b-3: de'i rjes su rang gi snying gar snying gar yi
T02D1190:200b-4: ge h'um yongs su gyur pa las padma 'dab ma
T02D1190:200b-5: brgyad pa mngon par bltas te /
T02D1190:200b-6: dbang po la sogs pa'i phyogs kyi 'dab ma sogs
T02D1190:200b-7: pa rnams la dbang po la sogs pa dgod par
T02D1190:200b-8: bya'o // de la shar du dbang po mig stong
T02D1190:200b-9: pa mdog ser po rin po che'i cod pan can
T02D1190:200b-10: phyag na rdo rje bsnams pa glang po che la
T02D1190:200b-11: bya'o // zhon pa'o // lho'i 'dab ma la gshin
T02D1190:200b-12: rje dbyug pa bsnams pa mdog nag po rin po
T02D1190:200b-13: che'i cod pan can ma he la zhon pa'o //
T02D1190:200b-14: dza la zhes pa ni nub tu chu bdag dkar
T02D1190:200b-15: po lag na zhags pa thogs pa rin che'i cod
T02D1190:200b-16: pan can chu srin la zhon pa'o //
T02D1190:200b-17: byang du gnod sbyin ser po rin po che'i cod
T02D1190:200b-18: pan can lag na rtse gsum pa thogs pa stag
T02D1190:200b-19: gi pags pa'i sham thabs can /
T02D1190:200b-20: lus la thal bas byugs pa sprul gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa /
T02D1190:200b-21: zla ba'i 'od dang ldan pa khyu mchog la zhon pa'o //
T02D1190:200b-22: me ni shin tu ser ba gsus pa 'phyang ba /
T02D1190:200b-23: mi'u thug gi rnam par can ra skyes la zhon pa /
T02D1190:200b-24: bgrang 'phreng dang ril ba spyi blugs bsnams pa //
T02D1190:200b-25: ral pa'i cod pan can nyi ma'i gdan dang nyi ma'i 'od dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1190:200b-26: rlung ni ras bsnams pa phyag na rlung gi rgyal
T02D1190:200b-27: mtshan thogs pa nag po rin po che'i cod pan
T02D1190:200b-28: can ri dags la zhon pa zla ba'i gdan can
T02D1190:200b-29: zla ba'i 'od dang ldan pa rgyan thams can kyis
T02D1190:200b-30: brgyan pa bgrang phreng dang ril ba spyi blugs bsnams
T02D1190:200b-31: pa'o ; / srin po dbu skra ser po gyen
T02D1190:200b-32: du 'khyil pa gri gug dang thod pa bsnams pa
T02D1190:200b-33: khro ba smin ma khro gnyer can gnag pa'o //
T02D1190:200b-34: de'i rjes su longs spyod kyi 'khor lor aom dkar
T02D1190:200b-35: po yongs su gyur pa las padma dkar po 'dab
T02D1190:200b-36: ma bzhi pa de'i g-yon pa'i 'dab ma la zla
T02D1190:200b-37: ba dkar po rta dkar po la zhon pa /
T02D1190:200b-38: rin po che'i cod pan can lag na ku mud
T02D1190:200b-39: thogs pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa zla ba'i
T02D1190:200b-40: gdan dang rgyab yol can no //
T02D1190:200b-42: nyi ma dmar po phyag bzhi pa padma bsnams pa rta sngon po la bcibs pa /
T02D1190:201a-0: rin po che'i cod pan can rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa @201a * //
T02D1190:201a-1: nyi ma'i gdan dang 'od can no //
T02D1190:201a-2: m'a da zhes pa ni ma sa'i lha ser po mdzes pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa /
T02D1190:201a-3: lag na bum pa thogs pa zla ba'i gdan dang 'od can no //
T02D1190:201a-4: nub kyi 'dab ma la pa ppa zhes pa ni
T02D1190:201a-5: pha tshangs pa de yang ser po bgrang phreng dang
T02D1190:201a-7: ral pa'i cod pan can dang pa la zhon pa
T02D1190:201a-8: gsus khyim che ba zla ba'i gdan dang 'od can
T02D1190:201a-9: no // de yang ta la p'a t'a le /
T02D1190:201a-10: aatta sappa zhes pa ni shar la sogs pa'i 'dab ma la rigs ldan dang /
T02D1190:201a-13: nor rgyas kyi bu dmar po /
T02D1190:201a-14: padma dang padma chen po ni dkar po /
T02D1190:201a-15: stobs kyi rgyu dang mtha' yas dag ni ser po
T02D1190:201a-16: dang sngon po 'di rnams ni rin po che'i cod
T02D1190:201a-17: pan can / mi'i gdong pa can rgyan thams cad
T02D1190:201a-18: kyis brgyan pa lus po sprul gyi lus 'di rnams
T02D1190:201a-19: sprul pa'i 'khor lo la yi ge aa yongs su
T02D1190:201a-20: gyur pa las padma mdog dmar po 'dab ma brgyad
T02D1190:201a-21: pa bltas la shar la sogs pa'i 'dab ma rnams
T02D1190:201a-22: la rim par gnas par gzhag par bya'o //
T02D1190:201a-40: zhes pas snyan mnan nas dril bu dkrol ba sngon du 'gro bas /
T02D1190:201a-41: mchod yon dang zhabs bsil phul nas /
T02D1190:201a-42: yi ge h'um gis mi bskyod pa lta bur rdzogs
T02D1190:201a-43: pa las dbang po la sogs pa brgyad pa lta'o
T02D1190:201a-44: // yi ge aom las rnam par snang mdzad lta
T02D1190:201a-45: bu rdzogs pa zla ba la sogs pa rnams blta'o
T02D1190:201a-46: // // yi ge a'a: las 'od dpag tu med
T02D1190:201a-47: pa lta bur rdzogs pa rigs ldan la sogs pa
T02D1190:201a-48: rnams bltas nas lha rnams dang rnal 'byor ba'i lce
T02D1190:201a-49: la h'um nag po las rdo rje'i lce'i 'od zer
T02D1190:201a-50: gyi sbu gus drangs pa'i bdud rtsi gtor ma'i yo
T02D1190:201a-51: byad gsol bar changs pa la sogs pa rnams bsams
T02D1190:201a-52: nas dgongs pa yid la byas te /
T02D1190:201a-53: de nas ai dam ba lim /
T02D1190:201a-68: zhes pa dal bar brjod cing dril bu gsil bar bya'o //
T02D1190:201a-69: de nas rang dang gzhan gyi mngon par 'dod pa'i
T02D1190:201a-70: don gsol ba btab la 'thor 'thung la sogs pa
T02D1190:201a-71: phul nas gshegs su gsol bar bya'o //
T02D1190:201a-72: aom aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dharm'a n'am a'a
T02D1190:201b-0: dya nu dbanna tv'a ta aom @201b a'a: h'um phat
T02D1190:201b-1: sv'a h'a / mu: zhes pas dril bu gsil zhing gshegs su gsol bar bya'o //
T02D1190:201b-2: de ltar gtor ma byin pa'i dgos pa ci yin par gsungs pa /
T02D1190:201b-3: gal te gtor ma 'dis 'byung po thams cad mchod
T02D1190:201b-4: par byed na rnal 'byor pa rnams legs par 'gyur
T02D1190:201b-5: ro // de'i tshe de rnams la bde ba dri
T02D1190:201b-6: ma med pa nyid du 'gyur ba dang lha rnams
T02D1190:201b-7: mnyes pa dang 'gro ba rab tu 'byor par 'gyur
T02D1190:201b-8: ro // ro // gal te 'dir 'byung po'i tshogs
T02D1190:201b-9: kyi phyir rtag tu gtor ma byin na dbang dang
T02D1190:201b-10: mngon spyod dang dgra'i sde 'jig pa dang /
T02D1190:201b-13: dgug pa dang zhi ba dang rgyas par yang 'gyur ro //
T02D1190:201b-14: gtor ma 'dis zhes pa ni rdo rje gsum dbyer
T02D1190:201b-15: med pa 'dis bdud rtsi lnga ye shes lnga'i rang
T02D1190:201b-17: gal te 'byung po thams cad mchod par byed na legs par 'gyur ro //
T02D1190:201b-18: gang zhe na rnal 'byor pa ste /
T02D1190:201b-19: de kho na nyid dang ldan pa rnams so //
T02D1190:201b-20: de'i tshe de rnams la ni 'byung po thams cad la'o //
T02D1190:201b-21: bde ba ni phul du byung ba gzhan med pa'i bde ba'o //
T02D1190:201b-23: lha ni dbang po la sogs pa'o //
T02D1190:201b-24: yang na mdzes pas na lha rnams te me long
T02D1190:201b-25: lta bu la sogs pa'i ye shes lnga rnams so
T02D1190:201b-26: // de mnyes pas ni mnyes par gyur pa'o //
T02D1190:201b-27: de nyid kyi phyir 'gro ba rnams ni de rnams la'o //
T02D1190:201b-28: 'byor par 'gyur ro ni dbang phyug la sogs pa'i yon tan ma lus pa skye ba'o //
T02D1190:201b-29: dbang dang mngon spyod la sogs pa yang mthong ba'i chos las 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1190:201b-30: gal te 'byung po'i tshogs kyi phyir rtag tu ni rgyun du'o //
T02D1190:201b-32: yang na dbang du bya ba ni bsdu ba'o //
T02D1190:201b-34: dgra'i sde ni gti mug la sogs pa'i mi shes pa'i yon tan rnams so //
T02D1190:201b-35: de rnams kyi 'jigs pa dang bskrad pa ni spro ba dang bsdu ba'o //
T02D1190:201b-36: dgug pa zhes pa ni gnyi ga yang bsres par
T02D1190:201b-37: byas pa spro ba dang bsdu ba dbyer med par
T02D1190:201b-39: zhi ba zhes pa ni yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i go 'phang ngo //
T02D1190:201b-40: bag chags la thug pa'i nyes pa rtsad nas bton pa'o //
T02D1190:202a-0: bde ba zhes pa ni 'di nyid yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub @202a * //
T02D1190:202a-2: de nyid ci 'dra ba cig yin zhe na /
T02D1190:202a-3: rgyas par te rnam pa bcu gnyis su chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar nus pa'o //
T02D1190:202a-4: 'di ji ltar yin zhe na gsungs pa /
T02D1190:202a-5: gal te gtor ma sbyin na ste /
T02D1190:202a-6: aom a'a: h'um zhes pa'i yi ge las byung ba'i rdo rje gsum ste gal te byin na ste ;
T02D1190:202a-7: / de tsam gyis rtog pa yang mi skye ba'o //
T02D1190:202a-8: de ci'i phyir yin pa gsungs /
T02D1190:202a-10: brtsis pas ni tshogs rnams te phung po lnga rnams so //
T02D1190:202a-11: 'byung po ni yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin
T02D1190:202a-12: te shin tu rnam par dag pa chos kyi dbyings
T02D1190:202a-14: 'byung po yang de yin la tshogs kyang de yin pas 'byung po'i tshogs so //
T02D1190:202a-15: de'i phyir ni de'i don du'o //
T02D1190:202a-16: de yang rtag tu ni rgyun ma chad par rtag tu yin pa'i don to //
T02D1190:202a-17: rdo rje gsum nyid mngon par gsal bar bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1190:202a-18: rdo rje snying pos gsol pa /
T02D1190:202a-19: phyag rgya gang gis mkha' spyod ma //
T02D1190:202a-20: phyag rgya gang gis sa spyod ma //
T02D1190:202a-21: gtso bo bdag gis sngar ma 'tshal //
T02D1190:202a-22: bcom ldan ji ltar phyag rgya bgyi //
T02D1190:202a-23: de skad du zhus pa la /
T02D1190:202a-24: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T02D1190:202a-25: sku gsum 'khor lo'i dbus su ni //
T02D1190:202a-26: sku gsung thugs su phye ba las //
T02D1190:202a-27: steng dang 'og dang dbus gnas kyi //
T02D1190:202a-28: 'khor lo'i dbus su rnam par gnas //
T02D1190:202a-29: sku gsum zhes pa ni 'di gsum kun rdzob kyi bden pa'o //
T02D1190:202a-30: de yang 'khor lo'i dbus su ni 'khor lo'i dbus rnams la ste /
T02D1190:202a-31: sprul pa dang longs spyod rdzogs pa dang chos kyi
T02D1190:202a-32: sku rnams kyi nang du aom a'a: h'um zhes pa'i
T02D1190:202a-34: gsang ba gsum ji ltar zhe na /
T02D1190:202a-35: 'og dang steng dang dbus gnas kyi //
T02D1190:202a-36: 'khor lo'i dbus su rnam par gnas //
T02D1190:202a-38: sa spyod sku yi phyag rgya can //
T02D1190:202a-39: 'og zhal sku yi rdo rje ma //
T02D1190:202a-40: mkha' spyod 'dod chags phyag rgya can //
T02D1190:202a-41: steng zhal gsung gi rdo rje ma /
T02D1190:202a-42: sku rdo rje'i rang bzhin sa spyod ma'o //
T02D1190:202a-43: gsung rdo rje'i rang bzhin mkha' spyod ma'o //
T02D1190:202a-44: thugs rdo rje can yang bdag med ma ste /
T02D1190:202a-45: sems bdag med ma'i tshul can rang bzhin med pa'i rang bzhin gyis ye shes so //
T02D1190:202a-47: sems ni dbus kyi gnas su ste /
T02D1190:202a-48: des na bdag med ma dbus skyes /
T02D1190:202b-0: @202b 'on kyang gnyis su med pa'i rang bzhin gsang
T02D1190:202b-1: ba gsum gyi rang bzhin nyid rdo rje gsum ste
T02D1190:202b-2: gzugs kyi phung po la sogs pa rnam par dag
T02D1190:202b-3: pa rdo rje ma la sogs pa'o //
T02D1190:202b-5: rgyas par rab tu phye ba las //
T02D1190:202b-6: rigs ni rnam pa drug tu brjod //
T02D1190:202b-7: rnam gsum rnam pa lnga nyid kyang //
T02D1190:202b-8: bshad kyis rnal 'byor ma rnams nyon //
T02D1190:202b-9: mi bskyod rnam snang rin chen 'byung //
T02D1190:202b-10: dpag med phrag dog rdo rje sems //
T02D1190:202b-11: zhe sdang gti mug ser sna dang //
T02D1190:202b-12: 'dod chags phrag dog bde ba dag / rim pa 'dis ni bsgom pa nyid //
T02D1190:202b-14: bdag med ma dang rdo rje ma dang chu ma dang /
T02D1190:202b-15: rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dang mi bskyod pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa lnga rnams so //
T02D1190:202b-16: sku gsung thugs dbyer med pa'i rdo rje sems dpa'o //
T02D1190:202b-18: de ltar rigs drug rnams te de bzhin du phyi rol du drug ste /
T02D1190:202b-19: rim pa la gnas pa'i mkha' 'gro ma brgyad ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin rnam lnga'o //
T02D1190:202b-20: rdo rje gsum dbyer med pa gsum mo //
T02D1190:202b-21: 'dis ni zhe sdang la sogs pa drug ni rang bzhin rnams de ltar gnyi ga drug ste /
T02D1190:202b-22: mi bskyod pa la sogs pa zhe sdang la sogs pa rnam par dag pa rnams /
T02D1190:202b-23: de ltar gnyi ga dbyer med pas ye shes drug rnams so //
T02D1190:202b-24: bco brgyad kyi rang bzhin rnams rdo rje gsum dbyer med pa'i rigs drug tu 'gyur ro //
T02D1190:202b-25: rgyas par rab tu phye ba las ni bstan pas so //
T02D1190:202b-27: rim pas bsgom ni snyoms par 'jug pa'i rang bzhin rnams so //
T02D1190:202b-28: rigs drug po de rnams nyid rigs lnga rnam pa lnga yin par gsungs pa /
T02D1190:202b-29: rdo rje sems dpa' spangs nas ni //
T02D1190:202b-31: sa spyod ma dang mkha' spyod ma gnyis dbyer med
T02D1190:202b-32: pa de bdag med rnal 'byor ma'i rang bzhin te
T02D1190:202b-33: 'di'i phyir rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba srid
T02D1190:202b-34: pa gsum gcig par gyur pa rnal 'byor ma bdag
T02D1190:202b-36: rdo rje sems dpa' spangs nas so //
T02D1190:202b-37: phyi nas ni rjes thogs su'o //
T02D1190:202b-38: rnam pa lnga ni de bzhin du phyi rol gyi
T02D1190:202b-39: rim par gnas pa'i rnal 'byor ma gsum rdo rje
T02D1190:202b-40: gsum dbyer med pas mkha' 'gro ma lnga'i khongs su
T02D1190:203a-2: gnyi ga'i ye shes las skyes pa ye shes lnga yin te bco lnga'o //
T02D1190:203a-3: de nyid rdo rje gsum dbyer med pa bden pa'i rnam pa'i rigs yin no //
T02D1190:203a-4: de rjes rnam pa gsum du 'gyur //
T02D1190:203a-5: 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug gis //
T02D1190:203a-6: mkha' 'gro ma lnga po de yang de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i rang bzhin rnams kyi rigs gsum ste /
T02D1190:203a-8: don yod grub pa dang rnam par snang mdzad dang /
T02D1190:203a-9: 'od dpag tu med pa sku dang gsung gi rang
T02D1190:203a-10: bzhin dag gti mug dang 'dod chags kyi bdag nyid
T02D1190:203a-11: dag gi nang du zhugs pas so //
T02D1190:203a-12: de ltar phyi rol gyi rim par gnas pa yang
T02D1190:203a-13: gsum po gnyi ga dbyer med pas bskyed pa'i ye
T02D1190:203a-15: rdo rje dbyer med pas rigs gsum ste /
T02D1190:203a-16: 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug gi rdo rje gsum gyi ye shes kyi zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1190:203a-17: rnal 'byor ma nyon zhes snyan mnan nas de thams cad nyid rnal 'byor ma yin pa'i don te /
T02D1190:203a-18: rang bzhin gyis grub pa'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pa
T02D1190:203a-19: nyid bdag med ma ste snyan mnan pa de gsal
T02D1190:203a-20: bar byas pa / mi bskyod zhe sdang gzugs can gyi //
T02D1190:203a-21: thugs kyi bdag po rigs gcig nyid //
T02D1190:203a-22: sku dang gsung thabs dang shes rab kyi rang bzhin
T02D1190:203a-23: gyis gnyi ga sbyor ba gcig pa nyid rigs te
T02D1190:203a-24: / de thugs kyi bdag po ni thugs kyi rang bzhin no //
T02D1190:203a-25: gtso bo ni skyes pa dang ma ning nyid de
T02D1190:203a-26: de nyid mi bskyod pa ni mi g-yo ba'i rang
T02D1190:203a-27: bzhin de bzhin nyid kyi rnam pa'o //
T02D1190:203a-28: de nyid kyi phyir mi bskyod gzugs can te /
T02D1190:203a-29: rtog pa thams cad dang rnam par rtog pa las 'das pa'i phyir yang dag pa'i ye shes so //
T02D1190:203a-30: 'di zhe sdang rdo rje'i mthu stobs yin par gsungs pa /
T02D1190:203a-31: zhe sdang rdo rje byin rlabs 'di //
T02D1190:203a-32: rigs ni drug dang lnga ru 'dod //
T02D1190:203a-33: khyad par 'phags pa'i dngos po ni mthu stobs te /
T02D1190:203a-34: 'di zhe sdang yang yin la rdo rje yang yin pas zhe sdang rdo rje'o //
T02D1190:203a-35: de nyid byin rlabs ni thugs kyi bdag nyid mi bskyod pa'i gzugs so //
T02D1190:203a-37: gnyis su med pas gnyis so //
T02D1190:203a-38: gcig nyid kyi phyir gcig go //
T02D1190:203a-39: gcig kyang yod pa ma yin pa ni bzhi pa'o //
T02D1190:203b-0: 'di @203b nyid rnam pa gnyis dang rnam pa gsum dang 'di nyid bzhi pa ste /
T02D1190:203b-1: gcig dang du ma'i don gyis gnyis su med pa'i rang bzhin de dang gsum gyis so //
T02D1190:203b-2: drug ces pa ni rigs drug go //
T02D1190:203b-3: lnga zhes pa ni yang dag pa'i ye shes so //
T02D1190:203b-4: 'dis ni gcig nyid drug gi rang bzhin la drug
T02D1190:203b-5: nyid gcig gi rang bzhin yin pas gnyis su med
T02D1190:203b-6: cing gnyis su byar med so so ma yin zhing
T02D1190:203b-8: rdo rje sbos mo dkar mo dang //
T02D1190:203b-9: sa ni rnam snang bdag nyid kyi //
T02D1190:203b-10: dkar mo chom rkun gdol pa mo //
T02D1190:203b-11: me ni rin chen phyag rgyas gdab //
T02D1190:203b-12: ri khrod chu ma ro langs ma //
T02D1190:203b-13: chu khams 'od dpag med dbang phyug / rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma g-yung mo //
T02D1190:203b-14: gha sma r'i yang de bzhin 'dod //
T02D1190:203b-15: de bzhin sa spyod mkha' spyod ma //
T02D1190:203b-16: rlung gi khams ni rta ru bshad //
T02D1190:203b-17: mkha' 'gro bdag med ma nyid kyang //
T02D1190:203b-18: nam mkha'i khams su zhe sdang brjod //
T02D1190:203b-19: dbang po dang ni 'byung ba chen //
T02D1190:203b-20: yul zhes bya ba de ru 'dod //
T02D1190:203b-21: rnam par shes pa gsum nyid gcig / sbyor ba las ni gnyis kyang ngo //
T02D1190:203b-22: phung po lnga po re re zhing //
T02D1190:203b-23: phung po lnga yi rang bzhin can //
T02D1190:203b-24: 'byung ba chen po sa la sogs //
T02D1190:203b-25: re re'ang 'byung ba lnga yi bdag / gzugs la sogs pa'i yul rnams lnga //
T02D1190:203b-26: re re'ang lnga yi rang bzhin can //
T02D1190:203b-27: 'di'i phyir gzugs la sogs phung po //
T02D1190:203b-28: gang yang 'byung ba chen po rnams //
T02D1190:203b-29: gang yang gzugs la sogs pa'i yul //
T02D1190:203b-30: ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin nyid //
T02D1190:203b-31: zhe sdang rdo rje'i rang bzhin rnams //
T02D1190:203b-32: ye shes lnga las gzhan ma yin //
T02D1190:203b-33: zhe sdang rdo rje'i byin rlabs 'di //
T02D1190:203b-34: rigs ni drug dang lnga ru 'dod //
T02D1190:203b-36: rgyud thams cad kyi phyag rgya bsdus pa'i don zhes bya ba'i rim par phye ba ste bzhi pa'o //
T02D1190:203b-37: rgyud thams cad kyi sgras ni ma lus par bye
T02D1190:203b-38: brag tu bshad pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'o
T02D1190:203b-39: // de'i phyag rgya ni mtshan ma'o //
T02D1190:203b-40: rgyud thams cad kyi phyag rgya de yang phyag rgya
T02D1190:203b-41: bsdus pa'i tshul gyis spro ba'i ngo bo'i don to
T02D1190:203b-43: rim par phye ba bzhi pa'o ni rim par phye
T02D1190:203b-44: ba bcu gcig dang lhan cig pa'i mkha' 'gro ma
T02D1190:203b-45: bco lnga bsdu ba'i rim par phye ba bzhi pa'o
T02D1190:204a-0: // dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i rnam par bshad pa rab tu gsal ba'i kha sbyor gyi rgya @204a * //
T02D1190:204a-1: cher 'grel pa las le'u bzhi pa'o /
T02D1190:204a-3: // / zhe sdang rdo rje'i byin rlabs 'di zhe sdang
T02D1190:204a-4: rdo rje nyid gang ci 'dra ba cig ces bdag
T02D1190:204a-5: med mas zhus pa'i sgo nas /
T02D1190:204a-6: zhe sdang rdo rje'i rang bzhin gsungs pa /
T02D1190:204a-7: phyag ni bcu drug zhal brgyad pa //
T02D1190:204a-8: zhabs bzhi pa dang 'jigs pa po //
T02D1190:204a-9: dpa' bo thod pa'i phreng ba can //
T02D1190:204a-10: bdag med mas ni sku la 'khyud //
T02D1190:204a-11: phyag rgya lnga ni 'dzin lha la //
T02D1190:204a-12: bdag med ma ni nyid kyis zhus //
T02D1190:204a-13: bco lngas yongs su bskor ba yi //
T02D1190:204a-14: bdag gi 'khor lo khyed bshad na //
T02D1190:204a-15: khyod kyi 'khor lo ji ltar lags //
T02D1190:204a-16: bcom ldan bdag gis sngar ma 'tshal //
T02D1190:204a-17: zhabs bzhi pa dang 'jigs pa po //
T02D1190:204a-19: bdud bzhi btul ba nyid kyis so //
T02D1190:204a-20: thod pa'i phreng ba can zhes pa ni ye shes
T02D1190:204a-21: lnga dang sku gsum gyi rang bzhin des na ye
T02D1190:204a-22: shes mtha' yas pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro
T02D1190:204a-23: // dpa' bo zhes pa ni phas kyi rgol bas mi tshugs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1190:204a-24: bdag med ma la 'o mdzad nas //
T02D1190:204a-25: rdo rje thod par stsal nas ni //
T02D1190:204a-26: lha yi nu ma mnye mdzad de //
T02D1190:204a-27: dkyil 'khor yang dag rab tu dbye //
T02D1190:204a-28: bdag med ma la 'o mdzad nas ni dga' ba'o //
T02D1190:204a-29: rdo rje thod par stsal nas ni mchog tu dga' ba'o //
T02D1190:204a-30: nu ma mnye mdzad de ni rnam par dga' ba'o //
T02D1190:204a-31: mdzes pas na lha ste lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'o //
T02D1190:204a-32: de lta bu'i dga' ba bzhi'i rang bzhin gyi dkyil
T02D1190:204a-33: 'khor yang dag par rab tu dbye ni nges 'od
T02D1190:204a-34: gsal bar rnam par gzhag go //
T02D1190:204a-35: 'khor lo ji ltar sngar gsungs pa /
T02D1190:204a-36: dra ba dra ba phyed pas brgyan /
T02D1190:204a-37: mtshams bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa //
T02D1190:204a-38: rdo rje srang bus yang dag brgyan //
T02D1190:204a-39: 'dod chags chen pos rjes chags pas //
T02D1190:204a-40: lhan cig skyes dga'i rang bzhin las //
T02D1190:204a-41: khyod dang lhan cig bzhin bzangs ma //
T02D1190:204a-42: de la dbus su da yod de //
T02D1190:204a-43: 'khor lo ji ltar sngar gsungs pa //
T02D1190:204a-44: zhes pa ni rim par phye ba gsum par gsungs pa'i /
T02D1190:204a-45: dang por byams pa bsgom par bya //
T02D1190:204a-46: zhes bya ba la sogs pa tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bsgom pa'o //
T02D1190:204a-48: dang por stong pa'i byang chub ste //
T02D1190:204a-49: zhes bya ba la sogs pa /
T02D1190:204a-50: bzhi pa la ni yig 'bru dgod //
T02D1190:204a-51: ces pa'i bar gyis gsungs pa dang /
T02D1190:204a-52: ram las nyi ma sngon bsgoms nas //
T02D1190:204a-53: zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang //
T02D1190:204b-0: ra @204b ba dang gur bcing pa yang rnam par
T02D1190:204b-1: bsgom pa nyid ces pa'i bar gyis gang gsungs pa
T02D1190:204b-2: dang / de thams cad sems la bzhag nas de'i
T02D1190:204b-3: rjes su rim par phye ba brgyad pa las gang
T02D1190:204b-4: dang / gsungs pa / nam mkha'i khams su bha ga bsam //
T02D1190:204b-5: zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas /
T02D1190:204b-6: ji ltar 'byung ba sgom pa po //
T02D1190:204b-7: zhes pa'i bar gyis gang gsungs pa dang /
T02D1190:204b-9: de yi dbus su bsam bya ro //
T02D1190:204b-11: padma 'dab ma brgyad pa rim pa gcig par bltas la /
T02D1190:204b-12: a'a li k'a li yongs su gyur pa las zla
T02D1190:204b-13: ba dang nyi ma de'i nang du sa bon no
T02D1190:204b-14: // de gcig tu gyur pas bya ba nan tan
T02D1190:204b-15: gyi ye shes te sku rdzogs pa'i bar gyis shin
T02D1190:204b-16: tu rnam par dag pa chos kyi dbyings kyi ye
T02D1190:204b-17: shes te thams cad bstan to //
T02D1190:204b-18: de la dbus su phyag rgya nga //
T02D1190:204b-20: nga nyid phyag rgya ste phyag rgya ni phyag rgya chen po'o //
T02D1190:204b-21: khyod dang lhan cig ces pa ni kha sbyor gyi rnal 'byor gyi rang bzhin gyis zhes dgongs pa'o //
T02D1190:204b-23: 'dod chags chen po rjes chags pas //
T02D1190:204b-25: rnam par dga' ba'i rang bzhin gyi rgyus so //
T02D1190:204b-26: lhan cig skyes dga'i rang bzhin las //
T02D1190:204b-28: bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes kyi phyir sku rdzogs pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02D1190:204b-29: zhal brgyad pa la zhabs bzhi pa //
T02D1190:204b-30: phyag ni bcu drug dag gis brgyan //
T02D1190:204b-31: bdud bzhi mnyam par mnan pa nyid //
T02D1190:204b-33: mgo bo'i phreng ba'i do shal mdzad //
T02D1190:204b-34: nyi mar bzhugs shing rol mor bcas //
T02D1190:204b-35: kha dog nag po 'jigs pa po //
T02D1190:204b-36: sna tshogs rdo rjes spyi bor ma tshan //
T02D1190:204b-37: ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor dang dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor gcig pa nyid gsungs pa /
T02D1190:204b-39: phyag ni bcu drug zhal brgyad pa //
T02D1190:204b-40: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa /
T02D1190:204b-41: de ni ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin zhe sdang rdo rje zhes bya ba'i sku'o //
T02D1190:204b-42: da ni yang zhal brgyad pa zhes bya ba la
T02D1190:204b-43: sogs pas dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor dang dbyer med
T02D1190:204b-44: pa nyid dkyil 'khor gnyi ga'i rang bzhin rdo rje
T02D1190:204b-45: 'dzin pa nyid yin par bstan to //
T02D1190:204b-46: zhal brgyad ces pa ni bzhi po gnyis kyis so //
T02D1190:204b-47: zhabs bzhi pa zhes pa ni re res so //
T02D1190:204b-48: phyag ni bcu drug dag gis brgyan ni bzhi po
T02D1190:204b-49: re re zhing yang bzhi'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir
T02D1190:205a-1: bdud bzhi mnyam par mnan pa nyid du gcig pas so //
T02D1190:205a-3: ces pa 'dis ni nye bar dmigs pa thams cad spangs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1190:205a-4: mgo bo'i phreng ba'i do shal mdzad //
T02D1190:205a-5: ces pa 'dis ni a'a li k'a li'i n'a da phreng gnyis dbyer med pa nyid de yin no //
T02D1190:205a-6: nyi mar bzhugs shing rol mor bcas //
T02D1190:205a-7: zhes pa 'dis ni spro ba dang bsdu ba'i rang bzhin nyid ye shes so //
T02D1190:205a-8: sna tshogs rdo rje spyi bor mtshan //
T02D1190:205a-10: spro ba dang bsdu ba'i rang bzhin de yin no //
T02D1190:205a-11: kha dog nag po zhes pa ni bsdu ba'i rang bzhin nyid yin no //
T02D1190:205a-12: 'jigs pa po ni gnyi ga dbyer med pa'i gnyis kyi bdag nyid yin par dgongs so //
T02D1190:205a-13: 'dis ni dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor dang ye shes
T02D1190:205a-14: kyi dkyil 'khor dag dbyer med pa'i phyir zhe sdang
T02D1190:205a-15: rdo rje'i rang bzhin nyid zhal brgyad par bstan to
T02D1190:205a-16: // de nyid gsal bar byas pa nyid kyi zhal nas h'um spro zhing //
T02D1190:205a-17: thal bas lus la byugs pa nyid //
T02D1190:205a-18: bdag med lhan cig mnyam sbyor zhing //
T02D1190:205a-19: dga' ba gnyis gnyis snyoms 'jug pas //
T02D1190:205a-20: rlabs med pa yi bde ba thob //
T02D1190:205a-21: rlom sems med pa'i rang bzhin can //
T02D1190:205a-23: de'i phyir zhal brgyad pa'i rang bzhin gyi bcom ldan
T02D1190:205a-24: 'das kyi zhal las yi ge h'um spro bar bya
T02D1190:205a-26: thal bas lus la byugs pa nyid //
T02D1190:205a-27: thal ba ni rdul phra rab po //
T02D1190:205a-28: de dang 'dra ba'i rdul gyis lus rnams te gang lus rnams do'o //
T02D1190:205a-29: de nyid yi ge h'um til gyi gang bu lta
T02D1190:205a-30: bu nam mkha'i khams yang spros pas mi shong ba'o
T02D1190:205a-32: dga' ba gnyis gnyis snyoms 'jug pas //
T02D1190:205a-33: dga' ba zhes pa ni lhag par phul du byung ba'i bde ba gzhan med pa'o //
T02D1190:205a-34: de'i gnyis gnyis ni gnyi ga'i ye shes so //
T02D1190:205a-35: des snyoms par 'jug pa ni ldan pa'o //
T02D1190:205a-36: de nyid kyi phyir bdag med ma dang lhan cig
T02D1190:205a-37: kha sbyor ba ni lhan cig dag tu yang dag
T02D1190:205a-38: par sbyor ba gnyis su med pa'i rang bzhin nyid
T02D1190:205a-40: de nyid bdag med ma ni bdag med ma de nyid kha sbyor ba yin no //
T02D1190:205a-41: dba' rlabs med pa'i bde ba thob //
T02D1190:205a-42: ces pa ni dpa' rlabs dang 'dra bas dpa' rlabs
T02D1190:205a-43: te spro ba'i rang bzhin kun rdzob kyi bden pa'o
T02D1190:205b-0: // de @205b las byung zhing skyes pa gang gi
T02D1190:205b-1: phyir de ni dba' rlabs kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i
T02D1190:205b-2: bdag nyid dang don dam pa'i bden pa'i bdag nyid
T02D1190:205b-3: // do // de lta bur gyur pa'i ye shes
T02D1190:205b-4: bde ba de nyid thob pa de'i rang bzhin nyid
T02D1190:205b-6: ye shes de yang rlom sems med pa'i rang bzhin can no //
T02D1190:205b-7: de lta bur gyur pa'i yi ge h'um rlom sems med pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02D1190:205b-8: zhal brgyad kyi kha dog gsungs pa /
T02D1190:205b-9: rtsa ba'i zhal ni nag po che //
T02D1190:205b-10: g-yas pa la ni sku dang mtshungs //
T02D1190:205b-11: g-yon pa dmar zhing cher 'jigs pa //
T02D1190:205b-12: spyi bo'i zhal ni gtsigs pa can //
T02D1190:205b-13: lhag ma'i zhal ni bung pa mtshungs //
T02D1190:205b-14: sgra ji bzhin pa'i don ni gsal ba nyid do //
T02D1190:205b-15: don gzhan bshad par bya ste /
T02D1190:205b-16: dang po'i zhal ni de nyid rtsa ba'i zhal lo //
T02D1190:205b-17: de yang nag po che ni 'od gsal ba'i rang bzhin thugs zhes bya ba'o //
T02D1190:205b-18: g-yas pa la ni sku dang mtshungs //
T02D1190:205b-19: zhes pa ni k'a li'i rang bzhin thabs kyi ngo bo sku zhes bya ba'o //
T02D1190:205b-20: g-yon pa dmar ni a'a li'i rang bzhin shes rab kyi ngo bo gsung zhes bya'o //
T02D1190:205b-21: spyi bo'i zhal zhes pa ni steng gi rdo rje gsum dbyer med pa'o //
T02D1190:205b-23: gtsigs pa can zhes pa ni me long lta bu
T02D1190:205b-24: la sogs pa ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin yin pa'i
T02D1190:205b-25: phyir ro // spyan ni nyi shu rtsa bzhis che
T02D1190:205b-26: ni zhal re re zhing spyan gsum gsum yin pa'i
T02D1190:205b-27: phyir ro // phyir / zhal brgyad la spyan nyi shu rtsa bzhi rnams so //
T02D1190:205b-29: rdo rje gsum gyis dag pa'i spyan //
T02D1190:205b-31: rdo rje gsum gyi skabs nyid du rigs pa yin no //
T02D1190:205b-32: zhal gzhan po bzhi yang mngon par brjod par spyan rnams bstan te /
T02D1190:205b-33: gnas dang nye ba'i gnas la sogs pa'i gnas nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i rnam par dag pa rnams so //
T02D1190:205b-34: lhag ma'i zhal gzhan bzhi ni nag po nyid yin no //
T02D1190:205b-36: rdo rje gsum gyi rang bzhin dga' ba gsum dang
T02D1190:205b-37: de dang dbyer med pa'i bzhi pa lhan cig skyes
T02D1190:205b-38: pa'o // bzhi po de yang dbyer med pa nyid yin no //
T02D1190:205b-39: bud ba mtshungs ni zhal bzhi po 'di'o //
T02D1190:205b-40: 'dis ni zhal lnga rnams nag pos ye shes lnga dbyer med pa nyid do //
T02D1190:205b-41: dmar ba dang dkar ba dag thabs dang shes rab kyi rang bzhin dag go //
T02D1190:206a-1: pa ni sku gsum dang ye shes lnga nyid yin no //
T02D1190:206a-2: zhal brgyad nyid kyis zhe sdang rdo rje bstan to //
T02D1190:206a-3: grong khyer nyams dgar khyod dang nga //
T02D1190:206a-4: dga' bas shin tu gang bas rol //
T02D1190:206a-5: dkar mo dbang po'i phyogs phyung nas //
T02D1190:206a-6: shar gyi sgo ru yang dag gnas //
T02D1190:206a-7: gnyi ga snyoms par zhugs pas spro ba'i sgo nas 'byin pa'i dkyil 'khor bstan te /
T02D1190:206a-8: gnyi ga dbyer med par rol pa nyid shin tu
T02D1190:206a-9: phul du byung ba'i bde ba gzhan la med pa
T02D1190:206a-10: yin pas dga' ba'i ye shes bstan to //
T02D1190:206a-11: dkar mo zhes pa ni sa'i khams gti mug rnam
T02D1190:206a-12: par dag par rdzogs pa dga' ba nyid ye shes
T02D1190:206a-14: srub dang bsrub pa'i sbyor ba las //
T02D1190:206a-15: chom rkun ma yang phung nas ni //
T02D1190:206a-16: yang zhes pa ni mchog dga' ye shes bstan to //
T02D1190:206a-17: chom rkun ma ni me'i khams phra ma rnam par
T02D1190:206a-18: rdzogs pa mchog tu dga' ba nyid ye shes gsum
T02D1190:206a-19: dang dbyer med pa yin no //
T02D1190:206a-20: phyung nas lho yi sgo ru ni //
T02D1190:206a-21: chom rkun ma ni sgo srung ma //
T02D1190:206a-22: lho'i sgo zhes pa ni nyi ma'i rang bzhin nyid du bstan pa'o //
T02D1190:206a-23: bo la kakko la sbyor bas //
T02D1190:206a-24: ro langs ma yang phyung nas ni //
T02D1190:206a-26: rnam par dga' ba'i ye shes bstan pa yin no //
T02D1190:206a-27: ro langs ma zhes pa ni chu'i khams 'dod chags
T02D1190:206a-28: rnam par dag pa rdzogs pa rnam par dga' ba
T02D1190:206a-29: nyid ye shes gsum gyi bdag nyid yin no //
T02D1190:206a-30: phyung nas nub kyi sgo ru ni //
T02D1190:206a-31: bdud 'joms ma ni rnam par gnas //
T02D1190:206a-32: nub kyi sgo ru zhes pa ni zla ba'i rang bzhin du bstan pa'o //
T02D1190:206a-33: bdud 'joms ma ni nyon mongs pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa rnams zhi ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1190:206a-34: dga' ba chen po'i snyoms 'jug pas //
T02D1190:206a-35: gha sma ra'i yang phyung nas ni //
T02D1190:206a-36: dga' ba chen po'i snyoms 'jug pas //
T02D1190:206a-38: lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'i ye shes bstan to //
T02D1190:206a-39: gha sma r'ai zhes pa ni rlung gi khams phrag dog rnam par dag par rdzogs pa'o //
T02D1190:206a-40: phyung nas byang gi sgo la ni //
T02D1190:206a-41: 'jigs pa'i gzugs can ma nyid gnas //
T02D1190:206a-42: byang gi sgo zhes pa ni nyi ma dang zla
T02D1190:206a-43: ba dag dbyer med pa'i phyir lhan cig skyes pa'i
T02D1190:206a-44: dga' ba'i rang bzhin gyi rdo rje gsum dbyer med
T02D1190:206a-45: pa 'byung ba chen po bzhi'i rang bzhin gyi mkha'
T02D1190:206b-0: 'gro ma bzhi dga' ba bzhi'i ye @206b shes me
T02D1190:206b-1: long la sogs pa'i ye shes lnga rnam par dag
T02D1190:206b-2: pa'o // thar pa chen po'i grong du 'jug pa'i sgo bzhi la srung ba bzhi po 'di'o //
T02D1190:206b-3: gnyis gnyis bskyod pa'i sbyor ba las //
T02D1190:206b-4: pukka s'i yang phyung nas ni //
T02D1190:206b-5: phyung nas dbang ldan mtshams su yang //
T02D1190:206b-6: drag po'i gzugs can ma nyid gnas //
T02D1190:206b-7: gnyis gnyis bskyod pa'i sbyor ba las //
T02D1190:206b-8: zhes pas sngar bstan pa 'dis ni mkha' 'gro ma
T02D1190:206b-9: bzhi thabs kyi rang bzhin rdo rje 'dzin pa dga'
T02D1190:206b-10: ba la sogs pa dga' ba bzhi'i rang bzhin no
T02D1190:206b-11: // da ni gnyis gnyis bskyod pa'i sbyor ba las //
T02D1190:206b-12: zhes pa 'dis ni thabs dang shes rab kyi rang
T02D1190:206b-13: bzhin gyi bdag med ma dga' ba la sogs pa
T02D1190:206b-15: pukka s'ai la sogs pa'i mkha' 'gro ma bzhi /
T02D1190:206b-16: sa la sogs pa 'byung ba chen po bzhi'i bdag nyid bstan te /
T02D1190:206b-17: dbang ldan mtshams su zhes pa ni 'byung po'i gnas su'o //
T02D1190:206b-18: drag po'i gzugs can ma zhes pa 'dis ni bdag med ma'i cha dga' ba dang po bstan to //
T02D1190:206b-19: yang ni bsrub pa'i sbyor ba las //
T02D1190:206b-20: 'tshed ma'i mtshams su ri khrod ma //
T02D1190:206b-21: bsrub pa'i sbyor ba las zhes pa ni mchog tu dga' ba ste /
T02D1190:206b-22: bdud rtsi bsrubs pa nyid las chu'i khams rnam par dag pa ri khrod ma'o //
T02D1190:206b-23: srin po'i mtshams su gdol pa mo //
T02D1190:206b-25: rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin me'i khams rnam par dga' ba'i gdol pa mo'o //
T02D1190:206b-26: srin po'i mtshams zhes pa ni yul dang dbang po
T02D1190:206b-27: 'khrigs pas zla ba dang nyi ma'i rang bzhin nyid
T02D1190:206b-28: yin no // rlung gi mtshams su g-yung mo nyid //
T02D1190:206b-30: g-yung mo zhes pa lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'i rang bzhin gyi g-yud mo rlung gi khams so //
T02D1190:206b-31: de nyid kyi phyir rlung gi mtshams su'o //
T02D1190:206b-32: de nas rdo rje chags chen pos //
T02D1190:206b-33: rig mar bcas pa zhu bar gyur //
T02D1190:206b-34: 'dis ni gnyi gar dga' ba la sogs pa bzhi'i
T02D1190:206b-35: rang bzhin gyi mkha' 'gro ma brgyad rdzogs pa dag
T02D1190:206b-36: par bar ma do dang mtshungs par zhugs pa las
T02D1190:206b-37: mi dmigs pa'i rang bzhin gyis so //
T02D1190:206b-38: de rdo rje ni mi phyed pa'i sku'o //
T02D1190:206b-39: rig mar bcas pa ni shes rab dang lhan cig par ro //
T02D1190:206b-40: 'di nyid ji ltar yin pa gsungs pa /
T02D1190:206b-41: zhu bar gyur ni zhu ba'o //
T02D1190:207a-0: de nyid gyur ni yang dag pa ma @207a * //
T02D1190:207a-2: ji ltar zhe na chags chen las so //
T02D1190:207a-3: gnyi ga'i lhan cig pa'i dga' ba yongs su gcod pa'i don to //
T02D1190:207a-4: sna tshogs glu yi mchod pa las //
T02D1190:207a-5: de nas lha mo rnams kyis bskul //
T02D1190:207a-6: de nas zhes ni zhu bar gyur pa'i rjes thogs la'o //
T02D1190:207a-7: lha mo zhes pa ni spro ba'i tshul gyis dri za'i sems can 'jug pa rnam par gnas pa'o //
T02D1190:207a-9: sna tshogs glu yi mchod pa las ni mtshan ma
T02D1190:207a-10: sna tshogs 'phrul pa las mtshan ma'i rang bzhin nyid
T02D1190:207a-11: mtshan ma med pa yin par bstan pa yin no
T02D1190:207a-12: // glu'i mchod pa nyid gsungs pa /
T02D1190:207a-13: rje btsun snying rje'i yid bzhengs shig / pukka s'ai ni bdag la skyobs //
T02D1190:207a-14: stong pa'i rang bzhin nyid spongs la //
T02D1190:207a-15: bdag la bde chen sbyor bzhed mdzod //
T02D1190:207a-17: rje btsun ni bcom ldan 'das so //
T02D1190:207a-18: snying rje'i yid can ni thugs rje'i thugs can no //
T02D1190:207a-19: pukka s'ai ni bdag la skyobs ni bdag pukka s'i la skyobs shig pa ste bdag ni nga'o //
T02D1190:207a-20: khyod kyis yongs su bskyab pa nyid ji ltar yin pa'i dogs pa bsu ba'i lan gsungs /
T02D1190:207a-22: bde ba chen po'i sbyor ba lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin gyi don to //
T02D1190:207a-23: bdag bzhengs mdzod ni bdag gi 'dod pa brnag pa'o //
T02D1190:207a-25: stong pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni stong pa'i ting nge 'dzin no //
T02D1190:207a-26: khyod med na ni bdag 'gum pas //
T02D1190:207a-27: kye yi rdo rje khyod bzhengs shig / stong pa'i rang bzhin nyid spongs la //
T02D1190:207a-28: ri khrod ma 'bras grub par mdzod //
T02D1190:207a-29: khyod med na ni khyod med na'o //
T02D1190:207a-31: kye'i rdo rje khyod bzhengs shig ni dgyes pa'i rdo rje bzhengs shig pa'o //
T02D1190:207a-32: spongs la ni spongs shig pa'o //
T02D1190:207a-33: stong pa'i rang bzhin ni stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin no //
T02D1190:207a-34: ri khrod ma 'bras grub par mdzod ni dgos pa sgrubs shig pa'o //
T02D1190:207a-35: gtso bo 'jig rten mgron gnyer ba //
T02D1190:207a-36: stong pa nyid la bzhugs sam ci //
T02D1190:207a-37: khyod med phyogs ni mi 'tshal bas //
T02D1190:207a-38: gdol pa mo bdag zhu ba bgyid //
T02D1190:207a-39: bde gtso 'jig rten mgron gnyer ni kye dga' ba'i gtso bo'o //
T02D1190:207a-40: stong pa nyid la zhugs sam ci ni stong pa nyid la zhugs sam ci'o //
T02D1190:207b-0: gdol pa mo bdag ni @207b gdol pa mo'o //
T02D1190:207b-1: zhu ba bgyid ni gsol ba 'debs pa'o //
T02D1190:207b-2: khyod med na ni khyod mi bzhugs na'o //
T02D1190:207b-3: phyogs ni mi 'tshal ba ni phyogs mi shes pa'o //
T02D1190:207b-4: bdag gis khyod kyi thugs 'tshal gyis //
T02D1190:207b-5: mig 'phrul mnga' ba khyod bzhengs shig / g-yung mo bdag yid dran nyams pas //
T02D1190:207b-6: snying rje rgyun chad ma mdzad cig / mig 'phrul mnga' ba ni mig 'phrul can no //
T02D1190:207b-7: bzhengs shig ni bzhengs shig pa'o //
T02D1190:207b-9: bdag gis ni nga yis so //
T02D1190:207b-11: khyod kyi thugs ni khyod kyi sems kyi tshul lo //
T02D1190:207b-12: bdag ni kho bo ste bud med du gyur pa'i da rgyal gyis mang po'i tshig go //
T02D1190:207b-13: yid dran nyams pa ni dran pa nyams pa'o //
T02D1190:207b-14: snying rje rgyun chad ni thugs rje rgyun chad ma mdzad pa'o //
T02D1190:207b-15: 'dis ni sa dang chu dang me dang rlung gi
T02D1190:207b-16: rang bzhin gyi mkha' 'gro ma bzhi po bdag med
T02D1190:207b-17: ma'i char gyur pa'i dga' ba bzhi'i rang bzhin cha
T02D1190:207b-18: med pa nyid mya ngan las 'das pa dang dbyer
T02D1190:207b-19: med pa'i kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i ngo bo'o //
T02D1190:207b-20: bcom ldan 'das bskul bas ye shes gsum gyi bdag
T02D1190:207b-21: nyid gnyis ka dbyer med pa'i ye shes kyi rang
T02D1190:207b-22: bzhin gang de nyid chos kyi sku'o //
T02D1190:207b-23: de nyid bdag med ma can sgyu ma lta bu dang dbang po'i gzhu dang mtshungs pa ste /
T02D1190:207b-24: pukka s'i sa glus bskul nas snying rje'i yid can
T02D1190:207b-25: stong pa'i ting nge 'dzin nyid spongs la zhes pa
T02D1190:207b-26: dang / de ltar ri khrod mas kyang //
T02D1190:207b-27: stong pa'i rang bzhin nyid spongs la //
T02D1190:207b-28: kye yi rdo rje khyod bzhengs shig / ces gsungs pa dang /
T02D1190:207b-29: de ltar gdol ba mos kyang /
T02D1190:207b-30: stong pa nyid la bzhugs sam ci //
T02D1190:207b-31: khyod med phyogs ni mi 'tshal bas //
T02D1190:207b-34: bdag gis khyod kyi thugs 'tshal gyis //
T02D1190:207b-35: snying rje rgyun chad ma mdzad cig / ces gsungs pa'o //
T02D1190:207b-36: yang na snying rje'i yid can zhes pa 'dis ni
T02D1190:207b-37: kun du snang ba'i mtshan nyid sku rdo rje'i rang
T02D1190:207b-38: bzhin sprul pa'i sku can no //
T02D1190:207b-39: kye'i rdo rje khyod bzhengs pa 'dis ni brjod pa'i
T02D1190:207b-40: mtshan nyid gsungs rdo rje'i rang bzhin longs spyod rdzogs
T02D1190:207b-42: bde gtso bzhugs sam ci zhes pa 'dis ni mtshan
T02D1190:207b-43: nyid dang bral ba thugs rdo rje'i rang bzhin chos
T02D1190:208a-1: bdag gis khyod kyi thugs 'tshal gyis //
T02D1190:208a-2: mig 'phrul mnga' ba khyod bzhengs shig / ces pa
T02D1190:208a-3: 'dis ni kun du snang ba mngon par brjod pa'i
T02D1190:208a-4: yang dag pa'i rnam pa'i mtshan nyid sku gsung thugs
T02D1190:208a-5: kyi rang bzhin sprul pa dang longs spyod rdzogs pa
T02D1190:208a-6: dang chos kyi sku dang dbyer med pa'i sku yin
T02D1190:208a-7: par gsungs so // zhu bar gyur nas rig ma
T02D1190:208a-8: dang bcas pa rdo rje can 'di yin pa'i don
T02D1190:208a-9: par gsungs so // to // dkar mo la sogs
T02D1190:208a-10: pa'i mkha' 'gro ma bzhi yang rdo rje 'dzin pa'i
T02D1190:208a-11: yan lag tu gyur pa nyid dga' ba bzhi des
T02D1190:208a-12: dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i rang bzhin dang 'dra bas de
T02D1190:208a-13: la bskul bas snyoms par 'jug par bstan pa mi
T02D1190:208a-14: rigs pa yin zhes de rnams kyis bskul ba ma
T02D1190:208a-15: par gsungs so // to // bstan to // de
T02D1190:208a-16: la rdo rje 'dzin pa dang snyoms par zhugs pa'i
T02D1190:208a-18: 'dis ni rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid thabs su gyur

T02D1190:208a-20: dam pa'i bden pa'i rang bzhin dkar mo la sogs
